story:
Interested in taking your ab-core workout to the next level, and have fun doing it? Introducing the Inchworm Slider®, the latest all-in-one fitness tool from VINTU, USA.

Fun, and easy to use, the design of the Inchworm Slider® was inspired by nature to help the user quickly achieve their fitness goals, with a focus on the ab-core muscles.  It offers a serious and effective core-body workout, that is fun and easy to use.

www.IWSLR.com

Endorsed by Craig Avera, fitness trainer to some of Hollywood's top movie stars, the Inchworm Slider®  offers several important and unique features that set it apart from similar types of core fitness devices on the market:

  • Unique design allows for unlimited variety of core exercises
  • Portable, can be used anywhere
  • Low profile permits easy storage when not in use
  • Removable top cushion makes it easy to keep clean
  • If desired, top cushion can be removed, and area underneath can be used for adding extra weights for additional strength training
  • Built in side handles make it easy to carry
  • Safety panels on each side prevent contact with wheels
  • Solid, durable construction facilitates years of use

VINTU's mission is to "surprise and delight" every customer, by designing and creating products that can help make your life easier and healthier.  As a sports nutritionist, I know first hand how important it is to maintain good health. Maintaining core-body health is particularly important, as our core-body muscles are required for even the most basic activities, such as sitting or standing.   Poor back health associated with lack of good body posture is increasingly becoming a major health issue.

Let's face it, with today's busy lifestyles, most people don't have a lot of time to devote to exercise, much less focus on their core-body muscles;  or, they often engage in exercises that are repetitious, ineffective and not enjoyable.   

The inspiration for the design of the Inchworm Slider® (patent pending) was based on the need for an ab-core fitness tool that is versatile, safe, effective, fun, affordable, easy to use, and portable-allowing it to be used anywhere, at home or at the gym.

VINTU is very excited to introduce theInchworm Slider® .
The Inchworm Slider® has been test marketed at several fitness facilities in Asia for over one year, with amazing results and feedback from clients.  It has also been endorsed by Jing Xu, top Pilates trainer and owner of X-Pilates gym in Shanghai. 

By helping to contribute to our campaign, we can develop a more in-depth, on-line training program for the Inchworm Slider®,  and gear up manufacturing for launching the product in the U.S. and North America, then later on in Europe/S.E. Asia. Currently available for sale in Asia,  where it has been test marketed.)


For more information about the Inchworm Slider®,  please visit our website: www.IWSLR.com

Yoga mat (as shown below)  and instruction manual are included with purchase at no additional cost:




What We Need & What You Get

Currently we estimate that $100,000 is needed for the following:

1.   To develop a certified training program using the Inchworm Slider®, to be accessed on-line (for pay) by users, and for use by gym trainers who are involved in ab-core training or Pilates training

2.  To  ramp up manufacturing for the Inchworm Slider® which will be introduced to the U.S. and North American markets, and initially sold on-line at Amazon.  (Currently, the Inchworm Slider®  is available for purchase only in Asia where it has been test marketed)

3.  To provide funds for a Inchworm Slider® marketing campaign in the U.S. and North American markets


Perks!

By joining our campaign, we will offer the following:
1.   $5 contribution=your name on our website, and a chance to win a free "Inchworm" t-shirt and, you will be able to purchase the Slider at a special introductory price of $109 (5% discount).

2.   $10 contribution=your name on our website, a chance to win a free "Inchworm" t-shirt,  plus a chance to win a free Inchworm Slider®  and, you will be able to purchase the Slider at a special introductory price of $99 (10% discount).

3.   $25 contribution= all of the above, plus one year of complimentary free access to the certified  Inchworm Slider® on-line training program and, you will be able to purchase the Slider at a special introductory price of $89 (25% discount).

4.   $100+ contribution=all of the above, including free life-time access to the certified Inchworm Slider®on-line training program, plus free life-time replacement of top cushion and, you will be able to purchase the Slider at a special introductory price of $79 (33% discount).




The Impact

By contributing to the Inchworm Slider®campaign, you can make a difference by investing in your health and,  allowing us to develop improved training programs for others who are interested in maintaining a healthier body.

With a proven track record, and endorsements by top fitness trainers, the

Inchworm Slider® is sure to be a benefit to those who desire improved core-body fitness.




Risks & Challenges

As  with any start up venture, or new products, there are always risks of product acceptance by consumers,  and understanding of how the product can benefit them.

VINTU, USA,  is owned and managed by an individual who has over 20 years of experience in healthcare and fitness marketing.  

We know there will be unforeseen challenges in marketing the Inchworm Slider®.  However, as mentioned previously, we have test marketed the product for over one year, with very good results.

To overcome challenges, we have a steady growth plan, with methods in place to be open to consumer input via internet feedback, and make any future modifications to the product or training programs as necessary.


How you Can Help

If you don't have the money to contribute, don't worry!

We can still use your help!

  • We would love it if you could get the word out and tell others about the 

    Inchworm Slider®  via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and G+ ! (links to these sites coming soon)

  • Also, please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Curing the Incurable; One Man's Journey 

  • My name is Jordan Iovinella, I am a father, artist, musician and horticulturist. 
  • I suffer from a rare disease called NMO (Neuro-Mylitus-Optica) or Devic's disease. The symptoms are a lot like MS only more severe. Conventional Medicine is failing me, I need to seek alternative healing treatment. My path leads me to John of God, a Spiritual Medium Healer in Brazil and then to Peru,  seeking and documenting the  healing process of indigenous Peruvian Shamen.
  • You're contributions will enable me to stay long enough to be healed (6 months). Next, the Peruvian Rainforest. Your help will give me the ability to heal and share this inspiring story of strength and perseverance. 
  • I am working with my family as my team. My brother's Justin and Jarrett, my sister Kiersten and my Mom and Dad. We as a team want to bring this story to you as it unfolds.


THIS IS WHAT YOU GET & WHAT WE NEED

  • I calculate I'll need about $900 a month to cover shelter, air fare, bus fare and the essentials necessary to completely heal. Since my case is severe, I need the extra help to stay in Abadiania, Brazil for 6 months.
  • In the event we receive more than our goal, we will be making a donation to the Casa Dom Inasio, to help ensure future healing for all people.
  • We want to share this story of strength, hope and perseverance with you. We will be sending out digital post cards, video updates with details about this amazing healing process.The names of all our supporters will go into the credits. There will be an open, ongoing conversation via email with supporters. For those who wish it, I will present your photographs at the Casa Dom Inasio.
  • In the event we do not reach our goal, this unfortunately would cut short the healing process and exclude the journey to Peru. We have funds to start this amazing process. Make no mistake we  need your help to bring this story to completion and to manifest the documentary.

The Impact and Purpose

  • This is an amazing story of strength and fighting the odds. By helping, you are effectively making this inspiring story available to the world via the documentary "Curing the Incurable, One Man's Journey" 
  • Please share this with anyone you know who has MS or other debilitating illness. This story is meant to be shared.
  • This is the second time traveling to John of God and this time we want to open up the experience with video up-dates and progress up-dates, interview's and digital postcards from location.
  • We want to reach out to our audience you can find us at; curing.incurable@yandex.com 
    • www.facebook.com/curingdocumentary?ref=hl
  • Send photos to be presented to this address. 
  • Introduce yourself and ask any questions you may have. We are happy to respond and open a dialogue with our audience. 

Risks & Challenges... Nothing is gained, without the loss of something. "life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all" Hellen Keller

There are many risks to the journey I am undertaking. I know I'm not alone. I have  supporters, family and friends and people who want to contribute and share in the beauty of the story being told. When people get together to accomplish a common goal, amazing things happen! Thats why its worth all the risk!

  • The first time I was underfunded and unprepared. This time I am taking with me the knowledge learned, and hopefully some funding to ensure this project is a success.
  • This time I am going to ask for people's help and accept their help. Something that has been difficult for me in the past.

Other Ways You Can Help!!!

We understand some people simply can't contribute monetarily. That's ok. You can help us to  spread the word, by sharing our story with friends and family or maybe you know someone with MS who suffers--this story will inspire them. Tell them about it! Perhaps you know someone suffering another debilitating disease.Sharing this story of perseverance will help them. It's time we all came together to share in this story of healing!

  • Please post a link to this campaign on your facebook, twitter, instagram, pintrest and any other social media you are a part of. 
  • Like our FB page and leave a comment!
  •  Indiegogo has amazing share tools! Please use them!

And thank you so much for listening to our story and supporting it, many, many, many thanks!

In love and light

jordan iovinella

story:
To our Backers, A hearty


proacmOm - The Next Generation Baby Bottle

The world’s most advanced baby bottle, proacmOm heats the milk in the baby bottle with a push of a button.  proacmOm, warms and holds the milk temperature for hours. Detachable, easy to clean, and simple to use. 

proacmOm, unique feature allows to detect the temperature of the milk and indicates when it is just right to feed your baby.


As seen on


How to Use


The Design


What You Get


Features






Normal Mode


Measurements






The press kit can be found here


Thanks for your Support


FAQ


How do I heat the milk in proacmOm?

You can use the three easy functions for heating: Defrost, Warm & Boil. For safety, there is an on and off switch to avoid accidental usage of the buttons.


How do I know the milk is ready to feed?

Inbuilt temperature sensor detects the temperature of the milk and the LED turns from “Red” to “Green”, when it is actually ready to feed your baby.


How do I charge proacmOm?

To suit your need on the go, you can use the micro-USB port to charge the proacmOm using mobile charger or using charging port on the car or using a micro USB cable from laptop.


Can I use proacmOm without the heating element and control unit?

Yes, you can remove the heating element and the control unit and use the bottom closure cap to operate proacmOm in normal mode.


How can I check temperature of the milk in normal mode?

LCD thermometer strip will assist in knowing the temperature of the milk in normal mode.


How do I wash proacmOm?

proacmOm parts are detachable and easy to clean. It is top rack dishwasher safe and can also be used in baby bottle sterilizer. But, make sure you remove the heating element and the control unit before washing or sterilizing. Heating element is safe for hand-washing.


Can I put proacmOm on the microwave?

Yes, but make sure you remove the heating element and the control unit. Do not put electronics in the microwave.


How much milk can proacmOm hold?

Each pack of proacmOm contains 9 Oz (266 mL) and 4 Oz (118 mL) bottles.


Is proacmOm safe for heating the milk?

proacmOm is made from BPA free plastic material and the heating element is made from food grade stainless steel in compliance with FDA, hence it very safe for your babies. The heating is controlled intelligently, so that it maintains all the essential vitamins and minerals.


How does $1 perk works?

You will receive one set of proacmOm (worth $75), only if we reach our funding goal, hence please spread word about proacmOm on social media as much as possible.

story:
About Varsity Nutrition:

Varsity Nutrition is a sport's nutrition company founded by athletes in association with industry professionals who specialize in pharmaceuticals, chemistry, sports and exercise science, as well as other health fields.

Our mission is to help all athletes reach peak performance levels and live a healthy life. By combining scientifically researched ingredients and long practiced strategies from top athletes we are dedicated to bring you only the best in sports nutrition aimed to help improve your overall well-being.

Varsity Nutrition produces scientifically researched sports supplements in correlation with a consistently updated nutrition and fitness blog with content ranging from meal plans to workout programs. It is our goal to lead the way in allowing all athletes to reach their true potential.

Funding:

Your funding will go to covering various aspects of our production here at Varsity Nutrition from the cost of merchandising to the costs of testing and researching our formulas. Our funding milestones include:

$2,500 - Create and ship out all perks (not including supplements). Print out two non-released shirt designs.

$5,000 - Employ a staff of part-time employees.

$7,500 - Test/Research our formulas with a team of athletes at a private facility.

$10,000 - Start production of Sustain and M+ for Fall 2015 Launch. Including packaging, shipping , etc.

$15,000 - Hire a full time staff to work on all aspects of Varsity Nutrition.

$20,000 - Start production of Prime and Epsilon for a 2016 Launch. Including packaging, shipping, etc.

$25,000 - Fall 2015 Launch for all Supplements

Prime:

Servings Per Container: 30

Serving Size: 1 Scp

Prime is a pre-workout supplement formulated to give its users long last energy, increased stamina and endurance, as well as a heightened level of focus. Prime is formulated to provide a maximum pump, muscle fullness, intense energy and extreme vascularity.

150mg of Caffeine, 5G Creatine Monohydrate, 2G Beta-Alanine, 1.5G BCAAS

  • Beta-Alanine: known to prevent muscle loss
  • Creatine Monohydrate: naturally found in the body, promotes muscle growth
  • Taurine: prevents lactic acid buildup, heightens energy and focus
  • Acetyl L-Carnitine: helps convert fat to energy, aids fat loss, has cognitive benefits
  • L-Glutamine: promotes muscle growth and prevents muscle loss, abundant in muscle tissue
  • BCAAs: prevent muscle breakdown
  • Vitamin B3: vasodilator, increases metabolism
  • Agmatine Sulfate: increases pump and vascularity, promotes calcium uptake
  • Green Tea Leaf Extract: supports healthy cell structures
  • D-Ribose: building block for ATP which creates energy, volumizes cells to create a pumped look, heightens energy and focus
  • L-Arginine HCL:  increases blood flow and oxygen delivery to cells during a workout, important amino acid for HGH production, helps manufacture creatine naturally, regulates blood sugar
  • L-Arginine Ethyl Ester: increases blood flow and pump, supports protein synthesis
  • Betaine Anhydrous Trimethylglycine: breaks down fatty acids in the blood, supports liver function
Sustain:

Servings Per Container: 30

Serving Size: 2 Pills

Sustain is an enhanced electrolyte replenishment supplement formulated to replace key electrolytes lost in sweat while working out. Taken with 6-8oz. of water, Sustain will keep you hydrated through all physical activity. Sustain contains ingredients meant to boost electrolyte absorption in the body.

  • Vitamin C: improves calcium absorption, boosts immune system
  • Vitamin D3: regulates calcium levels, promotes magnesium absorption
  • Glycine Powder: prevents muscle breakdown, energy source
Epsilon:

Servings Per Container: 60

Serving Size: 2 Pills

Epsilon is a weight-loss supplement with zero* caffeine. Taken 30 minutes prior to each meal with a glass of water, Epsilon works to reduce your appetite, boost your metabolism and improve digestion. Epsilon supports healthy dieting as an additive to physical activity and a proper diet.

  • Green Tea Leaf Extract: supports healthy cell structures, antioxidant/anticarcenogen
  • Black Tea Extract: antioxidant/anticarcenogen
  • Vitamin B2: maintains healthy tissue, speeds up the metabolism, antioxidant
  • Theaflavin: antioxidant
  • Polyphenols: antioxidant/anticarcenogen
  • Epigallocatechin: antioxidant
  • Garcinia Cambogia Extract: aids in weight loss, acts as an appetite suppressant
  • Hoodia Gordonii: aids in weight loss, acts as an appetite suppressant, increases levels of ATP, heightens central nervous system functions
  • Vitamin E: slows down the oxidization of fats, defends against tissue damage, supports healthy cell structures
  • Betaine HCL: digestive aid, promotes oxidization of lipids
  • Raspberry Ketones: promotes thermogenesis and the breakdown of fats, acts as a digestive aid
Mood+ (Mood Enhancer):

Servings Per Container: 30

Serving Size: 2 Pills

M+ helps to enhance your mood and improve your overall quality of mental health. M+ works to reduce your level of stress, calm the nerves and combat depression. With reduced levels of stress and calmed nerves it becomes easier to sleep each night which can positively impact performance.

  • Chamomile: relaxes the body and mind
  • Valerian Root: treats sleep disorders, mild sedative
  • 5-HTP (Griffonia Seed Extract): regulates serotonin levels in the brain, calming neuro-nutrient, treats depression
  • Magnesium: supports healthy energy levels and heart rhythm, relaxes the muscles
  • Vitamin B3: brings nutrient rich blood the skin and brain
  • Vitamin B6: vital nutrient for serotonin conversion
  • Vitamin B8: enhances mood and cognition
  • Vitamin D3: connected to overall health and mood
  • L-Phenylaline: treats depression, chronic fatigue syndrome, and chronic pain conditions
  • Noopept: enhances and accelerates the memory, improves mood and reduces stress, increases creativity
  • DMAE-Bitartrate: aids in treating ADHD, boosts mood and memory, curbs depression

Blog:

It's our goal to bring you a consistently updated blog featuring Q&A's, as well numerous workout plans and meal plans for varying goals such as those featured below.
Breakfast Example (Bulking):
Egg Whites: 11 (363g)
Oat Bran Bagel: 1 and 1/2 Bagels (134g)
Swiss Cheese (70g)

About Varsity Nutrition:

Varsity Nutrition is a sport's nutrition company founded by
athletes in association with industry professionals who specialize in
pharmaceuticals, chemistry, sports and exercise science, as well as other
health fields.Our mission is to help all athletes reach peak performance levels and live a healthy life. By combining scientifically researched ingredients and long practiced strategies from top athletes we are dedicated to bring you only the best in sports nutrition aimed to help improve your overall well-being.
Varsity Nutrition produces scientifically researched sports
supplements in correlation with a consistently updated nutrition and fitness
blog with content ranging from meal plans to workout programs. It is our goal
to lead the way in allowing all athletes to reach their true potential.Funding:
Your funding will go to covering various aspects of our production here at Varsity Nutrition from the cost of merchandising to the costs of testing and researching our formulas. Our funding milestones include:$2,500 - Create and ship out all perks (not including supplements). Print out two non-released shirt designs.$5,000 - Employ a staff of part-time employees.$7,500 - Test/Research our formulas with a team of athletes at a private facility.$10,000 - Start production of Sustain and M+ for Fall 2015 Launch. Including packaging, shipping , etc.$15,000 - Hire a full time staff to work on all aspects of Varsity Nutrition.$20,000 - Start production of Prime and Epsilon for a 2016 Launch. Including packaging, shipping, etc.$25,000 - Fall 2015 Launch for all Supplements

Serving Size: 1 Scp
Prime is a pre-workout supplement formulated to give its
users long last energy, increased stamina and endurance, as well as a
heightened level of focus. Prime is formulated to provide a maximum pump,
muscle fullness, intense energy and extreme vascularity.

Monohydrate, 2G Beta-Alanine, 1.5G BCAAS

muscle growth

loss, abundant in muscle tissue

functions

Raspberry Ketones: promotes thermogenesis and
the breakdown of fats, acts as a digestive aid

Serving Size: 2 Pills

quality of mental health. M+ works to reduce your level of stress, calm the

relaxes the body and mind

nutrient rich blood the skin and brain

mood and cognition

connected to overall health and mood

treats depression, chronic fatigue syndrome, and chronic pain conditions

and accelerates the memory, improves mood and reduces stress, increases creativity

aids in treating ADHD, boosts mood and memory, curbs depression

story:
The history of Textalyser

In 2004 while being a student, I created a text analysis tool called Textalyser. At that time, Textalyser made it in the New York Times. Now, It is used every day by hundreds of people around the world.

But it has not improved since then, because of a lack of time and money.



The objectives

  1. Improve Textalyser
  2. Make a new version of Textalyser, make apps for iOS, Android and Windows Phone.
  3. Make a responsive, clean web version with new features.
  4. Create an API for people who want to integrate stats in their apps.
  5. Create Enterprise level services


What we need

Founds to hire the right people, new ideas. Language experts.


What you get

You can choose what will be the features implemented first.


Other ways to help

We will need help for each possible language. Specific knowledge in linguistics in specific languages can help.

story:
Hello, friends!

I am blessed to be selected for a trip to Ecuador in May along with TAMHSC faculty and four students each from five health disciplines.  This is an incredible learning experience and opportunity to serve the community of Guamani, Ecuador via medical charity through a Catholic organization called SIFAT.  In Ecuador, every student will:

  • Set up a clinic
  • Provide care for adults and children
  • Work in each discipline (nursing, medicine, pharmacy, public health, dentistry)

SIFAT - Ecuador 

During Spring Break, I get to serve the people of the Dominican Republic with students from UT Austin through GMT and gain an incredible experience in clinical assessment.  DR students will:

  • Travel to site(s) and set up clinics
  • Assess patients via interview and physical examination
  • Formulate a plan of care
  • Treat patients under direct supervision of a GMT staff medical doctor

GMT - Dominican Republic

I hope for similar opportunities in the future, locally or abroad, after graduating from nursing school and earning those RN letters after my name!

If you would like to contribute financially, I would greatly appreciate the help!  Even $10 would help.  More than anything, I request prayers for those traveling, for the people we will serve, and for the Lord to have mercy on all of the people around us who are suffering, hungry, sick, neglected, lost, or poor.  That’s just about everyone!  Pray for the world and pray for the inspiration and courage for me and all of us to nurture our gifts for the service of God and for the love of humanity, wherever we are and in our capacity.  Thank you. 

-Lindsey Wiggins
Global Health Outreach Nursing Representative
Traditional Class of 2016
TAMHSC College of Nursing

story:
About the Author and the Project


Link to video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1a_wZvS3e6c&amp...

My name is Apryl Pooley, and I am a neuroscience researcher at Michigan State University and author of Shadow Brain: A Neuroscientist’s Journey Through PTSD and Womanhood. I am in a unique position of researching the very disorder with which I live—posttraumatic stress disorder. But no amount of scientific research will shed light onto what PTSD really is more than learning how this disorder affects every aspect of one’s life. Therefore, in conjunction with my scientific research, I openly use my writing to expand public awareness of PTSD in order to help others recover from this debilitating disorder.


After experiencing a drug-facilitated rape at a fraternity house in 2003, my closest confidants blamed me for what happened and discouraged me from telling anybody else. In response, I kept silent and devoted the next 12 years of my life to figuring out what had happened to my own brain and body by pursuing college degrees in medical biology and neuroscience. But the first eight years of my studies were overshadowed by a battle with substance abuse and what I finally figured out in my doctoral studies to be PTSD.


I am now a PhD Candidate in the Michigan State University Neuroscience Program where I research how PTSD affects the brain in men and women differently. I pursued science to find a cure for PTSD, but actually found relief when I stepped away from the microscope to connect with humanity. I wanted to believe that if I found the biological reason for my struggles, I would find my cure. But the two most destructive forces that came out of my trauma, shame and guilt, didn’t leave me until I started sharing my story with other survivors of campus sexual assault.


The single greatest risk factor for developing PTSD after trauma is lack of social support. More than any contributions made by one’s genes, other biological characteristics of an individual, or aspects of the trauma itself, it is social support that has the biggest influence on whether someone will develop PTSD. Socially supported people are allowed to talk about what happened to them, to experience and express their emotions without ridicule or judgment, to cry and scream and do whatever their body needs to do to discharge all that energy. With proper social support—human connection—immediately following trauma, the likelihood of recovery is exponentially greater. And that is why resources like the MSU Sexual Assault Program need to have a strong presence on college campuses.



The Magnitude of the Problem

One-in-five women will be raped at some point in their lifetime, with 80% of those occurring before the age of 25. There are 10 million women enrolled as college undergraduates in the U.S. right now, and hundreds of thousands of them have been raped.


The well-documented consequences of sexual assault include post-traumatic stress disorder, depression, disordered eating, chronic pain, substance abuse, and sleep disturbances. Women who have been sexually assaulted are over 3 times more likely to have a GPA below 2.5 compared to non-victims, but those who receive proper support go on to be successful students.


There is a critical window of about one month after experiencing a traumatic event like sexual assault where intervention is necessary to prevent the development of PTSD. After a month, the abnormal memory and fear response circuits in the brain that are associated with PTSD get solidified in a way that it can then take years to recover. And while recovery is always possible, we cannot make students wait to get help, because in doing so, we are risking the health of their brain.


We need to have the best resources on college campuses for survivors of sexual assault, and that is something to be proud of. It’s not a source of shame to have a comprehensive, coordinated sexual assault or crisis intervention program, because violence happens all over the world, it’s how you respond to it that defines your character and your integrity.


Impact of the MSU Sexual Assault Program

The MSU Sexual Assault Program responds to those impacted by sexual violence and works to create a community free of violence and oppression by providing counseling and support groups to MSU students, a 24-hour crisis hotline, and medical advocacy services offered to anyone in the greater Lansing community. The Sexual Assault Program has over 150 MSU student, alumni, faculty, and staff volunteers who have completed a 40-hour crisis intervention training program. These dedicated individuals provide essential services to people in need. 


Celebrating its 35th anniversary this year, the MSU Sexual Assault Program is the oldest campus-based program of its kind, and MSU students want to help them celebrate this milestone with a monetary donation.


Impact of the Gift

The Michigan State University Sexual Assault Program, which serves around 500 individuals each year, relies almost entirely on grants and donations, and they are in need of several critical resources to remain at the cutting-edge of helping students in need.

One of the therapists would like to get certified in EMDR therapy, and at the end of my book, I write about how EMDR was a crucial turning point in my recovery. My hope is that more students will have access to this service, but the extensive training for certification is expensive.

Additionally, the Sexual Assault Program would like to build up its resource library with more books and DVDs on healing from trauma, and they would like to have more promotional outreach so more people know these amazing services exist.

With our goal of $10,000, the students will be able to help the MSU Sexual Assault Program implement these resources, which could impact the lives of hundreds of students in need. 


Support

“I think what you show in the trailer depicts a really common experience among survivors. I get goose bumps thinking about how powerful it will be for someone to hear your story and know they’re not alone. That it wasn’t their fault and that they do have worth! Thanks so much for all you do to help survivors and for your support of our program.”

  --Lauren Allswede, LMSW, MSU Sexual Assault Program


“I can think of many clients who will strongly relate to the struggle and hopefully someday the sense of hope.  Thank you for sharing your story so that other people can find the support they need.  And thank you for choosing to help us so that we may help more people.”

--Tana Fedewa, LMSW, MSU Sexual Assault Program


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Use Indiegogo's easy share tools above!
  • Even after this campaign is over, all profits from my book will be donated to the MSU Sexual Assault Program. Buy it here: www.amazon.com/dp/B00SNPQA5I
  • Stay connected with me through Facebook, Twitter, and my blog, The Egghead Agenda
  • Connect with the MSU Sexual Assault Program 
  • Most importantly, if someone trusts you with information about their own assault or abuse, all you have to do is listen to them and believe them.


To all the survivors who have come before us to pave the way to healing, and to those of you who will continue to support this movement, we thank you from the bottom of our hearts.


Note: If you choose to receive a print copy of the book, $8.25 of your gift will go to offset the author's cost of printing and shipping.

If you would like to order a copy of the book directly, you can do so from amazon.com, and I will still donate all the royalties I get from those orders (~$4 per book)! http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00SNPQA5I

story:
The CanDonate Hair Program provides free natural-hair wigs to children under the age of 16 who are diagnosed with cancer and residing in Quebec. This innovative program was launched in 2005 and has since bettered the lives of countless children. Thanks to their main sponsor, RL Moda Wigs, CanDonate receives hair donations of eight inches or more, which are turned into handmade wigs for young cancer patients. The company understands that parents want to give their suffering children the best life has to offer but can’t always afford it. Through the Hair Program, CanDonate reduces the financial burden on parents, while providing children with free natural wigs.

 In order to expand their services, offer more wigs, and help benefit local communities, the CanDonate Hair Program is pleased to announce that they are launching a new support program entitled “A Part of Me.” The title of their program brings true meaning to the concept. When an individual donates their hair, they are truly giving a part of themselves to someone in need. For whatever reason a person decides to participate in the program, each hair donation has an emotional story underneath.The “A Part of Me” event will mark the beginning of an emotional journey into the lives of ten women who go through their experience with cancer. They will discuss the side effects of cancer that aren’t often discuss such as low self-esteem, altered body image, depression, and social anxiety.

 How to take part of the: “A Part of Me” Challenge 

You need to donate 8 inches minimum  of hair and you need to raise 50$ minimum;

(You can still donate money if you don't have the hair length)

You can do it on your own, or organize an event with many people together (such as schools, office/work, friends)

Do you accept the challenge?

story:
Short Summary

Comfort Reliance International is dedicated to being an innovator in the growth and availability of quality healthcare for the average individual living in African countries. 

We accomplish this by developing and implementing mechanisms that will make it easy for Africian citizens living in the US, Canada, and Europe to be able to access private healthcare on behalf of their family members still living in their country of origin. We develop relationships with various organizations that support African Nationals living abroad. We research and identify the most qualified and successful providers in individual countries. We then work with these companies to market affordable private healthcare insurance to the African Diaspora* for their families back home.

We have the potential to garner a substantial portion of the market by driving an untapped flow of western monies into the local economies of African communities. These resources can then help drive the development of improved healthcare for hundreds of thousands of Africans.

We will be concentrating on Ghana as phase one of our African healthcare program.

See our interview with Dr. Efua Commeh, Doctor for the government of Ghana, public health division.


What We Need

We need $800,000.00 US dollars to establish home office facilities in the United States and Satellite offices in Ghana.  Our offices in the United States will be where the main processes take place.  The offices in Ghana will be for local customer service and oversight.

  • These offices will require computers with servers and a strong secure network system.
  • We will need to research and purchase specialized and secure software to process insurance applications and claims. 
  • Initially hire at least 10 employees in the US offices and 5 in our Ghana offices.
  • Provide for Marketing and Service Promotion

By contributing to this effort you will be a vital link in our efforts to improve health care and save lives for a large portion of people in Africa.

What have we done so far?

We have completed target marketing surveys with the Ghana Diaspora*.  We have received positive results in favor of private comprehensive insurance policies.  
We have secured  "Intent to Do Business" contracts with the three largest private insurance companies in Ghana.

The Impact of your donations and support

Your contribution will enable Comfort Reliance to:

  • Begin implementation of the start up process
  • Provide incentives for other entities to become involved in the Diaspora health care program.
  • Bring quality up to date private healthcare services to thousands of Ghanaians who would otherwise be unable to afford such care. 
  • Provide needed financial resources

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/K8RM6umLjPc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>


The Challenges

We face challenges in being able to make sure that this vital care is made available in rural as well as urban areas. For this reason, we will set up Comfort Reliance Satelite Offices dedicated to support and encourage local partners to establish clinics in outlying areas.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with all your facebook and twitter friends.

 "Many hands make light work!"........ John Heywood

Feel free to visit our FAQ Page for more information

*Diaspora: Africans living outside their country of origin
story_txt:
Short Summary 
Comfort Reliance International is dedicated to being an innovator in the growth and availability of quality healthcare for the average individual living in African countries. We accomplish this by developing and implementing mechanisms that will make it easy for Africian citizens living in the US, Canada, and Europe to be able to access private healthcare on behalf of their family members still living in their country of origin. We develop relationships with various organizations that support African Nationals living abroad. We research and identify the most qualified and successful providers in individual countries. We then work with these companies to market affordable private healthcare insurance to the African Diaspora* for their families back home.We have the potential to garner a substantial portion of the market by driving an untapped flow of western monies into the local economies of African communities. These resources can then help drive the development of improved healthcare for hundreds of thousands of Africans.We will be concentrating on Ghana as phase one of our African healthcare program.See our interview with Dr. Efua Commeh, Doctor for the government of Ghana, public health division.

What We Need We need $800,000.00 US dollars to establish home office facilities in the United States and Satellite offices in Ghana.  Our offices in the United States will be where the main processes take place.  The offices in Ghana will be for local customer service and oversight.



These offices will require computers with servers and a strong secure network system.


We will need to research and purchase specialized and secure software to process insurance applications and claims. 

Initially hire at least 10 employees in the US offices and 5 in our Ghana offices.
Provide for Marketing and Service Promotion


By contributing to this effort you will be a vital link in our efforts to improve health care and save lives for a large portion of people in Africa.
    What have we done so far?
We have completed target marketing surveys with the Ghana Diaspora*.  We have received positive results in favor of private comprehensive insurance policies.  
We have secured  "Intent to Do Business" contracts with the three largest private insurance companies in Ghana.
The Impact of your donations and support Your contribution will enable Comfort Reliance to:

Begin implementation of the start up process
Provide incentives for other entities to become involved in the Diaspora health care program.

Bring quality up to date private healthcare services to thousands of Ghanaians who would otherwise be unable to afford such care. 

Provide needed financial resources

story:
Toonfit tech preview available for Android, iOS, Windows and OSX. You can find download links for Google Play and other platforms in our website, more platforms coming soon!

What is toonfit

Toonfit is an exergaming app for kids. Cute cartoons animated directly from personal trainers using latest motion capture tech. Cartoons are considered one of the best possible ways to motivate kids. Toonfit was developed in order to help kids grow up into adults with healthy lifestyle.



Who we are

We are video game developers. We have worked as freelancers making games with Unity the last years, most times cooperating with artists for content. Until we decided to start our own project, toonfit. Due to low initial budget we had to create content on our own. This way we could keep content quality at the level we wanted.

Our first cartoon character is Amanda, a beautiful girl that can convince you and your kids to workout. Our second one is already in final stages of design and is an action robot. We want to add variety of cartoons so that kids can choose their favorite. Kids cannot resist cartoons and exergaming experiences. We are going to need more people, like 3d artists and animators to work for us.

Now that we have reached the end of the first and most important development phase, it is time to ask for support from the awesome audience of Indiegogo.

What you get

Supporting our campaign will bring an incomparable experience to your kids. They will be able to enjoy magnificent workout sets and nutrition tips along with funny and engaging achievements and mini games. All these combined with multilingual menus and voices, workout timers, calorie counter, adaptive variable difficulty, smartwatch sync(depends on platform), parental control and performance graphs/history. The final result will deliver a unique synthesis of features never offered again in the fitness/exergaming software category. All perks include 1 year subscription, valid after the official release of toonfit, plus access to our beta phase that starts after the end of the campaign. 

 That is an amazing bargain! Toonfit subscription cost is only a very small fraction of what gym classes for kids cost. Average gym subscription costs from 25 up to 60 times more! Just grab the opportunity to make kids happy and healthy for a very low price!



What we need

To accomplish our goal we need a few things which could not fit in our initial budget, things like: expensive motion capture equipment, developer equipment, IT equipment(workstations), 3d artists, audio/music, voice actors and translations. You can also see our "estimated funds allocation" infographic below:


Why we decided to develop toonfit

 Childhood obesity is one of the most serious public health challenges of the 21st century. The prevalence is increasing at an alarming rate globally. Furthermore on average at least 50% of overweight and obese children remain overweight as  adults. 


Can we deliver all features?

 Dianysma Interactive is comprised of passionate developers that always deliver results in a professional manner. That does not mean there are no limits. Lack of resources can hold a project back. So we can deliver features only in case we reach certain stretch goals. Support us and share our project as much as you can!

About toonfit pro
Do you have an indoor playground or own a gym? Are you a personal trainer? Are you a store or mall owner with young clients? We got you covered! Keep them happy and healthy with toonfit pro. Kids cannot resist exergaming experiences!


Thank you for visiting our project campaign. 

Keep kids happy, fit and healthy!


Indiegogo  campaign short link:  http://igg.me/at/toonfit

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/toonfit  and https://twitter.com/Dianysma_Int

Facebook pages:  www.facebook.com/Dianysma-Interactive-1718847461683608

and :  www.facebook.com/Toonfit-158180274548964

story:
Short Summary

My family, close friends and myself are on a mission to raise as much money as possible for cancer research. Not only this, but we want to give something back to one of the most amazing and inspirational person to ever have known, my auntie Angie (banjo) 

Both me and my mum are doing a sky dive which will cost around £500 to take part in. This money has to be paid by donations which ALL of this money that we raise be donated to our chosen charity of The Marlets Hospice, so please get donating as it is such an incredible charity. The skydive company we will be using is UK sky dive. It is £50 deposit which we individually pay and then a £250 payment. However this payment will be sent to our chosen charity through the UK skydive company. 

The martlets looks after adults who have distressing symptoms associated with serious illness. Martlets has been a charity which hits close to home as it helps cancer patients with support for both them and families. A seriously ill patient may visit the hospice which the hospice proves the best quality care and support. The charity registration number is 802145.

Please please donate, as it is going to such a great cause. A sky dive is a massive and scary thing, which everyone who knows my auntie will know she would want us to go all the way and push ourselves out of our comfort zones. So this is what we are doing! 

Cancer effects 1/8 people and with your help of donating we can really make a difference as this money will help incredibly towards the Martlets hospice.

We are not asking for 10's or 100's of pounds.. Even 1 pound or 50p will be a great help! 

Please get this word around and make some noise about this campaign, as our main aim is to raise as much money as we can! 

Thank you for reading! Let's go kick cancers butt!!!

story:
Hello and thank you for taking the time to look at the STL ( Sound to Light ) stethoscope project. My name is Jerry Cunningham and together you and I have an opportunity to improve the lives of many.

     The STL stethoscope is a sound activated L.E.D  visual cue of your heartbeat in real time. This will allow anyone with a hearing impairment or not, to be better equipped to take on their duties in the medical field.

     As children, most of us had been told we can do anything we set our minds to. What if this was not your case? What if you wanted to be a doctor, a physician assistant, a nurse or any type of career that requires hearing a heart beat. What if you had some kind of hearing impairment? Tasks like learning how to hear and decipher a heartbeat are especially challenging. 

     What  if there was such a device that allowed the user to exchange the audio cue for a visual cue? New doors and avenues may have just been opened for that person who never dreamed they could make it through the process of being a doctor or nurse with a hearing impairment.

      Use of the STL stethoscope is almost identical to a standard acoustic version. With an on off switch you have the control of when to look flashy. The STL is also compatible with a rechargeable power source keeping your STL stethoscope sustainable.

     The STL stethoscope will help facilitate a positive relationship between children and the pediatric staff.  Involving the child in hearing their very own heart beat can engage them and relax them. 

    Inevitably society continues to progress and evolve, technology has allowed us to eliminate  countless adversities such as an amputee being able to walk for the fist time in years. Such a milestone  is only accomplished by help from technology. But as with most things, new technology tends to be very expensive and hard to obtain.   

       As a  community we owe it to each other to share this knowledge. With the STL stethoscope we can offset such financial burden associated with brand new technology. Producing the STL stethoscope will cost a fraction of the cost of products such as an amplified stethoscope.

     Helpful donations from you will allow us to transform this early working  prototype into a refined piece of medical equipment. With your assistance we will upgrade the microphone, convert the stethoscope from L.E.D to electric wire which will consume less power extending the life cycle of the batteries,enclose the processor into the stethoscope and upgrade to a rechargeable power source. All funds procured in this campaign will be used for affordable production of the STL stethoscope allowing us to keep cost down making this affordable for all income individuals. Our production date is set for Summer 2016 and with your help is will be achevable.

     Health care is a right, not a privilege and together we can help the STL Project achieve new heights by producing a low cost sustainable medical device that will be affordable for users all over the world. 

     Many moments of greatness are derived from  humble  beginnings. With your help we can light up the future for individuals looking to excel in the medical field.

Hello and thank you for taking the time to look at my (STL) Sound to Light Stethoscope project. My name is Jerry Cunningham and this idea has been a longtime coming for me. In 2002 I found myself awoken from a deep sleep. No one was in my apartment, it was quiet on my street, so why was I awake? At that precise moment I had a barrage of information clawing to escape my mind and be brought to life. At 3:13 am I began to write down what i was thinking. 3 hours later I had drawn in detail my vision for something. It was a Stethoscope that had lights inside it allowing the user to receive a rhythmic visual Cue of how there heart looked in real time. In 2002 bringing this invention to life had turned out to be all but impossible.  After thousands of dollars and misleads by an invention firm, I found myself no further ahead than I was in the beginning. L.E.D'S at the time were not being used in every day products as they are today. After 13 years and attempt after attempt. In 2015 I found myself between jobs and had 3 days before starting at a new place of employment. During my transition between jobs, I thought about my invention and felt it was now or never to attempt another prototype. With a 2 year old running around now, time has instantly became a luxury. on the second day of three I had a break through in creating my prototype. Six months after that I saw on my local news, a story about a product that was launched using a website called Indiegogo.com The news excerpt was not lengthy but it contained enough information to reinvigorate my passion for this gift which I dubbed the (STL project).    From  humble  beginnings full of disrepair and frustration I had finally done it! What was previously not in existence, now has a life of its own. Like a child, with the right support and encouragement from friends and family this idea too has no limits in what it may accomplish.

story:
Brief Explanation of the Thyroid Gland

Thyroid hormone is needed by every cell in your body.

Hypothyroidism is at epidemic levels, but most people with symptoms have never been diagnosed. Experts have estimated that between 40% to 80% of the population has undiagnosed hypothyroidism. Most doctors do not have the time to research, and therefore they simply apply the recommendations they have been taught at medical school. (incorrect teaching).

The thyroid gland is indispensable for the body's metabolism. Slow metabolism, (and sometimes an increased metabolism), is the underlying cause of dozens of common health issues, yet doctors don't understand the relevance of altered metabolism. In turn, patients are frustrated by years and years of treatment with no, or little, positive resolution to their symptoms.

Digital Mini-Books

This series of digital mini-books will give sufferers concise, yet complete, explanations for their dysfunctional thyroid gland, how they can evaluate their thyroid condition, and what they can do proactively, (without drugs), to recover. It will translate medical terminology into explanations that most non-technical people can understand.

Who is Keith Nixon?

Simply a dedicated health researcher, with a passion for natural, inexpensive and effective solutions to most health issues. I recognise that everyone must be treated as an individual, and many personal circumstances and environmental conditions may impact one person's response when another person is not affected. This is where a complete and intimate analysis of each sufferer's personal timeline and environment can  uncover key mitigating factors. (For instance, a trip to a South American country can result in parasites, resulting in episodes of sweating, which could be mistaken for an overactive thyroid condition).

 My personal philosophy is that I have been blessed with a passion for knowledge, and a clarity of thought that allows me to take in many conflicting health propositions and evaluate them to decide "Is this logical? Is this likely? Has this been supported by real-life cases? etc".

And I feel that God has blessed me not just for my own benefit, but so that I may be a blessing to others. And as you read some of the unsolicited feedback below, I know that many have been blessed, even if "blessing" may not be the word that they might use to express their feelings.

I have enjoyed 66 years of good health, and constantly am frustrated when confronted by stories of health traumas of people who have never been taught about how to live strong, productive, and healthy lives. Like, for instance, the key role of stomach acid in the scheme of things. (Low stomach acid can lead to allergies, asthma, and autoimmune diseases, where your immune system cannot distinguish between "self" and "non-self" proteins. And stomach acid is critical in making thyroid hormone).

Campaign Goals 

This campaign is aimed at gathering the results of my earlier research into a comprehensive but easily understood series of digital mini-books, with defined, logical steps out of the thyroid maze (and diabetes maze). There is hope for sufferers to be able to enjoy a healthful, productive, and long life.

The campaign will allow this vital information to be more widely distributed, and will provide a sound platform for later extending thyroid knowledge via books, booklets, websites, etc.

Help me to help you and to help others.

I need at least $5,000 to speed up the production of this series of mini-books.

In the event that The campaign doesn't reach it's entire goal, then unused funds will go to Southern Cross Kids Camps in Victoria, Australia, a charity helping kids from 7 to 11 years old that have been disadvantaged, abused, or at risk of abuse. I have been a "buddy" on these camps for at least 14 years, and have been excited to experience the changes in kids attitudes and behaviours within as little as 5 days, simply from the kids experiencing someone who cares about them as a person. I encourage you to consider contributing via the specific perk listed in this campaign. 

What Is The Potential Impact?

Do a simple search on "thyroid years" and read some of the webpages. Or search for "thyroid discussion", or experiment yourself in searches for "thyroid". This exercise will immediately provide a multitude of stories from sufferers who have been "round and round" the traditional medical circus for years, and who are often confused by inconsistent, and ineffective, advice.

This series of mini-books provides clear, complete, and simple protocols, a good proportion of which can be undertaken at home, supplemented by professional testing, dental specialists, etc. 

Potentially, there could be well in excess of 500 million sufferers, with most having no idea of their condition, and no idea of which tissues, organs, and systems may by also be affected. (For instance, why am I cold all the time? Why can't I lose weight?).

What Can I Expect?

This series of digital mini-books is the key to the understanding of, and recovery from, thyroid dysfunction. It will describe issues in non-medical terms wherever possible, and will provide a clear and workable recovery path. And it will provide the references justifying each of the steps in the "Seven Steps" protocol, and a printable "Cheat Sheet" providing sufferers with a visual aid to progress, incorporating a timeline, a written record of the results of periodical blood tests, and a written record of your symptoms as they change over time.

It is also intended that contributors be provided with a printable "How To Diagnose Thyroid Disorders" sheet, and a printable "Detox and Diet" sheet for their own recovery journey, 

These three sheets will be able to be freely copied and passed on to others that may also have thyroid symptoms, or have a health challenge that their doctor doesn't know how to treat. (In such cases the doctor simply says "of unknown etiology" which means "I haven't got a clue")

And the doctor simply runs blood tests , and then their patient that their "Thyroid is Normal"

Initial contributors will also be given an digital copy of research into "Flushing Gallstones Naturally" - another "epidemic" health problem in western society, and a key element of restoring proper thyroid gland function.

Many people have benefited from my earlier health research, and my straightforward explanations. Here are some of their comments from a Facebook health group with over 12,000 members worldwide. I do not know these people personally.

Unsolicited Comments

September, 2015 - From Katie

  • Keith Nixon we love you. I just learned so much. Can you tell us more about the thermometer method for determining thyroid? I am crazy cold forever and have horror gut that I'm in the process of fixing (!) but my naturopath said all my thyroid results are fine although I know for sure my adrenals are certainly not!! So doesn't add up huh according to your explainer.

November, 2015 - From Jack

  • Keith as usual, you are an asset of knowledge and power to heal to all of us. Thank you for being with this group. I am sure I speak on behalf of everyone in the group.

    Paul, you are very right....all these MDs studying hard for years only to find out that someone with common sense has a much more practical, efficient cheap solution to a medical paradigm. The higher education the EGO has at its disposal, the harder it is to accept the truth. I learned to understand that recently.

April, 2016 - From Marilyn

Thank you Keith for sharing this vital information which every obstetrician , GP ,fertility clinic should be made aware of. Myself being a midwife for 40yrs & fertility awareness educator have seen multiple infertile couples. Successful pregnancies have been achieved with Vit b12 supplementation.

___________

Jackie/Simon

  • If only doctors had the wisdom and thorough understanding of Keith Nixon. His postings may be long but he covers all that you need to know.  Best wishes. Simon.--------
  • Keith Nixon you are great. That section on fibro was awesome!

Brooke

  • A wealth of knowledge!!! Thank you so much Keith Nixon!!!

Moniker 24/4/2015

  • Thank you Keith Nixon, you're a good man and much appreciated. 

8/4/2015 Kate

  • Me too. I like your posts Keith. You obviously have done an amazing amount of research

Kate

  • What a fascinating post this is. I will test this on clients and see how they react. Thank you too Keith! ☺️

Jenny

  • Thank you Keith Nixon you give beyond giving what a kind person you are and you also do so without EGO which is from your heart this is even more special xoxoxo 

Elizabeth

  • Thanks Keith your a star

Jade 9/6/2015

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk for not completing this campaign is if I become incapacitated. I am fit and healthy at 66, and have an all-consuming passion for educating people of better ways to good health. 

Having now retired, my time availability has expanded, and I anticipate a reasonably quick finalisation to this campaign.

Progress So Far

The following list will provide contributors an appreciation of how I have been progressing prior to the launch of this Indiegogo campaign,

  • Accumulated 1,000 documents (Microsoft Word) covering Thyroid and other health issues.
  • Purchased website “Thyroidathome.com”
  • Reserved Facebook Group name “Thyroidathome”
  • Purchased web development software
  • Purchased software for producing “digital books”
  • Created digital book (50xA4 pages) being an "overview” (now complete) of thyroid diagnosis and treatment
  • Commenced the accumulation of data for Step 1 of 7-Step protocol (50% complete)
  • Commenced the accumulation of data for Step 2 of 7-Step protocol (50% complete)
  • Commenced the accumulation of data for Step 3 of 7-Step protocol (50% complete)
  • Created 40xA4 page document concerning diabetes and the thyroid connection
  • Commenced website development (30 web pages complete)
  • Conducted two public health information sessions.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still participate in this campaign:

1) send me comments of encouragement. (thyroidathome@gmail.com)

2) tell me your story, healthwise, (thyroidathome@gmail.com)

3) tell others of this campaign, particularly friends and acquaintances that may be experiencing thyroid, adrenal or health issues that their medical practitioner just can't provide answers for.,

4) post a comment or a link on your Facebook timeline.

5) Visit thyroidathome.com

Use the indiegogo share tools when you can.

story_txt:
Brief Explanation of the Thyroid Gland
Thyroid hormone is needed by every cell in your body.
Hypothyroidism is at epidemic levels, but most people with symptoms have never been diagnosed. Experts have estimated that between 40% to 80% of the population has undiagnosed hypothyroidism. Most doctors do not have the time to research, and therefore they simply apply the recommendations they have been taught at medical school. (incorrect teaching).
The thyroid gland is indispensable for the body's metabolism. Slow metabolism, (and sometimes an increased metabolism), is the underlying cause of dozens of common health issues, yet doctors don't understand the relevance of altered metabolism. In turn, patients are frustrated by years and years of treatment with no, or little, positive resolution to their symptoms.
Digital Mini-Books
This series of digital mini-books will give sufferers concise, yet complete, explanations for their dysfunctional thyroid gland, how they can evaluate their thyroid condition, and what they can do proactively, (without drugs), to recover. It will translate medical terminology into explanations that most non-technical people can understand.
Who is Keith Nixon?
Simply a dedicated health researcher, with a passion for natural, inexpensive and effective solutions to most health issues. I recognise that everyone must be treated as an individual, and many personal circumstances and environmental conditions may impact one person's response when another person is not affected. This is where a complete and intimate analysis of each sufferer's personal timeline and environment can  uncover key mitigating factors. (For instance, a trip to a South American country can result in parasites, resulting in episodes of sweating, which could be mistaken for an overactive thyroid condition).
 My personal philosophy is that I have been blessed with a passion for knowledge, and a clarity of thought that allows me to take in many conflicting health propositions and evaluate them to decide "Is this logical? Is this likely? Has this been supported by real-life cases? etc".
And I feel that God has blessed me not just for my own benefit, but so that I may be a blessing to others. And as you read some of the unsolicited feedback below, I know that many have been blessed, even if "blessing" may not be the word that they might use to express their feelings.
I have enjoyed 66 years of good health, and constantly am frustrated when confronted by stories of health traumas of people who have never been taught about how to live strong, productive, and healthy lives. Like, for instance, the key role of stomach acid in the scheme of things. (Low stomach acid can lead to allergies, asthma, and autoimmune diseases, where your immune system cannot distinguish between "self" and "non-self" proteins. And stomach acid is critical in making thyroid hormone).
Campaign Goals 
This campaign is aimed at gathering the results of my earlier research into a comprehensive but easily understood series of digital mini-books, with defined, logical steps out of the thyroid maze (and diabetes maze). There is hope for sufferers to be able to enjoy a healthful, productive, and long life.
The campaign will allow this vital information to be more widely distributed, and will provide a sound platform for later extending thyroid knowledge via books, booklets, websites, etc.
Help me to help you and to help others.

I need at least $5,000 to speed up the production of this series of mini-books.
In the event that The campaign doesn't reach it's entire goal, then unused funds will go to Southern Cross Kids Camps in Victoria, Australia, a charity helping kids from 7 to 11 years old that have been disadvantaged, abused, or at risk of abuse. I have been a "buddy" on these camps for at least 14 years, and have been excited to experience the changes in kids attitudes and behaviours within as little as 5 days, simply from the kids experiencing someone who cares about them as a person. I encourage you to consider contributing via the specific perk listed in this campaign. 

What Is The Potential Impact?
Do a simple search on "thyroid years" and read some of the webpages. Or search for "thyroid discussion", or experiment yourself in searches for "thyroid". This exercise will immediately provide a multitude of stories from sufferers who have been "round and round" the traditional medical circus for years, and who are often confused by inconsistent, and ineffective, advice.
This series of mini-books provides clear, complete, and simple protocols, a good proportion of which can be undertaken at home, supplemented by professional testing, dental specialists, etc. 
Potentially, there could be well in excess of 500 million sufferers, with most having no idea of their condition, and no idea of which tissues, organs, and systems may by also be affected. (For instance, why am I cold all the time? Why can't I lose weight?).
What Can I Expect?
This series of digital mini-books is the key to the understanding of, and recovery from, thyroid dysfunction. It will describe issues in non-medical terms wherever possible, and will provide a clear and workable recovery path. And it will provide the references justifying each of the steps in the "Seven Steps" protocol, and a printable "Cheat Sheet" providing sufferers with a visual aid to progress, incorporating a timeline, a written record of the results of periodical blood tests, and a written record of your symptoms as they change over time.
It is also intended that contributors be provided with a printable "How To Diagnose Thyroid Disorders" sheet, and a printable "Detox and Diet" sheet for their own recovery journey, 
These three sheets will be able to be freely copied and passed on to others that may also have thyroid symptoms, or have a health challenge that their doctor doesn't know how to treat. (In such cases the doctor simply says "of unknown etiology" which means "I haven't got a clue")
And the doctor simply runs blood tests , and then their patient that their "Thyroid is Normal"
Initial contributors will also be given an digital copy of research into "Flushing Gallstones Naturally" - another "epidemic" health problem in western society, and a key element of restoring proper thyroid gland function.
Many people have benefited from my earlier health research, and my straightforward explanations. Here are some of their comments from a Facebook health group with over 12,000 members worldwide. I do not know these people personally.
Unsolicited Comments
September, 2015 - From Katie
Keith Nixon we love you. I just learned so much. Can you tell us more about the thermometer method for determining thyroid? I am crazy cold forever and have horror gut that I'm in the process of fixing (!) but my naturopath said all my thyroid results are fine although I know for sure my adrenals are certainly not!! So doesn't add up huh according to your explainer.
November, 2015 - From Jack
Keith as usual, you are an asset of knowledge and power to heal to all of us. Thank you for being with this group. I am sure I speak on behalf of everyone in the group.Paul, you are very right....all these MDs studying hard for years only to find out that someone with common sense has a much more practical, efficient cheap solution to a medical paradigm. The higher education the EGO has at its disposal, the harder it is to accept the truth. I learned to understand that recently.
April, 2016 - From Marilyn
Thank you Keith for sharing this vital information which every obstetrician , GP ,fertility clinic should be made aware of. Myself being a midwife for 40yrs & fertility awareness educator have seen multiple infertile couples. Successful pregnancies have been achieved with Vit b12 supplementation.
___________
Jackie/Simon

If only doctors had the wisdom and thorough understanding of Keith Nixon. His postings may be long but he covers all that you need to know.  Best wishes. Simon.--------

story:
C'est l'histoire de deux jeunes français ayant fait le choix d'immigrer au Canada pour s'épanouir sur le plan professionnel. Après avoir entraîné ensemble un groupe d'adolescents faisant partie d'un programme utilisant le basket-ball comme outil d'intervention psychosocial afin de lutter contre le décrochage scolaire, les deux collègues ont développé une complicité les ayant encouragé à démarrer cette aventure entrepreneuriale. 

Conscients du stress omniprésent en milieu de travail, Rémy et Ken se sont donnés comme mission de prendre en main la santé et le bien-être des employés d'entreprises. Ainsi est né INCsport. 

Plusieurs études ont démontré les bienfaits du sport sur le rendement au travail. Un employé faisant de l'activité physique peut être jusqu'à 12% plus productif qu'un employé sédentaire. 

L'entreprise propose des cours de Yoga, Pilatès, Zumba et bien plus encore, selon les désirs des clients. De plus, pas besoin d'investir dans du matériel pour les entrainements! Tout ce qu'il vous faut, c'est votre tenue de sport et votre bouteille d'eau! Nous nous contentons de peu et ferons avec les moyens du bord. Peu importe la place disponible, votre condition physique ou votre budget, INCsport s'adapte à vous! D'où le slogan "l'entrainement sur mesure"... Le sport, c'est nous!

story:
We have been working on AID LOCK for one and a half year now. We always knew that the path from an idea to the final product wouldn't be easy, and that it would require something more than just hard work.

Each one of us took this project personaly and showed not just skills and high professionalism but passion too. A passion that held us strong and proved us as a team.

Honestly, the ride was rough, even a couple of times we trashed everything and started from the scratch but we listened, we learned and we adapted. The challenges we faced didn't break us down but helped us to improve and build what you see today. A strong and steady product, with a clear message and a course.

The process of developing a platform as complicated and wide as AID LOCK, isn't only costly but time consuming too. Time, we stole from our families and friends. To prove dedication and independency, we have so far funded this project with our own resources and taken all the risks. Now we ask not only for your financial support but for you to be a part of AID LOCK and help us to build the feature with your priceless feedbacks. Help us to help others.

Thanks,

- Momchil Burmov CO-founder.

- Morten Einar Weberg CO-founder.

 

If you pay an extra attention you will see some of the Perks-items in the videos. New videos will come and new design/items will follow.

Print options, design, sizes, colors, etc. you can choose after the end of the campaign.

Designs are in progress, more will come soon.

Feedback on design will be helpful!

 

PRINT OPTIONS APPLIES ON T-SHIRTS AND HOODIES ONLY!

 

Flat Peak caps in American premium acrylic. Structured with 6 panels and flat peak with snapback pro sticker. Snapback pro plastic buckle.

 

 

Sunglasses with colored rods, UV400, protection filter Category 3

story:
What is Sips by™?

Sips by™ is the world's most passionate (and data-driven) matchmaker for wellness seekers, tea lovers, and the tea curious. Our special sauce? Sommelier created preference algorithms, and a whole lot of hustle. Our near-term mission is to make discovering premium teas fun, personalized, and affordable.

Sips by™️ recently launched its subscription + eCom platform that leverages preference algorithms to identify and de-mystify a subscriber's ability to explore premium teas they'll love, from brands around the world. The algorithm is non-fixed, and adjusts based on a customer's reviews of the products they sample. It takes the ambiguous flavor profiles that sommeliers know to identify, and places them in the back-end of an easy-to-follow front-end for product recommendations.

Who's behind Sips by™?

Hi! We're the Sips by team in Austin, Texas (Staci, Mel, Laina). Staci has been a tea hobbiest for years, and was growing frustrated at not knowing how to discover new teas and brands without spending more money than what she’d like. She searched for a subscription service that would let her sample different teas based on her known preferences but couldn’t find one. She has a background in eCommerce, and a passion for tea and daily wellness. Mel is formally trained in tea, and definitely the tea-geekiest of the bunch. She works with brand partners to source all the products you'll love. Laina is our resident foodie, marketer, Instagram-aholic, and major tea enthusiast to boot. We're all involved in various aspects behind the day-to-day of Sips by's business. 

Why IndieGogo?

With the help of a few friends and industry experts, we launched Sips by’s personalized tea discovery service at the beginning of this year. We built a preference-algorithm and order fulfillment system, established relationships with over 75 brands, and shipped out over 5,000 boxes. While we're proud of these feathers in our cap, running a slim margin business has been limiting on sourcing capital needed to invest in marketing, graphic and technical design, and product warehousing and fulfillment.

How can you help?

We’d love to keep sharing the world of tea with you, but we need your help to scale. Please support our passion to help you discover teas you’ll love from different brands around the world - and help us spread the word with your tea loving friends and family!

 

Personalized Tea Discovery

 
    
   
 

What Our Customers Say...

 

Unboxing with World Tea Podcast

story:
The Lifeina Team

We are scientists, engineers, medical experts, patients, but mostly we are just nice guys who all know someone, somewhere, who has a disease such as diabetes, multiple sclerosis or Crohn's Disease. We just want to make their life a little better.

 

Specs and FAQ

You'll find all the answers to your questions on the Lifeina website

 https://www.lifeina.com

Help us to change the future !!

We need your help for manufacturing. We have spent the last couple of years conducting research alongside engineers, doctors and patients to design a product perfect for you. Our goal is to facilitate healthcare and improve the general well-being of people using our products. We now need your help to go into full production.

story:
About Scotch Porter

Everyone deserves a seat at the table. When one isn’t offered, sometimes you have to make your own, the principles of the American Dream tells us such. We’ve been making handcrafted quality grooming goods, with hand selected ingredients, right here in the U.S. since 2015 and we don’t plan on stopping anytime soon.

What We Need & What You Get

To date, we've developed a line that takes your style to the next level, and as the saying goes, when you're looking good you're feeling good. That's why here at Scotch Porter we are always looking for a way to keep you looking and feeling good.

We launched our Fresh Meat Line with that exact reason in mind. Because we know that meat shouldn’t be anything other than fresh. Our innovative line is the solution to the funk below your belt. The scent is masculine so whether you are a Salami or a Vienna Sausage, this man-sized, flushable & dispersable wipe can keep your goods in check.

We're now on the heels of launching our Mineral Enriched Body Care Collection and want to extend some exquisite packages that our amazing team put together. With the funds we raise we will be able to take our company to the next level with more products to keep you looking and feeling good.

 

A Bunch of Nice Things For Your Body Collection

Your body and skin deserve nice things. Things that leave it exfoliated and moisturized. Things with no sulfates, things that keep it soft. Everybody likes nice things. We like being ahead of the ‘nice things’ curve, so we’ve got a collection that will leave your skin on cloud 9 - The Scotch Porter Mineral Enriched Body Collection – or as we like to call it, the “A Bunch of Nice Things For Your Body” collection. Fortified with a fermented, bio-active mineral complex of Copper, Zinc, Iron, Silicon and Magnesium that conditions and strengthens skin.

  • Mineral Enriched Refreshing Body Wash (aka "Your Body Says Thank You")
  • Mineral Enriched Exfoliating Body Scrub (aka "A Scrub You Can Be Proud Of")
  • Mineral & Botanical Enriched Refreshing Body Bar (aka "A Better Body Bar")
  • Mineral Enriched Hydro Defense Body Lotion (aka "Your Lotion: Upgraded")

 

Challenges

What started in a barbershop in New Jersey, inspired by trips Calvin Quallis took with his mother to her  barbershop/salon, has now branched off into 70,000+ served and satisfied customers But, we need your help. Unlike some of the bigger names sharing space in the category, we’re dedicated to crafting products with none of the “nasties”: NO Parabens, NO Sulfates, NO Phthalates, NO Synthetic Colors, NO Petroleum, NO Mineral Oil. What we do have is a lot of heart and a lot of TLC added to each and every batch of product that leaves our warehouse, and enters your home.

Healthy, non-toxic and truly effective products that are safe for men, is our priority. We want men of all shapes, sizes and colors to be their best. We believe when men look and FEEL good, they can do good - they can be a better father, a better husband, a better human. And, this is where you come in…

Spread the Word

This Indiegogo campaign will not only help us reach a larger audience, it will also help us spread our message of awesome living all over the world. We want to help men reach their fullest potential...and maybe have them smell really good along the way. We hope you’ll join us!

Can't contribute but know someone who might? Please take a few minutes of your time to spread the word of Scotch Porter on social media & share our Indiegogo page. Be sure to tag @ScotchPorter #ScotchPorter #SPIndiegogo
