Mineral Enriched Exfoliating Body Scrub (aka "A Scrub You Can Be Proud Of")
Mineral & Botanical Enriched Refreshing Body Bar (aka "A Better Body Bar")
Mineral Enriched Hydro Defense Body Lotion (aka "Your Lotion: Upgraded")



 
Challenges
What started in a barbershop in New Jersey, inspired by trips Calvin Quallis took with his mother to her  barbershop/salon, has now branched off into 70,000+ served and satisfied customers But, we need your help. Unlike some of the bigger names sharing space in the category, we’re dedicated to crafting products with none of the “nasties”: NO Parabens, NO Sulfates, NO Phthalates, NO Synthetic Colors, NO Petroleum, NO Mineral Oil. What we do have is a lot of heart and a lot of TLC added to each and every batch of product that leaves our warehouse, and enters your home.
Healthy, non-toxic and truly effective products that are safe for men, is our priority. We want men of all shapes, sizes and colors to be their best. We believe when men look and FEEL good, they can do good - they can be a better father, a better husband, a better human. And, this is where you come in…

Spread the Word
This Indiegogo campaign will not only help us reach a larger audience, it will also help us spread our message of awesome living all over the world. We want to help men reach their fullest potential...and maybe have them smell really good along the way. We hope you’ll join us!
Can't contribute but know someone who might? Please take a few minutes of your time to spread the word of Scotch Porter on social media & share our Indiegogo page. Be sure to tag @ScotchPorter #ScotchPorter #SPIndiegogo

story:
IMPACT 50-0 is guaranteed to supply you with a fun total-body workout with a combination of running, jabs, and hooks. Even if you're a beginner, IMPACT 50-0 will increase your self-defense skills and burn fat faster than traditional treadmills. Quickly build strength and stamina like a 12- round boxer.

 

Simply select the "Training" or "Rounds" mode, then adjust your preferred training level (options 1 – 12). You can also adjust the incline and training duration.

Get the most engaging workout! Different color lights will indicate different reactions – yellow requires a defensive punch, green represents an open shot and you have to hit designated pads in time. If you didn't react on time, a red light will show you’ve been hit - making IMPACT 50-0 a fun and truly interactive cardio workout!

Throughout all the different difficulty stages, you can adjust your speed and the number of rounds you desire. This customization equips you to build up your strength and endurance - training just like a professional fighter!

After you set up your preferred fitness routine, the IMPACT 50-0 will develop new workouts to align with your current pace and abilities. All data is recorded to provide a detailed report of your progress. Results will include heart rate, calories burned, and distance traveled.

 

The IMPACT 50-0 protects your body from high-impact traditional cardio exercises, such as running and sprinting on pavement that can be hard on your body. The belt on the base IMPACT 50-0 comes equipped with shock absorption technology, which helps to reduce the force your body takes in your joints and spine in your cardio workouts day after day.

 

User progress is tracked and easily viewable - such as distance covered, calories burned, heart rate, and even your boxing ability is tracked and recorded. IMPACT 50-0 also offers an incline setting which allows for consistent "uphill" training, which adds another level of difficulty. This is not always available when relying on conventional treadmills.  

 

Start off with level 1 training selection and work your way up to the stamina of a 12- round boxer!

The IMPACT 50-0 machine is designed to be your in-home personal boxing and cardio trainer. Set up an exercise regime on your own terms and push yourself further than you thought possible!

Cardio stats and data will be recorded to provide you with a detailed report of your progress from each workout. Results will include heart rate, calories burned, and distance traveled. 

 

As former boxer and boxing trainer with over 15 years of experience, Robert Coles has developed multiple prototypes and products which have gained national recognition. Robert is confident that IMPACT 50-0 is the ultimate solution for in-home cardio training. He also believes that the experience of boxing combined with cardio training greatly enhances endurance, fitness, dexterity, and self-defense. Even total beginners can quickly see the benefits of using this unique training device. IMPACT 50-0 is just one of the many fitness inventions Robert has developed over the years that creates fun solutions that work for beginners to advanced athletes.

 

Delroy ("Del") is the general manager of Anytime Fitness in Somerset and Franklin township in New Jersey. Del has an MBA in finance and worked on Wall Street as an Auditor for over 10 years. He has transformed his vast financial knowledge and management experience into a successful 20-year career in the fitness industry. His fitness industry experiences include roles as a fitness director, personal trainer, competitive bodybuilder, and numerous club management positions. He is very adept at strength training, conditioning, circuit training, weight loss, and helping all ages achieve their best health and fitness goals. Del is well known for his trademark smile and is always eager to share his enthusiasm, motivational techniques and vast knowledge of fitness. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The ownership realizes and is blatantly aware of the risks and challenges associated with producing and distributing IMPACT 50-0. We are continuously searching for production and distribution channels that are reliable, reduce risk, and offer a better cost-benefit ratio. Although our search is primarily concentrated in the continental US, we are open to other global markets. 


We are in full control of all legal rights, molds, and patterns pertaining to IMPACT 50-0. Therefore, we are strongly positioned to respond to delays and production inconsistencies in the foreseeable future.

story:
YogiRu is excited to introduce eco-friendly, anti-slip yoga mats in 4 tropical themed prints: Taro Leaves, Blue Leaves & Ohias, Lavender Hibiscus and Dark Palms.

Made from 100% natural tree rubber, our yoga mats give you the satisfaction of a yoga mat towel in one. The innovative micro-fiber suede top surface provides additional grip and absorption as you sweat so your mat stays put.

At 4mm, it's the perfect thickness to support you through a variety of workouts from hot yoga, pilates, barre and more. Don't be afraid to work your mat hard! You can easily clean it before or after use with  our Revitalize + Refresh, YogiRu Natural Yoga Mat Spray by Embyr Oils or machine wash for an extra clean feel.

Design Inspo

We partnered with graphic artist Marieanne Morency, @TheTropicalArtist, to create this unique and colorful yoga mat collection. Marieanne found her passion for the tropics and tropical fauna while exploring places like Hawaii, Mauritius and Reunion Island.

Don’t keep your mat hanging - we’ve designed matching yoga leggings to go with the tropical mat collection!

Impact

Your contribution to this Indiegogo campaign will enable us to collect pre-orders for our new yoga mat collection, help us improve the design and manufacturing process of our existing yoga leggings and allow us to expand into new product categories in the future.

Any donation, large or small and even a share on social will go a long way.

Thanks again for your support!

Thanks again for your support!

story:
System for Optimizing Brain Performance
Proven HEG technology  

Tablet, headband and earphones
Virtual coach 

 

 


How It Works

Brain Advantage uses patented HEG (hemoencephalography) technology to measure the amount of oxygen in the blood that's flowing to the prefrontal cortex of your brain. The prefrontal cortex is nicknamed the Executive Center of your brain because it helps to manage all all the various emotions and thoughts that can be going on at once. And the better you manage things here, the better your brain performs.

At the core of Brain Advantage are tiny HEG sensors embedded in the headband directly against your prefrontal cortex. These sensors help determine how focused you are by measuring the oxygen in the blood as it flows to that part of the brain– and that information is instantly fed back to you through the visuals on the tablet, as well as audio cues. Before long, your brain figures out how to increase the amount of oxygenated blood flowing to this region of the brain. The greater the flow of oxygenated blood, the better that portion of your brain performs. The improvements, which can be dramatic, are there to stay.

We know our system works and will work for you. But we want you to know it’s working, too. In order to do this, we’re including a robust assessment tool that allows you to measure just how well your brain’s Executive Center is working.

 

Why HEG is better than EEG-based systems

The patented HEG technology in Brain Advantage is what makes it superior to
other EEG-based training systems. As opposed to measuring oxygen, EEG-based systems rely on tiny electrical signals for biofeedback. This means they are very prone to mistaking muscle movement, twitching, and even eye blinking for brain activity. In addition, most EEG-based systems require many hours of training to master and are often difficult to perform by yourself– all of which is very different from the accuracy and intuitive ease of Brain Advantage.

Brain Advantage can be used to help mitigate memory loss and stay sharp

 

Brain Advantage is a great tool to help professionals stay sharp
and increase their ability to focus

 

Brain Advantage is ideally suited to help children with attention issues learn how to focus and stay focused, offering many benefits for school and family life

 

What people are saying

 “Our daughter was failing in school and angry all the time. After Brain Advantage, she’s doing great. She’s able to focus and concentrate– and even comes home and does her homework without being told! Her behavior issues are gone. She’s like a whole new girl!” -Mother of K.B age 12

“I wish I’d known about this sooner. After years of going to neuropsychologists and doctors who told me my brain was like an Alzheimer’s patient, no one ever told me there was actually something I could do about my memory loss. Thank you so much”
-M.T. age 47

“My wife has been through many other therapies including stem cell therapy and nothing has helped as much as Brain Advantage. Last night my wife sat down and wrote letters to family members. That’s the first time she’s been able to do that in years. Seeing that meant everything– I sat down and cried.”
-Husband of P.B. age 68, diagnosed with Alzheimer’s

“I was worried I might be showing early signs of Alzheimer’s– I couldn’t make decisions, I was always forgetting things. But after going through your program I’m doing much better. I’m off all medications and sleeping at night again. I’m remembering things and thinking much more clearly.” -M.I.-age 40

 

Our Story:

 

 

Dr. Randall Evans President and Chief Medical Officer, Don Barrett CEO

 

Revolutionizing Brain Health

When we first began this journey, the idea that a brain could effectively change itself was not widely accepted by the mainstream medical world. The basic assumption had always been that brains were STATIC systems, incapable of generating new neurons
or altering its internal neuronal wiring to any appreciable degree. However, these two characteristics– neurogenesis and neuroplasticity– have since become more widely accepted. We’ve always felt that the brain is actually primed to respond to a variety of stimuli by generating new neurons and improving existing neuronal connections. Furthermore, we believed that it would be possible to identify underperforming areas of the brain and then, by providing the appropriate stimulus, utilize the brain’s inherent ability to “heal” itself.

With this goal in mind, we set out to find the most effective, non-invasive methods to optimize brain function. To be very clear– we never attempted to diagnose or treat specific disease states. Rather, we were looking to identify the best non-invasive technologies designed to optimize brain function. We undertook an exhaustive review of all of the existing technologies. We studied the purported mechanisms of action, as well as the effectiveness of each approach. We identified a number of therapies, some of which were well accepted by professionals while others were more obscure.

Ultimately, we identified several technologies that each target different aspects of brain function. Working with these technologies, we found we could integrate therapies together to create customized training for each individual’s needs. Using this system, we found we could change brain function, processing issues, neuromotor skills deficits, cognitive and memory issues all at once. We were excited to discover that our results far exceeded our wildest hopes.

In 2008, Brain Advantage opened its first integrated neurotherapy practice in Scottsdale, Arizona and then immediately following, one on Hilton Head Island, South Carolina. We continued to see tremendous improvements across nearly every aspect of brain dysfunction. That year, we also adopted a personal trainer model to guide and motivate clients. They were assessed, provided a brain-exercise program and then proceeded to work in person with a brain trainer.

 

Why change what’s working?

Even with the positive results, we felt we could improve our approach. While we had successfully integrated a number of disparate technologies, the process was somewhat cumbersome, required clients to be on-site for training sessions and the hardware was pricey. So we re-engineered the entire system to minimize barriers to access, with the goal of bringing optimal brain function to as many people as possible.

This is where you come in. Our vision is to create an affordable system that provides all of the robust benefits of our original process, while also being portable, and Wi-Fi enabled so users, trainers and professionals can access the data remotely.

 

What exactly is Neurofeedback
and what can it do for me?

The term biofeedback is broadly defined as a process whereby physiological signals are measured and fed back to the user. The intent of the feedback is to teach one how to gain control over these signals. Biofeedback has a long history of helping people manage troublesome physiological and emotional conditions. The term neurofeedback refers to a distinctive subset of biofeedback. It makes use of physiological signals that originate within the brain. The measured brain waves produce a signal that can be used as feedback to teach self-regulation of brain function– with positive feedback for desired brain activity and negative feedback for undesirable activity.

Historically, electrical activity of the brain has been recorded using an electroencephalogram (EEG). While we initially opted to utilize this approach, we found it to be less than optimal for what we envisioned. In addition to being expensive, time consuming and messy, our results were not nearly as robust as we had hoped. We also had difficulty measuring signals from the frontal lobe of the brain, which is absolutely critical for a brain to function at its best. These findings led us to a different kind of technology, Hemoencephalography.

 

Hemoencephalography
(HEG)

We were incredibly fortunate to have met and worked extensively with Dr. Herschel Toomim, a giant in the field of biofeedback. Dr. Toomin recognized the limitations of EEG based neurofeedback and ultimately identified a novel approach for measuring brain activity by measuring the oxygen content in the blood flowing into specific regions of the brain. Neurovascular coupling refers to the relationship between local neural activity and subsequent changes in cerebral blood flow. The magnitude and spatial location of blood flow changes are tightly linked to changes in neural activity. Many vascular-based functional brain imaging techniques, such as fMRI rely on this coupling to infer changes in neural activity. HEG is also readily utilized for measuring frontal lobe activity. We have successfully integrated HEG into our existing training system and are excited to be able to provide this modality as the first ever in a portable system.

 

Mental Health Practitioners!

While our system is designed to be utilized by individuals, we are also looking to work with professionals in the field. We can provide the technology and the training necessary to successfully integrate our system into the management of your clients. In addition to providing a truly unique and highly effective aspect to your existing practice, our system also provides an independent source of cash flow. Please contact us to discuss this exciting opportunity.

 

Where do we go from here
and how do we get there?

It’s been an amazing journey thus far, and now we’re asking for your help to fund the final push needed to accomplish our goal of providing optimal brain health in a cost effective, readily accessible manner.

story:
Resumen

Somos conscientes que la salud es un tema prioritario para todos, y a pesar de eso el sobrepeso y sedentarismo no paran de crecer, siendo fundamental causa de riesgo en las principales enfermedades. Por este motivo los consumidores somos insaciables probando productos y servicios que mejoren nuestra calidad de vida dentro del Health & Fitness. Paralelamente al aumento de gimnasios, estudios y club de fitness han surgido numerosas apps y soluciones digitales de deporte, nutrición y pérdida de peso. Sin embargo todos se enfrentan a un problema común; la falta de engagement y retención de ususarios 

Esta campaña pretende aumentar la comunidad de usuarios concienciados con un estilo de vida saludable, que tras numerosos gimnasios y apps de salud y deporte quieren probar una experiencia nueva y enriquecida de entrenamiento y nutrición para estar en forma y cuidarse, de una manera diferente en cualquier lugar y momento

 
 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 

Buscamos financiación para mejorar el producto digital y desarrollar la app para iOS, generar nuevos contenidos (clases, pautas nutricionales...) y hacer más marketing online que nos permita llegar a la mayor comunidad hispanohablante posible

Aquellas personas que nos respalden facilitarán el desarrollo de uno de los proyectos de mayor impacto sobre la salud y el estilo de vida, disfrutando desde el primer dia de su contribución de una experiencia de entrenamiento y salud en las condiciones más ventajosas del mercado, mientras son portagonistas y activos miembros de la comunidad de usuarios que ayude a configurar la evolución del producto

 

 

 

El impacto

 

Un 50% de la población mundial sufre hoy sobrepeso y está originado principalmente por el sedentarismo y una alimentación deficiente. Con este proyecto contribuimos a mejorar la salud de millones de personas reduciendo el riesgo de padecer las principales enfermedades (cardiovasculares, diabetes, cancer...), reducir el absentismo laboral y aumentar el bienestar y satisfacción de todos 

 

 

 
 

Riesgos y desafíos

 

El mayor desafío es lograr un mayor "engagement " de los usuarios que les permita entrenar con más frecuencia y durante más tiempo y ser más rigurosos en la alimentación, facilitándoles un estilo de vida más saludable. Con este objetivo hemos desarrollado una propuesta de valor enriquecida y aumentada para lograrlo e iremos adaptando los contenidos a la demanda de los usuarios

 

 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

Si no puedes contribuir económicamente puedes difundir nuestro proyecto en redes sociales, un simple "like" o "compartir" nos ayudará más de lo que crees. Y mejor si dejas tus comentarios !!
story_txt:
Resumen
Somos conscientes que la salud es un tema prioritario para todos, y a pesar de eso el sobrepeso y sedentarismo no paran de crecer, siendo fundamental causa de riesgo en las principales enfermedades. Por este motivo los consumidores somos insaciables probando productos y servicios que mejoren nuestra calidad de vida dentro del Health & Fitness. Paralelamente al aumento de gimnasios, estudios y club de fitness han surgido numerosas apps y soluciones digitales de deporte, nutrición y pérdida de peso. Sin embargo todos se enfrentan a un problema común; la falta de engagement y retención de ususarios 
Esta campaña pretende aumentar la comunidad de usuarios concienciados con un estilo de vida saludable, que tras numerosos gimnasios y apps de salud y deporte quieren probar una experiencia nueva y enriquecida de entrenamiento y nutrición para estar en forma y cuidarse, de una manera diferente en cualquier lugar y momento
  Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes
 
Buscamos financiación para mejorar el producto digital y desarrollar la app para iOS, generar nuevos contenidos (clases, pautas nutricionales...) y hacer más marketing online que nos permita llegar a la mayor comunidad hispanohablante posible
Aquellas personas que nos respalden facilitarán el desarrollo de uno de los proyectos de mayor impacto sobre la salud y el estilo de vida, disfrutando desde el primer dia de su contribución de una experiencia de entrenamiento y salud en las condiciones más ventajosas del mercado, mientras son portagonistas y activos miembros de la comunidad de usuarios que ayude a configurar la evolución del producto
 
  El impacto
 
Un 50% de la población mundial sufre hoy sobrepeso y está originado principalmente por el sedentarismo y una alimentación deficiente. Con este proyecto contribuimos a mejorar la salud de millones de personas reduciendo el riesgo de padecer las principales enfermedades (cardiovasculares, diabetes, cancer...), reducir el absentismo laboral y aumentar el bienestar y satisfacción de todos 
 

   
 Riesgos y desafíos El mayor desafío es lograr un mayor "engagement " de los usuarios que les permita entrenar con más frecuencia y durante más tiempo y ser más rigurosos en la alimentación, facilitándoles un estilo de vida más saludable. Con este objetivo hemos desarrollado una propuesta de valor enriquecida y aumentada para lograrlo e iremos adaptando los contenidos a la demanda de los usuarios
  Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar Si no puedes contribuir económicamente puedes difundir nuestro proyecto en redes sociales, un simple "like" o "compartir" nos ayudará más de lo que crees. Y mejor si dejas tus comentarios !!

story:
TOTOTEC

T-BALL

Hi My name is Blase J Toto D.C. DACBSP. My background is in Sports Medicine. I have a multi discipline practice in East Brunswick NJ. I have been a Chiropractor for over 30 years. The T-Ball is a product that replaces the old wooded T-Bars with rubber tips. The head is stainless steel so cleaning is easy between uses. The head can also be heated or cooled for added benefit. You will be funding a high end massage tool to be utilized by professional manual therapists to help rid patients of chronic and acute pain.

You can check out my websites at www.totodc.com and www.tototec.net.

I developed the T=Ball after using my thumbs to perform Trigger Point Therapy for 30 years. I still love what I do and I wanted to continue practicing. But the toll on my thumbs, shoulders and neck was starting to effect me. I started looking for products on the market to assist me. Needless to say I couldn't find one that performed the way I needed it to. So I started on the journey of inventing a tool that had the following: aseptic, ergonomic, capable of being heated or cooled, reduce stress on the practitioner and effective on the patient.

After going through several prototypes, I narrowed down on the design. I contacted several American tool manufacturers without success. Finally I found a German company that could make the handle to my specifications. I was successful in securing an American company to make the Stainless Steel Ball Heads.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rEz-t-Lxnic

Now I am onto the next phase. I am developing and designing different shaped heads to accomplish other forms of soft tissue mobilization. The funding from this campaign will be used to design, make molds and packaging. This way I can put together a complete set of heads with the T- handle.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sceoLI1m29A

story:
Consider the game changed.

Next time you're at the gym, look around. 

All those towels look the same. They feel the same. And they do the same average job of drying. Isn't it unusual that people passionate about fitness and wellbeing pay so much attention to their trainers, or their shorts, or T-shirts - but not to what they use to dry their skin?

Made in the UK using 100% woven, breathable, easy-dry cotton, DrenchBud offers an unmatched absorbing power. Add to that the bold, iconic design that frees you from boring and you get an unparalleled drying experience - whether during your workout or after your shower.

Current Stage

At the moment, the chosen UK-based supplier is on standby, pending the necessary initial funds to place the order of the first batch of DrenchBuds. Everything is in place for launch - from the bespoke, stand-out designs of the towels through to the perfect thickness chosen for the woven cotton.

What's needed for lift-off

Production costs

The production costs per towel are £15, given the high manufacturing standards and the fact that this takes place in the UK - from the borders of the towel to the DrenchBud label. Additional costs are then added for packaging, delivery (offered free to UK-based consumers) and VAT deductions.

Retail price

The retail price per towel is £21.99. A total of 60 towels will be produced in the first instance to assess consumer engagement with DrenchBud. 

The fundraising goal

The hope is that, with your support, DrenchBud will change the game in the fitness space. The target budget to make this happen is £1,000. This would enable the acquisition of the initial batch of 60 towels. 

Should this goal not be reached, your contribution will still help DrenchBud become reality, so thank you to those out there who believe in this venture as much as I do.

Share DrenchBud with the world

Sometimes, contributing to any cause can be a bit of a stretch. We've all been there. Even if you can't pitch in this time, please feel free to spread the word about DrenchBud. Your support - in any shape or form - is going to be the difference between DrenchBud as hope and DrenchBud as reality.

story:
A Note from Founder, Leah Garcia

SHIPPING COMPLETED TO ALL INDIEGOGO SUPPORTERS: 

Our campaign with pre-order discount pricing (perks) ended on May 12, 2017. Thank you all for the amazing support.  NULASTIN True You FaceCare Collection Perks have shipped to all the Indiegogo Contributors in various stages, starting with the LASH & BROW Serums in early June.  We completed manufacturing and shipped the SKIN Collection shortly thereafter.   

Retail orders can now be placed at https://www.nulastin.com. 

NULASTIN True You FaceCare Collection with KERACYTE® YOUTH COMPLEX morning and night, results in an effective and convenient solution for aging skin; and a means to boost the appearance of longer, thicker, natural eyelashes and eyebrows.

When Will You See Results?

You should notice the appearance of brighter, plumper, smoother and more dewy skin after 12 weeks. NULASTIN Founder and CEO, Leah Garcia got her first unsolicited compliment on her glowing skin three weeks after starting to use the products. 

For Leah, NULASTIN is more than a product line – it’s a true reflection of her personality and an invention mothered by necessity. During the week, Garcia is an avid outdoorswoman exploring all the natural wonders our planet has to offer…then on weekends, she’s in front of glaring lights beaming her face on HDTV to millions of fans as a 52 year old sideline reporter for PBR (Professional Bull Riding). Matching her passion for the natural world and providing a solution to the extremes her skin endures in her various endeavors is NULASTIN.

At 28, Garcia experienced partial face paralysis and was diagnosed with Bell’s Pulsey. Doctors warned her face would continue to deteriorate, and the asymmetry would follow her for life. Garcia was pursuing a career in broadcast journalism; making her living in front of the camera, she began a quest to find the perfect products for her beauty regimen to help correct some of the visible side effects. Awestruck by the results experienced, Leah incorporated NULASTIN to bring the product to the world and give people everywhere the confident glow of healthy, youthful skin.

LUSH LASHES AND NATURAL BROWS

The LASH natural conditioning serum can generate visible changes within a week. Lashes may feel more luxurious and hold mascara better. Within a month, the appearance in length, width and density may become more pronounced. The brows are unique. We recommend you make a commitment for a few months to achieve the appearance of full, natural brows before resorting to solutions like microblading, extensions, and permanent tattoos. Our BROW serum is also great for improving the appearance of men's sideburns, beards and goatees.​​

Amazing Science 

Our fast acting topical formulations were designed by NULASTIN® co-founder Dr. Burt Ensley, a world renowned microbiologist. KERACYTE® YOUTH COMPLEX features Elastatropin®, a protein that helps brighten the look of your skin, visibly boosting suppleness, firmness and elasticity. Elastatropin also conditions hair follicles, supporting the appearance of more luscious, healthy eyelashes and eyebrows.

Elastatropin (aka Tropoelastin®) is made by inserting a gene for human elastin into plants and microorganisms. Once isolated, it is purified and formulated into hair and skin care products. This breakthrough technology is based on recombinant DNA. With a grant from the U.S. Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA), Dr. Ensley created an ethical, high performance topical treatment for wound healing on injured soldiers. His processes have received funding from the National Science Foundation. NULASTIN, Inc. is built around peer reviewed publications and has been vetted by fellow scientists in the field for validity.

We are unaware of any other personal care/cosmetic product that can deliver our effective, uncompromising, cruelty-free source of elastin. 

Why is ELASTIN Important?

Elastin has been called the youth protein. According to scientists, the body stops producing elastin at around puberty. This means that what you have at about the age of 12 is intended to last a lifetime. So, every day, make a commitment to healthy lifestyle choices and quality products. Invest in yourself and NULASTIN. And remember that stress, dehydration, and sun exposure may accelerate the negative signs of aging: the appearance of sagging, blotchy, dry, dull skin and hair; and the look of sparse lashes and brows.

Aging Gracefully

Marilyn, featured in the photo below is a youthful 72 year young NULASTIN devotee. 

           

Why Crowdfunding?

NULASTIN, the company is a small start up and has invested heavily in research and development, manufacturing processes, creative design, packaging and clinical evaluations. We need money to fund our first commercial production run and introduce the world to NULASTIN's True You FaceCare Collection with KERACYTE® YOUTH COMPLEX. 

The SPECIAL PROMOTIONS and discounted pricing offered in this Indiegogo campaign are available for a limited time. This is your chance to try NULASTIN and experience your own breathtaking results. We are so confident in our products that we are offering a satisfaction LIFETIME GUARANTEE. If for any reason you want to return the product, we'll send your money back (less shipping and handling).  Please contact us at nulastin.com.

About the Founders & Our Team

Leah Garcia | Founder, CEO

Leah Garcia is an award-winning TV host and on-camera personality celebrating a double-decade career. She is the sideline reporter for the Professional Bull Rider's (PBR) Tour on CBS and CBS Sports Network. Fitness enthusiasts will recognize her from the "Infomercial" world.  In 1998 she founded, Naturally Caffeinated, Inc., Wake Up Your Potential; a company that manages talent and production services. She is the producer of Leah Garcia Fitness, on-demand workout videos, and has published two fitness-related books. Raised on a ranch in Northern California, Leah spent her formative years outdoor and on horseback. Her passion for adventure led her to a career as a professional mountain bike racer in Europe and the U.S., where she won championship titles and national recognition in her elite cross-country discipline.Ms. Garcia holds a degree in Speech Communication with an emphasis in Public Relations and Marketing from California Polytechnic State University, San Luis Obispo, California. She graduated on the Dean’s Honor List in the School of Communication Arts and Humanities.  

Dr. Burt Ensley | Co-Founder, Advisor and Formulator

Pioneer in the field of genetic research. Was an early employee heading the Specialty Chemicals Group at Amgen. His successes include CEO of both Phytotech, Inc. (company sold) and NuCycle Therapy, Inc. (sold to iBioPharma, Inc.- IBIO:OB). He holds a PhD in microbiology and a master’s degree in biology. Dr. Ensley has 30 publications in peer-reviewed scientific literature and 20 issued and two US patents pending related to his field of biology. He is a Fellow of the American Academy of Microbiology, Co-chair of Business Advisory Board of The Bio5 Institute at the University of Arizona, member the American Association for the Advancement of Science; American Society for Microbiology; served on the National Research Council Committee on Catalysis; and the Biology Directorate Advisory Committee of the National Science Foundation.

Robert S. Kellar, Ph.D. | Vice President Research & Development

Dr. Kellar currently holds an advisory board membership with Protein Genomics. He is an Associate Professor of Practice, Center for Bioengineering Innovation, Biological Sciences, Mechanical Engineering at Northern Arizona University. He has worked directly with the FDA on regulatory issues and submissions for W.L. Gore and Associates and has helped co-found Flagship Biosciences and Autogenesis Corporation (wound healing).

Pam Simich | Brand Development & Creative Direction

Based in Boulder, Colorado, Pam is a noted consumer product branding specialist with 25 years of professional experience as a creative and marketing director. She has successfully applied trend instinct and pragmatism and held senior-level positions at fast-growing start-ups like Inside Communications, Pharmaca Integrative Pharmacy, L.A. Fairchild Denim Bar, Newton Running and Hoka One One. Also an accomplished fine artist and creative coach.

We're excited to launch this True You FaceCare Collection! 

Thank you for your support.

story:
Short Summary

Funding needed is for the Engineering CAD and then to produce the prototype, which will then be used for producing a video of the cleaning device in shower to develop pre-manufacturing sales. Each person who donates will be given that amount reduction in the purchase price of my shower device, plus another 10% discount in price. When you choose to donate, please leave you contact information, so that you will be able to receive the reduced pricing for your purchase of the full body shower device. I will be asking permission from each of you, to use your name on television commercials, as being the heros who helped me launch the device.

What We Need & What You Get

Your campaign contribution will be vital in launching my full body shower device in many way.

My Shower device is valuable to you the contributor, as well as to the entire world; for it is a full body cleansing device and an improved health Lymphatic moving and toxin elimination device.
    
Nothing in this world could have guided my engineering thought process more than my beginning with solving problems through creating solutions. I recognized a huge problem in developing the show device and that was how often people develop disease due to not being able to reach their back to clean it. This started me on the pathway to solving that problem and others, such as moving the lymphatic system and making the shower feel so wonderful, you can't wait to return.
   
I have impeccable pride in helping people make the right choices in live at my Aging Younger® natural wellness clinic and to see some of what that is, you can go to my website: http://www.AgingYounger.net

The Impact

The risks and obstacles I face on the way to achieving my goal, to help the masses in a shower, is that if I do not reach the right amount of people my effort to help others, may fail, I want you, who read and consider helping me to understand how awesome this full body shower device is. Just by remembering how difficult it is to clean your back with a hand brush would be huge.  Your back is cleansed very poorly, and when you realize how helpful this full body cleansing device will be in also improving the immune system by moving toxins out of the body by moving the lymphatic system through the friction of the rolling brushes should set your goal to donate and help me launch my invention. If I have poorly presented my invention to you, my contributors, then a road block is in between the forward motion of my launch. If you need any further explanation don't hesitate to contact me, you can do so through my website. You are needed and you will be deeply appreciated and I can only hope that you, who are reading this right now, are among those who will be getting the huge discount on the purchase of a full body cleanse device through your contribution.

Risks & Challenges

People who find it true to their heart and become contributors to help me launch my invention will be providing support to help me overcome the risks and obstacles I will be facing, due to the fact that the only way I can launch my invention is by receiving your support. In achieving my launching goal I am going to assure each of you who contribute, who I see as my friends that you will receive a 10% discount in the purchase price for  one of my inventions, after the launching. Please leave your name and contact information so I can assure that you receive this discount. You can also contact me through my website:  http://www.AgingYounger.net

Nothing in my life has prepared me more for the development of my full body cleansing device more than my beginning, in our family problem solving machine shop. As I have stated, this has been the most helpful past that placed me in the correct industry for the past 30 years and that is finding natural solutions for the root cause of health issues and sharing them with my clients at my Aging Younge® Natural Wellness Clinic.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people are not financially fit enough and just can't contribute money, but that doesn't mean they can't help: If you see the wonders of this device, you can get the word out to your contacts and make people aware of my campaign. God will not be the only one who will appreciate you for doing what you can to help me, you will be in my heart forever. Remember there are the Indiegogo share tools as well as your email contacts!

The risks and obstacles I face on the way to achieving my goal, to help the masses in a shower, is that if I do not reach the right amount of people my effort to help others, may fail, I want you, who read and consider helping me to understand how awesome this full body shower device is. Just by remembering how difficult it is to clean your back with a hand brush would be huge.  Your back is cleansed very poorly, and when you realize how helpful this full body cleansing device will be in also improving the immune system by moving toxins out of the body by moving the lymphatic system through the friction of the rolling brushes should set your goal to donate and help me launch my invention. If I have poorly presented my invention to you, my contributors, then a road block is in between the forward motion of my launch. If you need any further explanation don't hesitate to contact me, you can do so through my website. You are needed and you will be deeply appreciated and I can only hope that you, who are reading this right now, are among those who will be getting the huge discount on the purchase of a full body cleanse device through your contribution.

Risks & Challenges
People who find it true to their heart and become contributors to help me launch my invention will be providing support to help me overcome the risks and obstacles I will be facing, due to the fact that the only way I can launch my invention is by receiving your support. In achieving my launching goal I am going to assure each of you who contribute, who I see as my friends that you will receive a 10% discount in the purchase price for  one of my inventions, after the launching. Please leave your name and contact information so I can assure that you receive this discount. You can also contact me through my website:  http://www.AgingYounger.net
Nothing in my life has prepared me more for the development of my full body cleansing device more than my beginning, in our family problem solving machine shop. As I have stated, this has been the most helpful past that placed me in the correct industry for the past 30 years and that is finding natural solutions for the root cause of health issues and sharing them with my clients at my Aging Younge® Natural Wellness Clinic.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people are not financially fit enough and just can't contribute money, but that doesn't mean they can't help: If you see the wonders of this device, you can get the word out to your contacts and make people aware of my campaign. God will not be the only one who will appreciate you for doing what you can to help me, you will be in my heart forever. Remember there are the Indiegogo share tools as well as your email contacts!

story:
About Our Team

Leta Cross-Gray 

Leta, a registered nurse, is passionate about advocating for the patient. When her husband went through a total knee replacement, Leta quickly realized the need for a technology solution that could better equip patients and their families in the recovery journey. That's when she decided to put her degree in nursing informatics to the test. She mapped out a mobile app that would change the face of recovery after a total joint replacement. Patients and their family members will now have access to the right tools that equip them to become a JOINT CHAMP and will bring them closer to the lifestyle they desire.

Kristopher Sutton 

Kris, an MBA & serial entrepreneur, has a passion for helping people recover from a total joint replacement after seeing over a dozen of his close friends experience the life changing procedure. He brings a wealth of real-world business knowledge and entrepreneurial spirit to the table and keeps OrthoCare 360 on track toward achieving its goals!

What We Need & What You Get

Our initial fundraising goal is $50,000. Meeting this goal allows us to complete the development of our app and to enroll beta testers. The final development phase will take approximately four months to complete and an additional 90 days of beta-testing before public release. Any funds raised over the initial fundraising goal will enable us to map out and plug-in additional features for the app (i.e. shoulder replacement, knee injury and others). 

The Perks you see listed, rally support to the belief that everyone who has or will endure a total joint replacement can be a JOINT CHAMP.  After all, you deserve acknowledgment for your hard work and perseverance. That's why we've created the JOINT CHAMP gear seen in our Perks.

 

 

The Impact

For many, a great concern in undergoing total joint replacement surgery is the fear of pain. OrthoCare 360 helps to alleviate this fear with a comprehensive pain management component, including a network of support after surgery. OrthoCare 360 helps build the confidence you need throughout your joint replacement journey. 

Additionally, it's common to question whether or not your joint replacement surgery will actually be successful. Our interactive exercises within the mobile app will guide and coach you every step of the way toward being a JOINT CHAMP in your recovery.

Risks & Challenges

The OrthoCare 360 app is in its final stages of pre-development. The technical framework of the app is almost complete and our development team is standing by. They'll be given instruction to move forward with final development once we reach our initial funding goal. 

Our challenges include: Finalizing our diversified group of healthcare professionals for beta-testing and fine-tuning the technical framework. It is anticipated that the beta-testing phase will further increase our initial customer base. 

Other challenges include marketing and scaling the app. This is being addressed through our marketing strategy and includes social & digital media, as well as direct contact and industry-specific conferences & exhibits. The app will be built on the Amazon AWS platform, allowing for even greater scalability and to efficiently address the challenge of rapid growth.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
    •    You can SHARE our campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or other means.
    •    Please use the Indiegogo share tools on this page to share with all your friends & families!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Dr.MUSIC 3-Your Gateway To Quality TENS Massage

Dr.MUSIC 3- Your Gateway To Quality TENS Massage Massage should be an essential part of our daily lives for well-being life. Quality of our daily lives in a pain-free and productive day could be different from in a day with maximum discomfort and frustration, the difference between them can be often caused by sore muscles. Dr.MUSIC 3 is a portable TENS massager which helps users treat the source of pain in muscles and provides true cares. In addition, whenever you need, It can be synced with your favorite music on your smartphone. thus, it never gets boring!

Music Sync 

Dr.MUSIC 3 lets users explore many different pulses which is created by various types of music. Real time music sync function makes the massage more enjoyable. Waveform of music is transformed to new TENS waveform by Dr.MUSIC 3. It enables removal in boredom of simple low-frequency stimulator program as well as having fun while using it.

In addition, It reduces human body tolerance which occurs when a device has limited types of pulse.

 

Innovative Design & True Practicality

Innovative Design & True Practicality Dr.MUSIC 3 comes with amazing, innovative design and unmatched practicality. It can be controlled directly from its main body and it also supports Bluetooth which enable users to control it through the highly intuitive App which is available form iOS and Android. Our innovative massager stimulates the nerves and muscles with pulses, created by the beat of your music! Furthermore, the smart design of our massager allows you to freely carry it anywhere you want with unprecedented ease! This makes our gadget is an ideal choice for every athlete, fitness enthusiast, elderly people and anyone who suffers from muscle aches!   

Massage as YOUR Needs  

Dr.MUSIC 3 can be fully adjusted in intensity so you can enjoy the perfect massage as you want. Through the App, or directly from the main body, you can adjust the intensity and choose among the modes which are Music Sync, Tapping and Massaging. Simply put, our massager offers you the treatment you need with a whole new and modern approach. It is not the same type of other gadgets which you buy and use, once or twice.

 

 

 

Dr.MUSIC 3 is a new type of massage therapist which is synced with your choice of music. Dr.MUSiC 3 stimulates nerves and muscles with pulses created by the beat of music. The electrical stimulation passes through your skin and reaches the region of pain in your body to relieve the pain.

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://mbnmoney.mbn.co.kr/program/vod?program_no=1000052&menu_no=301&broadcast_no=22565

: Korea Crowdfunding Show : MailEconomyTV TV Program

http://tv.cntv.cn/video/C11346/b670b6f7683741b38309f6bb8fb639d0

: China CCTV News

 

 

Click on the CC button on the video player for english subtitles.

 

 

 

 

 

It relieves muscular pain by providing pulses through electrodes to the area with pain or muscular lesions. EMS contracts muscles using electrical pulses which are transmitted through hydro-gel electrodes. Users can control the device with the main body itself or with a mobile app. A rechargeable battery is built in and the device can be used up to 8hours once fully charged.

 

 

 

 

Smart Medical Device Co.,Ltd.

A place with full of challenges and passion, this is Smart Medical Device. We strive dreams come true in boundless possibilities. Smart Medical Device Co.,Ltd. provides a new concept of medical appliances which are produced by fusion of modern medical science and IT technology. As the development of smart phones and wireless internet, health care services such as telemedicine have revitalized and a variety of innovative medical appliances combined with smart phones are constantly being produced. Smart Medical Device, which leads others with such market needs, is ready to make forays into larger markets worldwide. Smart Medical Device will endeavor to pioneer a new medical device market through the amalgamation of smart device and medical services. We will provide handy medical checkup Apps and smart medical devices for household and hospital to promote a pleasant and healthy life for humanity.

 

 

 

 

Why Fund Us

Dr.MUSIC 3, we believe is the future of home/ personal/ portable massage. By getting rid of the boring parts of traditional electrode massage that requires you to be static, and bringing it into the new age with smart features like Bluetooth control and smart capabilities like music sync, we believe that it’s bound to succeed as a product just because how fun and practical it is. You can use it throughout your day, no matter who you are (who doesn’t need a massage every now and then?) and it’s not just for show; it actually treats muscle related pains at their very root. Simply put, your smartphones can be the hub for various medical treatment, and we have the Geneva Invention Fair 2014 Award and IMPEX 2015 Award to back this statement up! So join the new era of medicinal advances and help us make it available to everyone!

story:
Short Summary

 

I am a vegan chef in Oklahoma City and I own a startup business called Health Koncious! Health Koncious is more of a movement (VEGALOUTION)  that encourages the community to learn more about plant based diets, and create an affordable and accessible plant based diet to all incomes. We do free food demos at schools, grocery stores, Vo techs, we go to festivals all over Oklahoma as well as grocery store tours for families who are overweight. I pride myself in the quality of service we provided and the cultural shifts we are creating in the Oklahoma Metro Area. I also have a "Step-Up" program that trains ex felons an troubled youths the trade of culinary arts. Health Koncious was founded in May of 2016 and instantly grew. Although Oklahoma is a meat, potatoes, and fast food state that is ranked No 2 in the heart disease death rate. But the silver lining has been nothing but success stories with  encouraging healthier plant based options to the table. I was a Chef before I was a vegan so I pride myself in my plant based comfort classic recipes and ability to transition Carnivores into Plant eaters. I've received most of my attention through my soul food recipes such as my vegan, mac n cheese, BBQ pulled pork, fried chicken, and nachos. I am currently working towards a book that will be going through the editing process by 2/28/2017. It is a run down on a whole food plant based diets. How nutrition works in layman's terms and includes meal plans and recipes for known holistic preventive care treatments for common issues such as skin, depression, obesity, diabetes, etc. Its going to be Great addition to Health Koncious 2017! Health Koncious is currently going through branding changes with plans to get into meal prep an manufacturing by 2018, and complete our mission to creating a plant based product that is affordable, accessible, and functional to all incomes.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are in need for 15,000 to support the startup funds for Health Koncious to publish "TheMillenials Guide to Plant-Based Diets", as well as manufacture her many specialty items: protein powders, dairy free cheese sauce, and seitan (faux chicken). We are currently in need of a commercialized kitchen with plaenty of walkin space to hold all of our meal prep orders. As well as kitchen equipment. This will not fundme andmy dreamsthis will also create jobs for non violent ex fellons and tennagers interested in the culinary arts field.

 

The Impact

The idea for Health Koncious was birthed through a series of life events beginning with the tragic unexpected death of Chef Nicole Asalis closest friend at the ripe age of 26 to an auto immune disease called Lupus. “Having a loved one taken by an auto immune disease that has been proven to be preventable with a plant based diet is one of the most awakening things that can happen to you. I didn’t know then what our food does to us but now I’m empowered by the possibilities of saving another’s life simply by informing them. I know Health Koncious can spark that chabge.” – says Nicole Asali

Once Chef Asali decided to make go fully plant-based with her personal diet she soon collided into multiple hurdles such as: reading and understanding labels, knowing where to shop, knowing what to eat, understanding how to prepare the food, affording organic products, staying committed without support from friends and family, enjoying the food she ate, missing comfort foods, and eating family meals on the Holidays. These all became real problems that didn’t have any functional resolutions. “Living a healthy plant based lifestyle became exhausting and felt impossible”

She knew she was fully committed but completely understood why someone wouldn’t want to transition into a plant-based diet. So she decided to create something that could help ordinary people transition into a plant based lifestyle. “ Its not about being perfect or eating how I tell you too. Its about giving people the option to become Health Koncious of what they eat and to make it feel like a possibility. “

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Its ok if you don't have the funds to donate, but I'm sure you know someone who does! So Please share this page! We truly appreciate your support!

story:
What is Foodly?

Foodly is simple mobile barcode scanning application for shopping. Working on iPhone, Android and Windows phones around world. Mainly for USA and Europe include Czech republic and Slovak republik.
  • Don't like E numbers and additives in your food?
  • Do you have allergic reaction on some ingredients?
  • Don't want buy product with palm oil?

This application is for you. Just scan barcode and get only important info. Without reading of small text.

How it works?

  • After launching, application is ready for scanning of barcode.
  • After scanning, application displays important warnings about ingredients. For example: E124, Palm oil, Not for children, Milk allergen etc. All on one screen using icons. You can configure application for your needs. Don't want displaying of celery allergen? Just disable it.
  • You can click on warning icon and get more info about ingredient.
  • Application is immediately prepared for next scanning. So you are able to scan few products within seconds.
List of info and warnings which can be shown:
  • Banned in EU additive
  • Danger additive
  • Not for children additive
  • False or misleading info
  • Incomplete info
  • Can cause allergic reactions
  • Additives stimulating taste and causing addiction
  • Made from separates
  • Not BIO
  • Glutten allergen
  • Shellfish allergen
  • Eggs allergen
  • Fish allergen
  • Peanuts allergen
  • Soya allergen
  • Milk allergen
  • Nuts allergen
  • Celery allergen
  • Mustard allergen
  • Sesame allergen
  • Sulfur dioxide and sulphates allergen
  • Lupines allergen
  • Molluscs allergen
  • Limes allergen
  • Contains palm oil
  • Contains rapeseed oil
  • Not for vegans
  • Not for vegetarians
  • Contains beef products
  • Not halal
  • Not kosher
  • Sweeteners
  • E numbers
  • Certificates
  • ...

What we need from you

As everything in this world, money are needed for everything. Even for worldwide helpful project. We need your money for this:
  • Creating of Android and Windows application. iOS version is created for free by me.
  • Charge for creating of modern UI for application.
  • Fees for Apple, Android and Windows store.
  • Finances for database of products.
  • Money for cheap Android and Windows phones for testing. iPhone is covered by me.

Unity is strength

  • Join to fight against danger hidden in our food. Every year, count of danger additives is raising and causing lot of problems. For people and for nature.
  • Say "Stop" to big corporations destroying our health and exploiting our valuable natural resources.
  • Force manufacturers restore original receptures of products.
  • Help save tropical forest from deforestation for useless products like palm oil or rapeseed oil. Millions of animals are dying in flames because we let big corporations waste with natural resources.

In this modern chaotic times, we don't have to much time to read info on each product in grocery or supermarket. Manufacturers trying get more profit for less expenses to our detriment, seeks to mislead consumers and rely on the fact that customer is too lazy to read the ingredients of the product. This situation is horrible mainly in USA and Europe.

Yes, you can say "There is lot of similar applications" or "This application can change nothing". But I can say one. It's not true. We want do things simply, quickly, without bullshits and so much intuitive. We want cooperate with health and ecological associations.

Application will be released without successful funding too, but with your money, it can be done quickly and better. Developing is in progress right now and first testing application is working perfectly. We hired one of best UI designers who is working on graphic design currently. Your money will help fill my wallet and speed-up developing process.

In application, there will be small advertisement banner on result screen. But not worry, it's not for us, just as finance reserve for expanding of application and paying necessary expenses. This banner will be hidden after $0.99 payment and for all backers.

Other Ways You Can Help

It's not about money only. There is lot of things you can help with if you don't want spent your money dirrectly:
  • We need owners of databases and websites with list of ingredients in products for filling our database for free. Don't worry about server traffic. Each product will be downloaded once and imported to our database.
  • We need people for filling our database with products for free.
  • We need Android and Windows programmers for converting iOS application to this platforms for free.
  • We need free hosting for database with good connection, security and backups.
  • We need used Android and Windows phone for testing of application.
  • We need media support.
  • ...

If you want help, just write. We like all kind of help.

As everything in this world, money are needed for everything. Even for worldwide helpful project. We need your money for this:  Creating of Android and Windows application. iOS version is created for free by me.
Charge for creating of modern UI for application. Fees for Apple, Android and Windows store. Finances for database of products.
Money for cheap Android and Windows phones for testing. iPhone is covered by me.
   Unity is strength
 

Join to fight against danger hidden in our food. Every year, count of danger additives is raising and causing lot of problems. For people and for nature.
Say "Stop" to big corporations destroying our health and exploiting our valuable natural resources.
Force manufacturers restore original receptures of products.
Help save tropical forest from deforestation for useless products like palm oil or rapeseed oil. Millions of animals are dying in flames because we let big corporations waste with natural resources.

In this modern chaotic times, we don't have to much time to read info on each product in grocery or supermarket. Manufacturers trying get more profit for less expenses to our detriment, seeks to mislead consumers and rely on the fact that customer is too lazy to read the ingredients of the product. This situation is horrible mainly in USA and Europe.
Yes, you can say "There is lot of similar applications" or "This application can change nothing". But I can say one. It's not true. We want do things simply, quickly, without bullshits and so much intuitive. We want cooperate with health and ecological associations.

Application will be released without successful funding too, but with your money, it can be done quickly and better. Developing is in progress right now and first testing application is working perfectly. We hired one of best UI designers who is working on graphic design currently. Your money will help fill my wallet and speed-up developing process.
In application, there will be small advertisement banner on result screen. But not worry, it's not for us, just as finance reserve for expanding of application and paying necessary expenses. This banner will be hidden after $0.99 payment and for all backers.

Don't worry about server traffic. Each product will be downloaded once and imported to our database. We need people for filling our database with products for free.
We need Android and Windows programmers for converting iOS application to this platforms for free.
We need free hosting for database with good connection, security and backups.
We need used Android and Windows phone for testing of application.
We need media support.
...   If you want help, just write. We like all kind of help.

story:
Support me starting my own massage business

I want to start my own massage business that provides a unique service, tailoring your massage to you by combining a range of approaches: treating the whole you. 

I can only do it with your help!

Massages are awesome, they improve our well-being, relax us, and release tension. Getting a massage feels amazing, but for me, giving a massage feels just as good! That's why I want to make it into a career. After a lot of thought and research it's time to go for it!


What you'll get in return

You'll get a Perk: a product or service. Have a look at the Perks (right) to get your choice of massage treatment, natural handmade product and massage lesson. If you want to go off piste from the list of Perks, contact me and I'll happily work something out with you.
    

   

   

Unless I you contact to me request otherwise, you will receive the large size of all products.


Where your contribution goes

The essentials - the first £2500:

  • Help with training costs (Holistic Massage ITEC, MTI): £1835
  • Massage Table: £250
  • Insurance: £70
  • Towels: £150 (6 towels at £25 each)
  • Bolster Pillow: £20
  • Massage couch covers: £30 (2 sets at £15)
  • Oil £20 per litre
Help me hit the ground running! - lets pass £2500!:
  • Venue hire - a place to run my business from. Every £55 gets me another day's hire
  • Website and Publicity costs ~£300 (flyers, business cards etc.)
  • Transport - getting to my first few home-visit clients: ~£100 
By this point I should be a fully fledged, self sustaining business!


Holistic Massage Course

This Massage Training Institute ITEC course will give me a thorough knowledge in all the practical skills, techniques, theory and knowledge that I need to practice professionally.

This course is distinguished for the high level of competence with which students qualify. I have also had this course recommended on separate occasions as "the one you should do" by two massage therapists who I admire and both run their own exemplary businesses.


Why Massage?



My Journey so far. Click here to read my blog post


The Future: Big Dreams

Once I am up and running I hope to start training further, to increase the size of my 'technique toolbox'. I'm so excited!


Other Ways You Can Help

Please tell everyone you know about this! You can also follow me on twitter, like my Facebook page and share this page with your friends.

Thanks so much!

story:
Even if you're not one of the over 147 million people worldwide who smoke cannabis, you ARE part of a HUGE demographic: "people who've been affected (directly or indirectly) by cancer." After all, in 2012, over 14 million new cases of cancer were diagnosed worldwide, and that number is projected to climb to 22 million in the next 2 decades. Consequently, cannabis has become the fastest growing industry in the US—with the industry pulling in an estimated $2.7B USD in 2014 (almost half of that coming from the medical cannabis industry.)

“Yeah, right...medical cannabis” you may be thinking to yourself, and to be fair: you're not alone. In fact, even though 1 in 10 adults over 50 in the US admit to smoking cannabis, the long-held stigma of cannabis (and its users) has been an ever-present barrier in our society. However, even though propaganda campaigns (including films like “Reefer Madness”) actively worked to turn the public against cannabis in years past, more and more people are starting to learn the truth about its legitimate role as a safe and effective form of medicine--including the ability of cannabis to kill cancer cells.

Recent studies out of Spain have provided strong evidence towards the ability of THC and CBD (2 of the over 100 cannabinoids found in cannabis) to not only kill cancer cells—but also leave surrounding “normal” cells alone. And in San Francisco, California, two scientists recently demonstrated cannabinoids' abilities to stop metastasis in many kinds of aggressive cancer.

And the list goes on and on... In addition to its applications for cancer patients, cannabis has been shown to provide relief from glaucoma and Multiple Sclerosis, to safely-increase appetite for AIDS patients, to help minimize and prevent seizures in Epileptics (including children), and to improve cognitive function in bipolar disorder patients. And if the previous stats still haven't convinced you, here's a list of over 50 conditions that THC and CBD from cannabis can help treat.

Perhaps you're still a bit skeptical—and that's okay. So was our founder, Adam Aufderheide, before he learned firsthand the benefits of cannabis cancer treatment. Adam was diagnosed with Hodgkin's Lymphoma in 2014, and found that his chemotherapy resulted in debilitating joint and back pain, overwhelming nausea, little to no appetite, and actually made food (even water) taste awful. After over a year of treatments and doctor visits, thankfully, Adam is now cancer-free--and he credits cannabis for helping him make it through. (Read more of Adam's story here)

“I just want to shout it from the rooftops—cannabis is a miracle plant! It's safe, it's natural, it's affordable, and it doesn't have the laundry list of side effects like all of the prescription medication I was prescribed. All I needed was cannabis. That was enough for me to deal with chemotherapy.”-Adam

And it was at this point the idea for “Best Buds Garden” was formed. Chemotherapy is expensive, and the side effects are often debilitating. What's worse is that the people who need relief the most are the ones who many times don't have access to (or knowledge of) available alternatives. This is why Best Buds Garden is dedicated to helping relieve the pain and suffering that comes along with chemotherapy by donating medical grade cannabis free of charge to local cancer patients. Best Buds Garden is also dedicated to donating 10% of it's revenue to cancer research organizations around the United States. 

Where You Come In

We're launching “Best Buds Garden”—a community-driven cannabis garden here in Portland, Oregon. In addition to growing and donating high-grade medical cannabis to local cancer patients and other seriously-ill residents, we will be providing ongoing donations towards local and national cancer relief organizations. Our goal is to push towards a self-sustaining operation, which will be able to further support the local community with our annual charity fund raiser where 100% of the money raised will go directly to local cancer relief groups and their patients.

Our target for this campaign is a modest $30,000. This amount will be used to help us secure a safe and clean grow space, pay for licensing and equipment, and cover some of our operating expenses (electricity, quality strains, etc.) while we get things up and running. 100% of the donations from this campaign will be used to fund this project, no money raised will be used on employee salaries as we are all volunteers.

If you can donate at least $50 or $100, it will go a long way towards making this initiative a reality. But even if we don't meet our mark, we're still determined to push forward—and we sincerely appreciate anything you are willing and able to do. Your donation WILL make a difference.

There's no denying it: cannabis isn't the “demon plant” it once was thought to be. There is no better time than right now to make your voice heard, and to show your support for a good cause. Together, we can really make a positive impact in the world.

What You Get


$5 Donation Gets You:

  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 1.5" button
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 1.5" button
  • Personalized Thank-You From Best Buds

$10 Donation Gets You:

  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 1.5" button
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 1.5" button
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 3" sticker
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 3" sticker
  • (1) Best Buds 3" sticker
  • Personalized Thank-You From Best Buds

$25 Donation Gets You:

  • Choice of EITHER (1) Cannabis For A Cause T-Shirt (S-3XL) OR (1) Best Buds Beanie Hat
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 1.5" button
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 1.5" button

  • (1) Chemo Releaf 3" sticker
  • (1) Best Buds 3" sticker
  • Personalized Thank-You From Best Buds

  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause T-Shirt (S-3XL)
  • (1) Best Buds Beanie Hat
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 1.5" button
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 1.5" button
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 3" sticker
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 3" sticker
  • (1) Best Buds 3" sticker
  • Personalized Thank-You From Best Buds

  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause lanyard

  • (1) pair Cannabis For A Cause 100% cotton socks
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause T-Shirt (S-3XL)
  • (1) Best Buds Beanie Hat

  • (1) Chemo Releaf 1.5" button
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 3" sticker
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 3" sticker
  • (1) Best Buds 3" sticker
  • Personalized Thank-You From Best Buds

  • (1) bottle Endoca brand Raw Hemp Oil Drops (3%) - contains 300mg of CBD and CBDA
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause lanyard
  • (1) Chemo Releaf hat pin

  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause T-Shirt (S-3XL)

  • (1) Chemo Releaf 1.5" button
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause 3" sticker
  • (1) Chemo Releaf 3" sticker
  • (1) Best Buds 3" sticker
  • Personalized Thank-You From Best Buds
  • You can also donate this entire package to a local cancer patient in your name.

  • (1) bottle Endoca brand Raw Hemp Oil Drops (20%) - contains 2000mg of CBD and CBDA
  • (1) Cannabis For A Cause lanyard
  • (1) Chemo Releaf hat pin

  • (1) Chemo Releaf 3" sticker
  • (1) Best Buds 3" sticker
  • Personalized Thank-You From Best Buds
  • You can also donate this entire package to a local cancer patient in your name.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate financially to help us in our quest, you can still help us in the fight against cancer. Sharing this campaign page with your friends on Facebook and Twitter would help us get the word out--and every new person we connect with helps bring us one step closer to reaching our goal! Thank You!

story:
2015’s Earthquake became one of the major factor that turned down the face of Nepal completely.  During such national emergency state, We Care TeaM took its first step for helping people. Relief programme organised in Samarivanjyang, Nuwakot (Remote area in Nepal) was one of the major support that we could provide to the victims. It included Free Health Service and the distribution of Relief materials to around 500 earthquake victims. Since then, We Care TeaM has been regularly organising programmes that support the helpless people.



We have been able to organise Recreation programme in Maryknoll Nepal which looks after the Mentally Ill people. Similarly, we had organised a Dashain programme (one of the main festival celebrated in Nepal) and distrubuted Winter clothes at Tapasthali Old Age Home which looks after the helpless elderly women. We are continuing our efforts to help by organising such small or large programmes as much as possible.


Sarangbesi, Pyuthan, the other rural area in Nepal, which is some 250 km west from Kathmandu, is the next place where we are planning to organise a Health Camp. The people of Sarangbesi, Pyuthan are deprived of health services as it takes about 6-8 hours to reach the single health care centre. Many patients give out their life on the way to the hospital due to lack of transportation while many others die because of their small negligency on the Health as they lack the proper education and knowledge about it. Thus, our programme includes “Free Health Camp Service and Awareness on Healthy Life”.


Since We Care TeaM believes in “Putting Hands Together To Help”,  it would be very fruitful if we try to meet our proposed plan by working together with the Helping Hands that are forwarded to help. Therefore, hands of help of yours and financial support and contribution would be of great value.

Your attention and consideration of this request would be helpful and very much appreciated.
For more information :- http://wecareteams.org
