story:
Short Summary

Story of Croatian men’s softball started in 2003 when our men’s team went for the first time to the European Championships in Czech Republic. We knew that sport is similar to baseball, but we didn’t expect such a high level of competition there. I just felt in love with a sport. That sport gave me a lot of happiness, trips and most importantly I met a lot of friends all around Europe. I gave myself a lifetime mission to coach kids softball in one poor neighborhood in Zagreb. I wanted to give those kids a chance to try that sport, that gave me so much.

Softball in Croatia isn’t known. Nobody knows about it. And for the last 10 years I coach kids in one public park. We don’t have I field, no clubhouse, not much of equipment, no coaches and all other things needed for good practice. Even like that, those kids become strong players and dedicated to that sport. I feel so much happiness when I see them smiling, playing and winning at the field. After many years of practicing, they become players for our men’s national team, men’s club teams, they are winning juniors and cadets national baseball titles. And the most of it, they love to play for their national softball junior team.


I am the head coach of our junior national men’s team and we participate at European Championships since 2006. Our team is improving every year. Last 3 European Championships we won a bronze medal and we qualified for World Championships. In 2012 our federation spend all reserves money to send us to Argentina to worlds. I cant describe you feeling those kids had playing in front of 3000 people, signing autographs every day and representing our national team at the biggest competition in the world for their age. I still remember how the coach of Canadian national team came to me and told me that we play so well, after we lost 4:0, and he couldn’t believe that we only have 4 clubs in our country and most of our players no field to train. Two years after that we didn’t have money to go to World Championships in Canada.


In 2016 we have World Championships in Michigan, USA, and I just want to give those kids a chance to be there. Our federation don’t have money for that. So I ask good people around the world to help us, to help our juniors to be there, so they can fight for their national team, and to bring love for softball back home, back to our poor neighborhood in Zagreb where they will be models for next generations to come.


What We Need

We need funds for travel expenses for 20 people:
  • airplane tickets
  • beds for 2 weeks in hotel (or any other place what we can find - we would be happy even to sleep in school gym)
  • food
  • US visa
  • travel insurance
  • etc.

The Impact

Impacts of this project:

  • Great memories for those kids they will remember whole life
  • I hope that some people will hear about softball here in Croatia
  • Getting more and more kids in that poor neighborhood to be on the field, to enjoy sun, and play with other kids a new sport to them
  • Giving new kids to come opportunity to be good in softball and compete at highest level

Other Ways You Can Help

There is also other ways how you can help us:

  • Contact me if you have some ideas where we can sleep, like school gyms, croatian community etc in Midland, MI
  • Follow here for updates and soon, if this story will be successful, we will have a team facebook page for updates of the team

  • And please share this page :)

Thank you,

Damir Mandic
story_txt:
Short Summary 

Story of Croatian men’s softball started in 2003 when our men’s
team went for the first time to the European Championships in Czech Republic.
We knew that sport is similar to baseball, but we didn’t expect such a high
level of competition there. I just felt in love with a sport. That sport gave
me a lot of happiness, trips and most importantly I met a lot of friends all
around Europe. I gave myself a lifetime mission to coach kids softball in one
poor neighborhood in Zagreb. I wanted to give those kids a chance to try that
sport, that gave me so much. 


Softball in Croatia isn’t known. Nobody knows about
it. And for the last 10 years I coach kids in one public park. We don’t have I
field, no clubhouse, not much of equipment, no coaches and all other things
needed for good practice. Even like that, those kids become strong players and
dedicated to that sport. I feel so much happiness when I see them smiling,
playing and winning at the field. After many years of practicing, they become
players for our men’s national team, men’s club teams, they are winning juniors
and cadets national baseball titles. And the most of it, they love to play for
their national softball junior team. 




I am the head coach of our junior national men’s team and we
participate at European Championships since 2006. Our team is improving every
year. Last 3 European Championships we won a bronze medal and we qualified for
World Championships. In 2012 our federation spend all reserves money to send us
to Argentina to worlds. I cant describe you feeling those kids had playing in
front of 3000 people, signing autographs every day and representing our
national team at the biggest competition in the world for their age. I still
remember how the coach of Canadian national team came to me and told me that we
play so well, after we lost 4:0, and he couldn’t believe that we only have 4
clubs in our country and most of our players no field to train. Two years after
that we didn’t have money to go to World Championships in Canada.



In 2016 we have World Championships in Michigan, USA, and
I just want to give those kids a chance to be there. Our federation don’t have
money for that. So I ask good people around the world to help us, to help our
juniors to be there, so they can fight for their national team, and to bring
love for softball back home, back to our poor neighborhood in Zagreb where they
will be models for next generations to come.





   What We Need
We need funds for travel expenses for 20 people:
airplane tickets
beds for 2 weeks in hotel (or any other place what we can find - we would be happy even to sleep in school gym)
food
US visa

travel insurance

etc.


  The Impact Impacts of this project:

Great memories for those kids they will remember whole life 

 I hope that some people will hear about softball here in Croatia
Getting more and more kids in that poor neighborhood to be on the field, to enjoy sun, and play with other kids a new sport to them
Giving new kids to come opportunity to be good in softball and compete at highest level


Other Ways You Can Help There is also other ways how you can help us:

 Contact me if you have some ideas where we can sleep, like school gyms, croatian community etc in Midland, MI

 Follow here for updates and soon, if this story will be successful, we will have a team facebook page for updates of the team


And please share this page :)





 Thank you,

Damir Mandic

story:
My name is David Rosenthal. I am the founder of "PLANET KITCHEN" with its vision of "Healthy Food, Healthy Life, Healthy Planet". I have worked in food service industries for over 3 decades. My "eye opening" moment happened in 2010 after grocery shopping at Costco (currently one of the top providers of organic foods). I was inspired that day to further research our food system and share my knowledge of how to create meals using REAL ingredients offering balanced nutritional options focused on what is local and easily available. This is when the concept for "PK" was born. In 2015 "PK" launched its first wellness product, a daily shot of infused nutrition we call "PFM FIRE TONIC". 

The mission of "Planet Kitchen" is to share the message that consuming nutritional foods is the foundation for positive life style changes. By providing wellness products and services, we educate and empower people to heal and inspire humanity towards wellness. We teach the "Food Is Medicine" philosophy so people can understand how eating organic foods, (locally sourced when possible or growing your own) maintaining a balanced lifestyle, and making conscious sustainable choices will help us all restore harmony in ourselves and with our planet. 

In 2015 I was given an incredible opportunity to be a part of a sustainable Land Project near Asheville NC. Moving to the Land Project, surrounded by the mountains of NC, and inspired by nature, I set out to make my own wellness remedies and personal care products. On a cold day in February I found a recipe called Fire Cider from the "Godmother of American Herbalism" the AMAZING Rosemary Gladstar. This became the recipe of base ingredients for what is now our "PFM FIRE TONIC". With a new home for "PK", access to a private kitchen, organically farmed local ingredients and a community of like minds, I began the journey of creating a customized formula that adds more immune boosting ingredients to compliment a variety of "PFM FIRE TONIC" products. 

After creating our blend and personally experiencing the amazing health and wellness benefits of this product, I shared my first batch of "PFM FIRE TONIC" with friends and family. I received incredible feedback about its benefits including feeling more energized which led to calling it the "Fixer Elixir". It was now time to share this "Immune Boosting Magic" with as many people as possible.

There are many benefits associated with our "PFM FIRE TONIC" products, starting with our ZERO waste production. We are currently able to produce three products from the one fermentation process. We utilize fifteen organic (locally sourced when possible), GMO free ingredients and continue the fermentation process by immersing them in raw, unfiltered, unpasteurized apple cider vinegar for five weeks. We then drain the infused liquid into bottles for our "PFM FIRE TONIC", the remaining ingredients are then jarred for our "PFM FIRE RELISH", and a portion of the relish is dehydrated and ground into a powder for our 'PFM FIRE SPICE" blends and salts. 

By continuing to perfect our zero waste processes we hope to inspire other businesses to makes the same commitment to sustainable little to no waste products.

This IndieGoGo campaign is important to all of us because health in this country is rapidly declining and products like "PFM FIRE TONIC" support wellness and the sustainability of our planet. By aligning with us your contribution supports ethical products that educate "food for wellness", as well as supporting the pay it forward movement as "PK" gives to the Art Studio World CHAI LIFE ARTS npo charity programs that utilize the arts to instill in youth a base for a healthy life style. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our first GOAL for this campaign is to ask for community support to raise $25,000 for continued production of our next large batch of "PFM FIRE TONIC". This will fulfill current back orders and secure product availability of future orders. 

The funds will be invested to continue production of "PFM FIRE TONIC" by purchasing ingredients and materials needed to bring it to markets, restaurants, and wellness centers nationwide. 

When YOU join us by investing in this goal, not only are you aligned in the positive energy of the mission and vision but you are eligible for great perks and incentives (please see our funding levels). 

Reaching our goal is important, however, any amount of funding will support the next batch of "PFM FIRE TONIC", as the amounts can be scaled to utilize your generous contributions as we continue production. 

===

THE PRODUCTS!

- "PFM FIRE TONIC"  -

 A Daily Immune Boost



-"PFM FIRE RELISH"

A great sidekick to any meal

   

-"PFM FIRE SPICE" 

  A great flavoring for all your favorite dishes


                                           

A Positive Impact!

Passion runs deep at Planet Kitchen and with our partner and charity Art Studio World Life Arts Programs and the CHAI LIFE ARTS Land Project . Your contribution  allows us to produce these incredibly versatile, palate pleasing, planet friendly products supporting the heart felt educational programs and mountain retreat space that nurtures through nature and empowers young minds through food and the Arts.  


http://www.artstudiomiami.org
https://www.facebook.com/chailifeartscenter/

Other Ways You Can Help

YOU CAN ALSO HELP BY SPREADING THE WORD 

https://www.facebook.com/PlanetKitchen/
https://www.facebook.com/PFM-Fire-Tonic-379057238958122/
https://www.instagram.com/planetkitchen
https://twitter.com/planetkitchen

Thank you for taking the time to read about us and our mission. We understand that not everyone can make a monetary contribution but we'd love it if you could spread our message.  Make sure to share it on facebook, twitter, and instagram and Spread the FIRE!!

story:
UPDATE, Mar 2nd 2016: 

What will it REALLY take to end disease and heal the planet?

Healing the world of its modern ailments is no easy feat.

For most of us, it will take consistent willpower and guidance to get unhooked from the artificial, chemical-laced convenience food we rely on.

And more education is needed before the masses realize there are natural alternatives to many of the side effect-heavy pharmaceuticals we’re swallowing daily.

So we have to be realistic about this:

Just one film, or just one supplement line, or just one series of retreats are unlikely to create the IMPACT we need to spark a global healing revolution.

We have to go deeper… 

And we’re doing that by combining all these initiatives into what we call a HEALING ECOSYSTEM that will help millions of people adopt a holistic Ayurvedic lifestyle.

Here’s what this ecosystem looks like:

In a nutshell…

=> The film will serve as an entry point to raise interest and awareness for Ayurveda.

=> We’ll then help you apply this awareness into a daily lifestyle, through training programs and retreats focusing on Ayurvedic food, supplements and treatments.

=> We’ll also give you the option to receive professional Ayurvedic consultations through our HIPAA-compliant telemedicine platform that lets you consult with a world-class Ayurvedic physician from the comfort of your home.

=> You’ll also have the choice of stocking up on our Seed-To-Table supplements, spices and other upcoming Ayurvedic supplies.

=> Then - and this is where the ecosystem comes full circle - you’ll be invited to take our certification program, where you can build a lucrative and rewarding hobby or business as an Ayurvedic practitioner… as you spread the benefits of Ayurveda to others in an exponentially growing network of teachers and students.

I’ll be honest with you - with just our small team, it’s highly unlikely we can reach our goal of touching 20 million lives.

But with this Healing Ecosystem - and with YOUR support… this healing revolution is inevitable.

As our Indiegogo campaign draws to a close, we urgently need your support by:

1) SHARING the campaign page through social media and email.

2) Selecting a PERK that entitles you to a variety of training materials, supplements, retreats and other Ayurvedic services and supplies within our Healing Ecosystem… all at a generous discount from the usual retail price.

The campaign ends this Sunday, so please do this as soon as you can:

Amish Shah

Founder of Ancient Health Care

-------

Every day, our modern lifestyle is tearing us further away from the holistic wellbeing we were born to have:

Crushing stress… spiking obesity levels… sedentary lifestyles… GMOs that make up 80% of our diet… over 75,000 types of artificial chemicals in our food and household products...    

And a broken medical system that causes over 400,000 unnecessary deaths per year in the United States alone.

Our planet is in urgent need of a healing revolution; and it’s clear the answers we seek lie beyond our current relationship with health and wellness.   

The Ancient Health Care Project is a small team of passionate medical professionals, integrative medicine practitioners and entrepreneurs

on a mission to spread the gift of holistic wellbeing.

Our goal is to liberate society from the illness, stress and toxicity of modern living... 

By reviving the 6,000-year-old wellbeing science known as Ayurveda.

And reaching out to at least 20 million people in 2016 through a number of initiatives that promote healing, awareness and education.
Here are the many ways YOU can experience and support the Ancient Health Care Project:


 “Wait a second, Ayur-what?” 

Ayurveda (“life knowledge” in Sanskrit) is a holistic health care system that can be traced back to the secret texts of ancient India. 

The main principle of Ayurveda is about living in harmony with both mother nature, and your unique body composition.   
    


Instead of the chemicals, invasive surgeries and one-size-fits-all approach you’ll find in many aspects of modern medicine, Ayurveda shows you...     


  • What to eat and what to avoid, according to your body type...
  • How to make the right lifestyle choices...
  • How to eject toxins from your body through specific massages and exercises…
  • How to enrich your diet with nutrient-dense herbs and supplements…
  • And even how to reconnect with the essence of who you really are.
  Fast facts about Ayurveda:   

  • Ayurveda is a lifestyle; covering food, herbs, supplements, massage, exercise, and even lifestyle modifications according to the 4 seasons.
  • Ayurveda personalizes a person’s healing regimen based on the balancing of their unique energetic patterns (known as ‘Doshas’).
  • Ayurveda has catalogued over 9,000 plants and herbs, each with unique medicinal properties.
  • There are approximately 1.5 million Ayurveda practitioners worldwide - but only 3,000 in the United States.
So here’s the plan…

    

1. We’re launching an Ayurveda documentary film in May 2016

 

Filmed in the United States and India, the Ancient Health Care film is an eye-opening deep dive into the world of modern-day Ayurveda, and the extraordinary people and institutions who are harnessing it to save and elevate millions of lives every day.

We intend to use this film as an awareness and education tool that will expose millions of people to the truth about Ayurveda; and how it can elevate their lives.

The Ancient Health Care film in numbers:



Participants in the Ancient Health Care film include…




  • John Hagelin, PhD: Quantum Physicist & public policy expert
  • Sankari Wegman, PhD: Head Ayurvedic Practitioner, The Raj Ayurveda Health Spa, Fairfield, Iowa
  • Mark Toomey, PhD: Director of Ayurvedic Programs, The Raj Ayurveda Health Spa, Fairfield, Iowa
  • Dr. Nancy Lonsdorf, MD: Named “one of the nation’s most prominent Ayurvedic doctors” by the Chicago Tribune
  • Dr. Marc Halpern: Founder and President, California College of Ayurveda
  • Dr. Vasant Lad: Director, Principal Instructor & Founder of The Ayurvedic Institute
  • ￼Dr. Trupti Gokani,MD: Neurologist, Ayurvedic Physician, & Founder of Zira Mind and Body, Illinois
  • Dr. Shekhar Annambhotla: President of Association of Ayurvedic Professionals of North America (AAPNA).
  • ￼￼￼￼Dr. Mimi Guarneri,MD: Founder of the Scripps Center for Integrative Medicine
  • Paul Morehead, PhD: Maharishi Ayurveda, Transcendental Meditation & Vedic Science Teacher
  • Dr. Vijay Jain MD: Surgeon & Integrative Medicine Practitioner
  • Candace Badgett, PhD: Founder of The Raj Ayurvedic Medicine Facility, Fairfield, Iowa
  • Dr. Thomas Yarema, MD: Medical Director of the Center for Wellness & Integrative Medicine in Soquel, California
  • ￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼Dr. Partap Chauhan: Ayurvedic Doctor & Founder of Ayurvedic.org & Jiva Ayurveda
  • Muhammed Majeed, PhD: Founder of Sabinsa Corporation
  • Dr. Kulreet Chaudhary, MD: Director of Neurology, Wellspring Health, Scripps Memorial Hospital


This May, the Ancient Health Care documentary film will be released online and at multiple premiere events in San Diego, New York and India.


WANT TO WATCH THE FILM?

Select a perk worth $10 or more and get digital access to the film in May OR get a physical DVD for $25 or more.




2. We’re launching a line of Ayurvedic supplements through our unique ‘Seed-To-Table’ approach:



Did you know that many of even the most reputable supplement manufacturers don’t know where their ingredients come from? This puts consumers at a huge risk of exposure to harmful ingredients like GMOs, toxic metals and pesticides. 

Our Seed-To-Table approach aims to set a new standard in the quality, efficacy, purity, transparency, sustainability and ethics of supplement production. 

Seed-To-Table means we’re in charge of every step of our supplements’ production and supply chain - from the procurement of the farming land to the harvesting and bottling, to the distribution.

 
Seed-To-Table ultimately means a supplement of the highest quality that is good for your body, for the farmers and workers who produced it, and for the planet.

We have studied the 9,000 plants and herbs in the Ayurvedic dictionary, and narrowed them down to what you need most to stay healthy and energized in your hectic daily life:




ELEVATE YOUR WELLBEING WITH OUR SEED-TO-TABLE SUPPLEMENTS

Every perk worth $200 or more gives you a supply of three of our most essential supplements: Turmeric, Bacopa and Triphala. You also get an Ancient Health Care Spice Pack containing 6 vials of nutrient-dense spices: fenugreek, fennel, coriander, mustard seeds, cumin and turmeric.



3. We’re setting up a network of Ayurvedic training & treatment platforms


One of our biggest goals with the Ancient Health Care Project is to create training and consultation platforms that serve Ayurvedic practitioners, students and patients.

 

Some of these platforms include:

  • A Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)-compliant telemedicine platform that will link up patients and practitioners.
  • Two Ayurveda retreats, starting with our first one this April, which will culminate in a certification program for aspiring Ayurvedic practitioners.
  • A training and resource platform where we will create e-courses and tools like spice and oil kits - and give other Ayurvedic producers the opportunity to work with us.
  • An eventual Ayurvedic school that will bring all of the above together under one roof.
These training and consultation platforms are vital in empowering us to not only heal more students and clients; but to also train more Ayurvedic practitioners who will help us reach our goal of reaching 20 million people by the end of the year.

RECEIVE WORLD-CLASS AYURVEDIC TREATMENT OR TRAINING

From 60-minute telemedicine consultations to spots at our upcoming retreats to coaching certification programs, our list of perks gives you a wide range of options - whether you’re a patient or an aspiring practitioner.

 
 Ancient Health Care Project timeline:


The Ancient Health Care Project ‘Healing Ecosystem’:



The Ancient Health Care Project funding requirements:

Up to this point, the Ancient Health Care Project has been completely privately funded - from documentary filming and logistics, to supplement production and R&D, to planning on the upcoming telemedicine and certification platforms. 

We have now however entered the costly last stretch of the project, which will determine the final quality of our productions, and the volume of people who are exposed to them.
  
More specifically we need funding to:


1. Complete the post production on the documentary, and finish with the kind of film National Geographic would be proud of.

2. Complete production of the supplements, spice kits, e-courses and telemedicine platform.

3. Design and pay for promotional campaigns and live events that will allow us to spread the message of Ayurveda to millions.

4. Finance not only our team, but contractors and consultants who will allow us to create the best possible products, and make the biggest possible impact.


Our funding goal for this campaign is $150,000 - and we need YOUR help to achieve a Healing Revolution



The PERKS of supporting the Ancient Health Care Project...


We’ve spent months designing perks for every budget, that aren’t just there to reward you for supporting us… 

But to immerse you in the Ancient Health Care experience through powerful Ayurvedic training and tools, including:

Every initiative in the Ancient Health Care Project is accessible to you through our selection of carefully structured perks, each one giving you up to 50% off the normal retail price:


Are you interested in...

The film? Choose from digital access, a DVD shipped to your door, and even invites to the premiere.

The Seed-To-Table supplements? Get our supplements and spices starter kits shipped to you at half the retail price.

The Ayurvedic training material? Choose from a wide selection of e-courses and digital resources at half the retail price.

Attending a retreat? Get $1,000 off our April or October sessions, both in San Diego.

A 60-minute telemedicine consultation? Book one with a certified Ayurvedic physician.

Getting certified? Join our certification program and get $1,500 off.


Please browse the menu to the right to view our perk packages --->


A message from Amish Shah, founder of the Ancient Health Care Project:


Every initiative we’ve created for the Ancient Health Care Project is there for a strategic reason, but it’s also part of our personal story.

The film is a moving diary of my team’s journey across India and the United States.

The supplements are the culmination of every herb, spice and nutrient we’ve been recommended by the world’s top Ayurvedic physicians - and many contain the exact ingredients I personally took to heal from my illnesses; which included fatty liver, depression and high cholesterol.

And the e-courses and retreats are designed with the exact same detoxification, relaxation and healing protocols I experienced on my own healing journey and Panchakarma.

The perks we’ve prepared are here to take you on your own process of discovery, learning and healing. And to empower both you and the planet with the holistic wellbeing we were born to have.

We are also donating 10% of proceeds from this campaign to various charities including the Shah Education and Exploration Fund (SEEF) which will contribute towards sponsoring clinical trials, building ayurvedic schools, creating scholarships and grants and furthering education and ayurveda infrastructure.



Meet the Ancient Health Care Project Team:

Amish Shah, Founder Ayurveda has been in Amish’s family for generations, but he only started paying serious attention to it after a health scare in his late twenties. Since then he has drawn on his experience as an Inc. 500 entrepreneur to spread awareness and education for Ayurveda and other bodies of ancient wisdom.

“Ayurveda saved my life, and with the right education and awareness, I believe it can help save the planet too.”

Puja Shah, Co-Founder As a dentist with three teacher trainings in yoga and meditation, plus her own family’s roots in herbal healing, Dr. Puja has always been passionate about integrative medicine. But it was only after birthing her first child, and seeing how quickly Ayurvedic treatments helped her recover, that she realized the extent of this ancient science’s power.

“The birth of my healthiest self came from this ancient science of life. It's an awakening all of the world deserves to feel.”


Craig McConkey
Technical Manager

Lindsey Ward
Filmmaker

Troy Page
Filmmaker


Omar Michael
Copywriter

Anuj Shah
Marketing Manager

Denise Kinsley
Editorial Journalist


What some of the world’s leading Ayurvedic experts are saying about The Ancient Health Care Project:


“The beauty of Ayurvedic medicine is the reason to disconnect between the mind and the body, the emotional body and the physical body are one. When you take something to cleanse your physical body, you'll cleanse your emotional body also.“ - Dr. Trupti Gokani

“I’ve devoted 25 years to practicing Ayurveda and using it in my medical practice, because I discovered I didn’t learn anything about health in medical school.” - Dr. Kulreet Chaudhary

Ayurveda teaches us that nothing is right for everyone. Everything is right for someone, and Ayurveda is the path of understanding what's right for you.” - Dr. Marc Halpern

“Ayurveda says we can understand how this intelligent functions, and if we address health at that deep, deep level where the body is becoming the body, is becoming matter, is going from intelligence or pure nothingness into matter, then we can really transform health from the deepest, deepest level. “ - Dr. Nancy Lonsdorf


 

Our goal is to spread the science of Ayurveda to at least 20 million people this year, and we’re not going to get there without YOUR help!

 
 

 


Please share our campaign on social media and let us reach 20 Million people this year.

Visit our website: www.AncientHealthCare.com
story_txt:
UPDATE, Mar 2nd 2016: What will it REALLY take to end disease and heal the planet?Healing the world of its modern ailments is no easy feat.For most of us, it will take consistent willpower and guidance to get unhooked from the artificial, chemical-laced convenience food we rely on.And more education is needed before the masses realize there are natural alternatives to many of the side effect-heavy pharmaceuticals we’re swallowing daily.So we have to be realistic about this:Just one film, or just one supplement line, or just one series of retreats are unlikely to create the IMPACT we need to spark a global healing revolution.We have to go deeper… And we’re doing that by combining all these initiatives into what we call a HEALING ECOSYSTEM that will help millions of people adopt a holistic Ayurvedic lifestyle.Here’s what this ecosystem looks like:In a nutshell…=> The film will serve as an entry point to raise interest and awareness for Ayurveda.=> We’ll then help you apply this awareness into a daily lifestyle, through training programs and retreats focusing on Ayurvedic food, supplements and treatments.=> We’ll also give you the option to receive professional Ayurvedic consultations through our HIPAA-compliant telemedicine platform that lets you consult with a world-class Ayurvedic physician from the comfort of your home.=> You’ll also have the choice of stocking up on our Seed-To-Table supplements, spices and other upcoming Ayurvedic supplies.=> Then - and this is where the ecosystem comes full circle - you’ll be invited to take our certification program, where you can build a lucrative and rewarding hobby or business as an Ayurvedic practitioner… as you spread the benefits of Ayurveda to others in an exponentially growing network of teachers and students.I’ll be honest with you - with just our small team, it’s highly unlikely we can reach our goal of touching 20 million lives.But with this Healing Ecosystem - and with YOUR support… this healing revolution is inevitable.As our Indiegogo campaign draws to a close, we urgently need your support by:1) SHARING the campaign page through social media and email.2) Selecting a PERK that entitles you to a variety of training materials, supplements, retreats and other Ayurvedic services and supplies within our Healing Ecosystem… all at a generous discount from the usual retail price.The campaign ends this Sunday, so please do this as soon as you can:Amish ShahFounder of Ancient Health Care


-------

Every day, our modern lifestyle is tearing us further away from the holistic wellbeing we were born to have:
Crushing stress… spiking obesity levels… sedentary lifestyles… GMOs that make up 80% of our diet… over 75,000 types of artificial chemicals in our food and household products...    

And a broken medical system that causes over 400,000 unnecessary deaths per year in the United States alone.







Our planet is in urgent need of a healing revolution; and it’s clear the answers we seek lie beyond our current relationship with health and wellness.   





The Ancient Health Care Project is a small team of passionate medical professionals, integrative medicine practitioners and entrepreneurs on a mission to spread the gift of holistic wellbeing.

Our goal is to liberate society from the illness, stress and toxicity of modern living... 



By reviving the 6,000-year-old wellbeing science known as Ayurveda. And reaching out to at least 20 million people in 2016 through a number of initiatives that promote healing, awareness and education.

Here are the many ways YOU can experience and support the Ancient Health Care Project:

















 “Wait a second, Ayur-what?” 



Ayurveda (“life knowledge” in Sanskrit) is a holistic health care system that can be traced back to the secret texts of ancient India. 


The main principle of Ayurveda is about living in harmony with both mother nature, and your unique body composition.   
 



  


Instead of the chemicals, invasive surgeries and one-size-fits-all approach you’ll find in many aspects of modern medicine, Ayurveda shows you...     




What to eat and what to avoid, according to your body type...
How to make the right lifestyle choices...
How to eject toxins from your body through specific massages and exercises…
How to enrich your diet with nutrient-dense herbs and supplements…
And even how to reconnect with the essence of who you really are.



 

Fast facts about Ayurveda:   



Ayurveda is a lifestyle; covering food, herbs, supplements, massage, exercise, and even lifestyle modifications according to the 4 seasons.
Ayurveda personalizes a person’s healing regimen based on the balancing of their unique energetic patterns (known as ‘Doshas’).
Ayurveda has catalogued over 9,000 plants and herbs, each with unique medicinal properties.
There are approximately 1.5 million Ayurveda practitioners worldwide - but only 3,000 in the United States.


So here’s the plan…

    
1. We’re launching an Ayurveda documentary film in May 2016
 







Filmed in the United States and India, the Ancient Health Care film is an eye-opening deep dive into the world of modern-day Ayurveda, and the extraordinary people and institutions who are harnessing it to save and elevate millions of lives every day.





We intend to use this film as an awareness and education tool that will expose millions of people to the truth about Ayurveda; and how it can elevate their lives.



The Ancient Health Care film in numbers:










Participants in the Ancient Health Care film include…









John Hagelin, PhD: Quantum Physicist & public policy expert

Sankari Wegman, PhD: Head Ayurvedic Practitioner, The Raj Ayurveda Health Spa, Fairfield, Iowa
Mark Toomey, PhD: Director of Ayurvedic Programs, The Raj Ayurveda Health Spa, Fairfield, Iowa
Dr. Nancy Lonsdorf, MD: Named “one of the nation’s most prominent Ayurvedic doctors” by the Chicago Tribune
Dr. Marc Halpern: Founder and President, California College of Ayurveda
Dr. Vasant Lad: Director, Principal Instructor & Founder of The Ayurvedic Institute
￼Dr. Trupti Gokani,MD: Neurologist, Ayurvedic Physician, & Founder of Zira Mind and Body, Illinois
Dr. Shekhar Annambhotla: President of Association of Ayurvedic Professionals of North America (AAPNA). 

￼￼￼￼Dr. Mimi Guarneri,MD: Founder of the Scripps Center for Integrative Medicine

Paul Morehead, PhD: Maharishi Ayurveda, Transcendental Meditation & Vedic Science Teacher
Dr. Vijay Jain MD: Surgeon & Integrative Medicine Practitioner
Candace Badgett, PhD: Founder of The Raj Ayurvedic Medicine Facility, Fairfield, Iowa
Dr. Thomas Yarema, MD: Medical Director of the Center for Wellness & Integrative Medicine in Soquel, California
￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼Dr. Partap Chauhan: Ayurvedic Doctor & Founder of Ayurvedic.org & Jiva Ayurveda
Muhammed Majeed, PhD: Founder of Sabinsa Corporation
Dr. Kulreet Chaudhary, MD: Director of Neurology, Wellspring Health, Scripps Memorial Hospital



This May, the Ancient Health Care documentary film will be released online and at multiple premiere events in San Diego, New York and India.


WANT TO WATCH THE FILM?


Select a perk worth $10 or more and get digital access to the film in May OR get a physical DVD for $25 or more.







2. We’re launching a line of Ayurvedic supplements through our unique ‘Seed-To-Table’ approach:






Did you know that many of even the most reputable supplement manufacturers don’t know where their ingredients come from? This puts consumers at a huge risk of exposure to harmful ingredients like GMOs, toxic metals and pesticides. 


Our Seed-To-Table approach aims to set a new standard in the quality, efficacy, purity, transparency, sustainability and ethics of supplement production. 



Seed-To-Table means we’re in charge of every step of our supplements’ production and supply chain - from the procurement of the farming land to the harvesting and bottling, to the distribution.




 

Seed-To-Table ultimately means a supplement of the highest quality that is good for your body, for the farmers and workers who produced it, and for the planet.



We have studied the 9,000 plants and herbs in the Ayurvedic dictionary, and narrowed them down to what you need most to stay healthy and energized in your hectic daily life:




ELEVATE YOUR WELLBEING WITH OUR SEED-TO-TABLE SUPPLEMENTS
Every perk worth $200 or more gives you a supply of three of our most essential supplements: Turmeric, Bacopa and Triphala. You also get an Ancient Health Care Spice Pack containing 6 vials of nutrient-dense spices: fenugreek, fennel, coriander, mustard seeds, cumin and turmeric.




3. We’re setting up a network of Ayurvedic training & treatment platforms


One of our biggest goals with the Ancient Health Care Project is to create training and consultation platforms that serve Ayurvedic practitioners, students and patients.

 


Some of these platforms include:


A Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)-compliant telemedicine platform that will link up patients and practitioners.
Two Ayurveda retreats, starting with our first one this April, which will culminate in a certification program for aspiring Ayurvedic practitioners.
A training and resource platform where we will create e-courses and tools like spice and oil kits - and give other Ayurvedic producers the opportunity to work with us.
An eventual Ayurvedic school that will bring all of the above together under one roof.

These training and consultation platforms are vital in empowering us to not only heal more students and clients; but to also train more Ayurvedic practitioners who will help us reach our goal of reaching 20 million people by the end of the year.


RECEIVE WORLD-CLASS AYURVEDIC TREATMENT OR TRAINING


From 60-minute telemedicine consultations to spots at our upcoming retreats to coaching certification programs, our list of perks gives you a wide range of options - whether you’re a patient or an aspiring practitioner.


 
 Ancient Health Care Project timeline:




The Ancient Health Care Project ‘Healing Ecosystem’:








The Ancient Health Care Project funding requirements:



Up to this point, the Ancient Health Care Project has been completely privately funded - from documentary filming and logistics, to supplement production and R&D, to planning on the upcoming telemedicine and certification platforms. 



We have now however entered the costly last stretch of the project, which will determine the final quality of our productions, and the volume of people who are exposed to them.
  More specifically we need funding to:




1. Complete the post production on the documentary, and finish with the kind of film National Geographic would be proud of.


2. Complete production of the supplements, spice kits, e-courses and telemedicine platform.

3. Design and pay for promotional campaigns and live events that will allow us to spread the message of Ayurveda to millions.

4. Finance not only our team, but contractors and consultants who will allow us to create the best possible products, and make the biggest possible impact.



Our funding goal for this campaign is $150,000 - and we need YOUR help to achieve a Healing Revolution



The PERKS of supporting the Ancient Health Care Project...




We’ve spent months designing perks for every budget, that aren’t just there to reward you for supporting us… 


But to immerse you in the Ancient Health Care experience through powerful Ayurvedic training and tools, including:

Every initiative in the Ancient Health Care Project is accessible to you through our selection of carefully structured perks, each one giving you up to 50% off the normal retail price:



Are you interested in...
The film? Choose from digital access, a DVD shipped to your door, and even invites to the premiere.
The Seed-To-Table supplements? Get our supplements and spices starter kits shipped to you at half the retail price.
The Ayurvedic training material? Choose from a wide selection of e-courses and digital resources at half the retail price.
Attending a retreat? Get $1,000 off our April or October sessions, both in San Diego.
A 60-minute telemedicine consultation? Book one with a certified Ayurvedic physician.
Getting certified? Join our certification program and get $1,500 off.
Please browse the menu to the right to view our perk packages --->
A message from Amish Shah, founder of the Ancient Health Care Project:

Every initiative we’ve created for the Ancient Health Care Project is there for a strategic reason, but it’s also part of our personal story.
The film is a moving diary of my team’s journey across India and the United States.
The supplements are the culmination of every herb, spice and nutrient we’ve been recommended by the world’s top Ayurvedic physicians - and many contain the exact ingredients I personally took to heal from my illnesses; which included fatty liver, depression and high cholesterol.
And the e-courses and retreats are designed with the exact same detoxification, relaxation and healing protocols I experienced on my own healing journey and Panchakarma.The perks we’ve prepared are here to take you on your own process of discovery, learning and healing. And to empower both you and the planet with the holistic wellbeing we were born to have.





We are also donating 10% of proceeds from this campaign to various charities including the Shah Education and Exploration Fund (SEEF) which will contribute towards sponsoring clinical trials, building ayurvedic schools, creating scholarships and grants and furthering education and ayurveda infrastructure.










Meet the Ancient Health Care Project Team:




Amish Shah, Founder
Ayurveda has been in Amish’s family for generations, but he only started paying serious attention to it after a health scare in his late twenties. Since then he has drawn on his experience as an Inc. 500 entrepreneur to spread awareness and education for Ayurveda and other bodies of ancient wisdom.


“Ayurveda saved my life, and with the right education and awareness, I believe it can help save the planet too.”




Puja Shah, Co-Founder
As a dentist with three teacher trainings in yoga and meditation, plus her own family’s roots in herbal healing, Dr. Puja has always been passionate about integrative medicine. But it was only after birthing her first child, and seeing how quickly Ayurvedic treatments helped her recover, that she realized the extent of this ancient science’s power.


“The birth of my healthiest self came from this ancient science of life. It's an awakening all of the world deserves to feel.”




Craig McConkeyTechnical Manager



Lindsey WardFilmmaker



Troy PageFilmmaker




Omar MichaelCopywriter



Anuj ShahMarketing Manager



Denise KinsleyEditorial Journalist



What some of the world’s leading Ayurvedic experts are saying about The Ancient Health Care Project:


“The beauty of Ayurvedic medicine is the reason to disconnect between the mind and the body, the emotional body and the physical body are one. When you take something to cleanse your physical body, you'll cleanse your emotional body also.“ - Dr. Trupti Gokani


“I’ve devoted 25 years to practicing Ayurveda and using it in my medical practice, because I discovered I didn’t learn anything about health in medical school.” - Dr. Kulreet Chaudhary



Ayurveda teaches us that nothing is right for everyone. Everything is right for someone, and Ayurveda is the path of understanding what's right for you.” - Dr. Marc Halpern



“Ayurveda says we can understand how this intelligent functions, and if we address health at that deep, deep level where the body is becoming the body, is becoming matter, is going from intelligence or pure nothingness into matter, then we can really transform health from the deepest, deepest level. “ - Dr. Nancy Lonsdorf




 


Our goal is to spread the science of Ayurveda to at least 20 million people this year, and we’re not going to get there without YOUR help!

 

 



 


Please share our campaign on social media and let us reach 20 Million people this year.

Visit our website: www.AncientHealthCare.com

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Oscar Wegner, a former tour player in the 1960s and creator of Modern Tennis Methodology. I first reformed tennis coaching in Spain at their National Tennis School, leading Spain into the open stance forehands and topspin of what I called the modern game. Then I coached in Brazil, producing several top students, including Guga Kuerten, who won three French Open titles. My 1989 book, reprinted by another publisher in 1992, changed tennis in Russia, Serbia, and several other countries, including China. Then I worked for ESPN International as a commentator and aired modern tennis daily tips https://coachtube.com/course/69186/oscar-wegner... over 150 countries for 28 months (on all top sports shows, including the 1997, '98 and '99 NBA Finals with Michael Jordan and the '98 and '99 SuperBowls, creating over ten billion impressions), which reformed tennis worldwide.
  • While becoming very popular in Europe, Latin America and Asia, my techniques have been opposed in the USA. Coaches were afraid I make tennis too easy and simple instruction too accessible and they would lose lessons. You can see examples of how easy tennis can be at http://tennisiseasy.com, http://tennisteacher.com, and http://oscarwegner.com.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding campaign to achieve these coaching changes in the USA is three fold: this present one is to publish the new book "Believe it or not, Tennis Is Easy" in pdf (will be available for free download) and Kindle in Amazon ($5) and in print (price to be worked out as low as possible), and personally released to the press during a major tournament in March 2016.
  • The second funding campaign, also for $10,000, would be to produce 1,000 sets of my existing 11 instruction DVDs by replication and offer them at a very accessible price (most likely around $50 for the set of 11 DVDs), with free sets distributed to VIPs in the industry and the media.
  • The third funding campaign, which would be of a much larger value, will seek funds for advertising and marketing campaigns to reach the more than 50,000 coaches in organizations such as the USPTA, PTR, Tennis Industry, USTA, colleges and schools nationwide.
  • All contributors to these campaigns will become part of my VIP list and have free access to the new book in downloadable form, "the Best of Oscar" DVD for free, and more.

The Impact

  • Together we can make a difference and reform US tennis to help regain, especially for USA men's tennis, the world stature it had for decades, with top players that transcend the sport. The Williams sisters in the US, according to their father Richard, were taught very young my techniques.
  • Go to http://tennisiseasy.com to view how parents and coaches can teach so easily the basics of the game, which allow for great progress in a minimal time.

Risks & Challenges

  • Go to Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oscar_Wegner to read my story and qualifications for this project. Log also into http://MTMCA.com to find coaches that follow my techniques.
  • Changes are happening regardless. I just seek to accelerate them to see them in full bloom in the US within my lifetime.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you,

Oscar Wegner

story:
Short Summary

„Innovation is taking what is not true in the present and making it the true in the future. Our innovations started  as dreams, as fictions, as fantasy.  They — our ideas — are what we live inside of, and are our path to meaning, to belonging and to great actions. We are innovative and passionate in everything we set out to achieve, to constantly exceed expectations through the most efficient and high value-added solution.“


Crystal Idea is Croatian innovative company that was founded in 2013 with the goal of developing advanced technology and innovative products. Crystal Idea has always been inspired by the harmony and power of nature, which is incorporated into all of our products such as Dalma cabin that produces Mediterranean climatic effects, brand „eco health zone“ and our two latest product iTHERAPY and Crystal Chamber which are closely related.








Combining sensors, micro controllers and smart materials, we created new device that your living space transformers into  oasis of life and gives you new approach to self healing.




Picture and size can be customized according to your wishes.






Changing colors can be customized.






When indoor air is polluted iTherapy automatically turns on, starts a process of purification and enrichment of air.



This high-tech device has superior performance, beautiful design and  is easy to use. Based on a revolutionary technology for keeping living spaces clean and safe. Inspired by the natural mechanisms, iTHERAPY is equally multifunctional, technically advanced and stylish design as well as easy to use. It will allow you to enjoy the fresh air as if you were in the forest all around you. It filters, purifies and enriches the air with negative ions (anions).






If you think that this innovative high-tech device is cool and suitable for you, we have one more surprise that will delight you.










                                              


                       



             



System in the iTHERAPY is fully automated but you can also automatically turn on or off. Through the sensor and filtering system iTHERAPY detects the value of harmful substances in the air, removes them, purifies and ionizes the air.





This high-tech device is interactive because it „communicates“ with user. How? It is made from a smart material that have properties that react to changes in their indoor environment. It gives users information about pollution (negative effects of radiation, caused by electrical devices (TV, computers, electrical, installation, mobile phones ...) particles of dust, pollen, smoke and odor) inside the room by changing color in the picture.

iTHERAPY is not just a classic ion air purifier, it’s a smart revolutionary device that detects the amount of harmful gases, odors, bacteria, germs and viruse in the air and removes them from the air. How? By the different sensors that can detect particles in the air above 0.03μm, such as cigarette smoke, house dust, mold, pollen, spores, etc., when they are within the sensing range, due to the dust generated by the light scattering, the scattered light incident on the light receiving element, is converted to an electrical signal, and then through a series of after the algorithm to form the output voltage, sensor anti-light type, and can be used to detect a variety of environments. Odor sensor can detect formaldehyde, benzene, carbon monoxide, ammonia, hydrogen, alcohol, cigarette smoke, perfumes and other organic vapors with high sensitivity.












Don't you wish that you could breath fresh clean air indoors? Do you have allergies, suffer from pet dander? Does anybody in your home smoke? If you answered yes to any of these, please consider a revolutionary device iTHERAPY.

 iTHERAPY effectively purify your indoor air and protect your family from harmful allergens and pollutants. iTHERAPY air purifier technology uses cold plasma discharge that consists of positive ions (H+) and negative ions (O2) from water vapor in the air. These ions have the property of clustering around micro particles and gases, and thus, they surround harmful substances such as airborne mold, virus, bacteria, volatile organic compounds and allergens.

At that point, a chemical reaction occurs on the cell membrane surface and they are transformed into OH radicals, a powerfully active but unstable material, which robs the harmful substance of a hydrogen atom (H). As a result, they are inactivated by severing the protein on the cell membrane, opening holes. The OH radicals instantly bond with the removed hydrogen (H), forming water vapor (H2O), and return to the air.

Long-living ions spread throughout the entire room.

Applying a plasma discharge to the moisture and oxygen in the air generates positive and negative ions. The layer of water molecules that form around each ion ensures that they are long-living.



Because these ions are identical to those that occur in nature, safety is assured.







1.  Pre-filter: indoor air is full of particles, most of them large particles like dust. Pre-filter capture majority  of the larger particles (dust, pet dander, etc.).


2.  Nano silver HEPA filter: Add the silver ion antimicrobial agent to the parent compound, and then drawing woven filter, so that each mesh possess anti-bacterial properties, high anti-bacterial performance (up to 99%), filter easy to clean, the anti-bacterial properties will not be decreased after washing.


3.  Activated carbon filter: carbon filtering is a method of filtering that uses a bed of activated carbon to remove contaminants and impurities, using chemical adsorption. Each particle/granule of carbon provides a large surface area/pore structure, allowing contaminants the maximum possible exposure to the active sites within the filter media.

4.  Cold catalyst filter: catalyze and decompose harmful gas, kill germs and viruses.


Our team:


In preparing a pilot model:







What We Need & What You Get

Crowdfunding on Indiegogo gives us the opportunity to validate that the product matches the needs of the market. It is important to us that iTHERAPY remains affordable and within reach of personal budget. The best way to achieve this is to use full-scale manufacturing to make the parts. The tooling necessary for full-scale manufacturing is an intensive and an expensive process. You can help get iTHERAPY manufactured and be one of the first people to get your very own iTHERAPY simply by contributing to our Indiegogo Campaign!

Risks & Challenges

This product and our project really does not have any risks or obstacles. Technology is there, we have all the knowledge needed for this project to be successful. We will use all our experience to make and at the end to sell this product to the mass. In last couple of years we already had two successful and new projects that were our innovation. For example, Dalma Cab that produces Mediterranean climatic effects was a huge success in Croatia.


Other Ways You Can Help

We accept all kinds of help. If you are interested in this high-tech device please inform yourself about our other product Crystal Chamber on Indiegogo platform because they are closely related. So please, spread the word about this great product so we can make this world better together!

Who Are The Customers?

Everyone who want in their home bring elements of nature. Everyone who want a better, higher quality and healthier lifestyle.

These ions have the property of clustering around micro particles and gases, and thus, they surround harmful substances such as airborne mold, virus, bacteria, volatile organic compounds and allergens.At that point, a chemical reaction occurs on the cell membrane surface and they are transformed into OH radicals, a powerfully active but unstable material, which robs the harmful substance of a hydrogen atom (H). As a result, they are inactivated by severing the protein on the cell membrane, opening holes. The OH radicals instantly bond with the removed hydrogen (H), forming water vapor (H2O), and return to the air.Long-living ions spread throughout the entire room.Applying a plasma discharge to the moisture and oxygen in the air generates positive and negative ions. The layer of water molecules that form around each ion ensures that they are long-living. Because these ions are identical to those that occur in nature, safety is assured.




1.  Pre-filter:
indoor air is full of particles, most of them large particles like dust.
Pre-filter capture majority  of the
larger particles (dust, pet dander, etc.).



2.  Nano
silver HEPA filter: Add the silver ion antimicrobial agent to the parent
compound, and then drawing woven filter, so that each mesh possess
anti-bacterial properties, high anti-bacterial performance (up to 99%), filter
easy to clean, the anti-bacterial properties will not be decreased after
washing.

3.  Activated carbon filter: carbon filtering is a method of filtering that uses a bed of activated carbon to remove contaminants and impurities, using chemical adsorption. Each particle/granule of carbon provides a large surface area/pore structure, allowing contaminants the maximum possible exposure to the active sites within the filter media.
4.  Cold
catalyst filter: catalyze and decompose harmful gas, kill germs and viruses.

Our team:




In preparing a pilot model:

  What We Need & What You Get Crowdfunding on Indiegogo gives us the opportunity to validate that the product matches the needs of the market. It is important to us that iTHERAPY remains affordable and within reach of personal budget. The best way to achieve this is to use full-scale manufacturing to make the parts. The tooling necessary for full-scale manufacturing is an intensive and an expensive process. You can help get iTHERAPY manufactured and be one of the first people to get your very own iTHERAPY simply by contributing to our Indiegogo Campaign!


 Risks & Challenges This product and our project really does not have any risks or obstacles. Technology is there, we have all the knowledge needed  for this project to be successful. We will use all our experience to make and at the end to sell this product to the mass. In last couple of years we already had two successful  and new projects that were our innovation. For example, Dalma Cab that produces Mediterranean climatic effects was a huge success in Croatia. 
   Other Ways You Can Help 
We accept all kinds of help. If you are interested in this high-tech device please inform yourself about  our other product  Crystal Chamber on Indiegogo platform because they are closely related. So please, spread the word about this great product so we can make this world better together! 

Who Are The Customers?
Everyone who want in their home bring elements of nature. Everyone who want a better, higher quality and healthier lifestyle.

story:
BBX Fitness is changing bodies and lives! People from all over have contacted us asking for live classes and more DVDs'. With the BBX online videos, people can access and stream our entire BBX fitness choreography workout library straight to their TV or device from anywhere in the world!

It's not just about losing weight or getting ripped, it's a way for women and men to take control of their health, fitness, confidence, and have a blast while doing it! People want to look forward to their workout, not dread it! They want the time to pass and not even realize they've worked for an hour; because even if they feel like passing out…they were having such a good time, they didn’t want it to stop! That is BBX Fitness!  But many people will never know about BBX because it's not available at their local gym, and even if it was, they may never set foot in a gym. Many women have children and cannot leave the house and some, simply want to practice the routines or workouts from the privacy of their homes. Or many people work long hours or travel for work and are unable to commit to a gym or trainer. 

 With your help, we can fulfill the demand and inspire the masses to get off the couch and sweat, move & groove, completely transforming their bodies with access not to just one or two DVD's...but a FULL library of choreography that they can access online and stream straight to their TV or device! 

This is NOT some more of the same fluffy dance workouts that are flooding the internet! BBX is dance meets boot camp, creating a perfect hybrid workout! Taking dance fitness to a whole other level, combining resistance training & toning (without equipment), sports conditioning drills, martial arts and Latin & Hip Hop Dance. Quite simply, there is something for everyone! This unique fusion is like nothing you have ever done before and will keep you coming back for more! Tested 3 times at the University of Southern California  BBX has proven to burn up to 1,100 calories an hour and will challenge all fitness levels from the beginner to the most advanced fitness buff. We expose people to a truly life-changing adrenaline pumping, funky program!  Our goal is to bring the entire BBX experience right into the living rooms of  people from all over the world!


Created in 2008 by former choreographer and professional dancer, Dede Barbanti. Now a single mother of 3, who once weighed over 200 pounds after having her children and lost over 60 pounds herself, in just under 6 months with BBX Fitness. Dede has helped transform the bodies and lives of countless people from all over the world with her program, with astounding success stories. Many losing an average of 25-35 pounds in only 90 days; simply by doing the BBX Fitness workouts and following her eating & lifestyle plan as written in her book, "TRANSFORM: The Secret To Unlocking The Perfect You." 

Often described as “addicting,” this phenomenon has been featured on Dr. Oz, ABC, KTLA, FOX, Perez Hilton and spread Internationally since inception simply by word of mouth.  By having the entire BBX Fitness workout library and any future rounds available online, we will take this social movement global!

BBX Fitness music tracks bring the party each and every time! With a mix of the hottest hip hop (old and new), pop, house, techno and Latin music that you have heard on the radio or your favorite lunchtime party mix. People have begged us for our music mixes! Without exaggeration, there is NO OTHER workout that is as fun, addictive or as effective as BBX!


Here Is The Breakdown: 

Let's face it, releasing DVD's is extremely expensive, costing thousands of dollars to produce each DVD. Unless we brought in big time investors, it would be impossible for us to release several DVDs' with new choreography. But, by making all of our rounds available online through our membership site, you can access our full library at any time and from anywhere! 

Here is your chance to make a difference and join the BBX Fitness movement! We need $15,000 to piece all of this together. Your funds will  go towards the following to kickstart our library:

  • Video production for 24 BBX Fitness rounds (each 50 minutes in length).
  • 20 BODY BLAST strength and toning rounds (each 10-20 minutes in length).
  • A"MOVES" video to help you pick up on our signature moves with low & high impact options. 
  • Website upgrades & Hosting for video library 

Our goal is to get you moving and grooving from home no later than September 2016! Once we are able to kick start the library, we will then gradually upload  new releases every few weeks. 

AND FOR YOUR HELP, WE HAVE SOME INCREDIBLE PERKS AS OUR WAY OF SAYING THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT & CONTRIBUTION FOR HELPING US SPREAD THE BBX GOSPEL, ONE BODY AT A TIME!


BE SURE TO VISIT OUR INDIEGOGO "GALLERY" TO SEE SOME EXTRA VIDEO CLIPS!

story:
STUMP ARMOUR

Stump Armour doesn't look like a human foot.  It doesn't need to.  It just needs to work.

This campaign has ended but part 2 is live to keep taking donations and orders:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/stump-armour-part-2--2
or just search Stump Armour on Indiegogo. YOU CAN ALSO DONATE HERE
 
PURCHASE STUMP ARMOUR HERE:  WWW.STUMPARMOUR.COM
-------------------

 

As a double above knee amputee, Travis witnessed a gap in currently mobility solutions. As a Marine & inventor, he's committed to ensuring that every bilateral amputee has access to Stump Armour: an affordable, durable device that can open up more mobility possibilities for amputees and hence improve the their quality of life.  

Featured by re3D covering the manufacturing process:  

https://re3d.org/made-in-america-3d-printing-prototypes-for-stump-armour-molds/

Stump Armour is a working foot 100% made in America.  Designed specifically for bilateral above knee amputees to maximize their mobility close to the ground, it was originally designed for performing mechanic work.  There has been some interest by single amputees, some for climbing.  The device minimizes effort to stand up from any position, to move short distances, reach items on the ground, lift heavy objects, or simply work out.  In some cases it significantly reduces strain on the lower back. 

SITE VISITORS: WE JUST NEED EVERYONE THAT VISITS THE SITE TO GIVE A BUCK.  THAT WILL ALLOW US TO GIVE AWAY MANY PAIRS STUMP ARMOUR, WE HAVE RAISED ENOUGH TO GIVE 6 PAIRS AWAY SO FAR BUT SEVERAL MORE AMPUTEES ARE WAITING.  WE'VE HAD OVER 4500 VISITS. HOW MUCH DID YOUR LAST BOTTLE OF WATER COST?  

Why we need your help: to keep costs low we need $10,000 to pay off a loan for the first production run and have enough left to do a 2nd run, minimum of 25 pairs. Less than 25 in a run costs more.  

All contributions will go towards purchasing Stump Armour for amputees that need it.  

With your help we can empower amputees and improve their quality of life.

A minimum of 10% of profits will be donated to non-profit organizations that have helped this project to include the Gary Sinise Foundation and 100 Entrepreneurs Project after we meet our goal.  

Development

This was created by a combat wounded Marine with bilateral trans-femoral (above knee, AK) amputations.  The development of this foot began while trying to find a better way to do mechanical work on the ground after injury. Every prosthetic foot/leg that he had impeded mobility under a vehicle and they had to be removed when working. It was decided that a round foot was necessary that would allow walking as close as possible to the ground, on the nubs, make getting up and down as effortless as possible while reducing the chance of getting hung up.  This maximizes mobility while reducing stress on the back.  Often children born without legs or children that received amputations when young are able to walk on their nubs, it is unusual for adults that become amputees to be able to do the same.  

How it works

The round design allows for constant ground contact from any position.  Pressure can then be directly applied to the ground without changing position and the amputee can roll up on the round sides.  Since the round shape can grab from nearly any position, it works great on uneven/irregular surfaces and the amputee doesn’t need to focus as much on placement.  If placement is a little off a different part of the foot grabs.  

This device is not intended to replace full leg or knee prosthetics. It’s meant to increase functionality with specific tasks and provide another option for those who have difficulty using other prosthetics.  

TASKS DONE IN THE VIDEOS MAY NOT SEEM LIKE MUCH BUT THEY ARE DIFFICULT TO DO IN FULL LEG PROSTHETHESIS. OTHER OPTIONS INCLUDE SCOOTING ON YOUR REAR.

Check out more videos in the gallery or at youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsObkfi6W6x2B6...

From the creator:

Vision:

I found a solution to a problem I had and I wanted to make it available for others.  As far as cost it is comparatively lower than other options and is durable with no moving parts.  It doesn’t need replacing or repair except for tread, as necessary, so life time cost is extremely low versus any prosthetic device with moving parts.  

Stump Armour has now been utilized  in a myriad of tasks to include climbing ladders, climbing/descending steep and rocky trails, changing tires, traversing loose soil on construction sites, forward/backward rolls, flipping logs, climbing piles of lumber, scaling framing in a construction site, and we are always exploring more uses of this multipurpose foot design.

Purpose: 

This is intended to empower other amputees like myself to be more independent with certain tasks and open up more work options.  An amputee in my position in a developing country often do not have many options for work to earn a living.  With Stump Armour, and future projects along the same concept, some amputees may have more fulfilling lives.  

What we need and what you get:

As said before we are looking for $10,000 in sales.

We are selling the first production run of 25 stainless steel pairs funded on a loan from Liftfund.  All prices are introductory. These are already in production scheduled to be ready for shipping in July 2016.   The more money we make the more people we can help. We’re hoping companies will purchase Stump Armour so they can be given away to amputees.  We will display their logo as a sponsor and how many pairs they contributed.   All cash contributions will also go towards purchasing pairs of Stump Armour for those on the waiting list, there are about 10 available at the moment.  (for an amputee to be added to list for free Stump Armour email info@stumparmour.com ) 

Costs have gone up more than expected but we are striving to keep costs low so individuals with little or no insurance coverage will be able to afford to purchase Stump Armour themselves. There will be special pricing for amputees purchasing Stump Armour on their own when no free pairs are available, after the campaign ends.  We are also considering a co-pay reimbursement program.  

We are making a small profit on each pair sold.  Left over profit will go towards purchasing equipment and tools for future developments and production runs. 

When enough are sold more people will be hired, creating jobs, to get the devices manufactured and out more quickly.  We primarily hire Veterans.  Employees will raise costs but also free up time for new developments. 

Promotional Perks:

Printed dog tags with Stump Armour logo (image coming soon) and a cardboard coaster or 2.  BUY NOW
Example:

  

Stone Coaster with Stump Armour logo, dog tag included.  Image coming soon.

BUY NOW

Example:

 

Dog tags and coasters will be made here: http://corpsvaluables.com/ a SDVOB.

Aluminium and bronze mini Stump Armour.  Used as a bottle opener, coaster, paper weight, pencil holder, or anything you can think of. BUY ALUM  BUY BRONZE

 

Sponsor Stump Armour and have your company's propaganda put in every box. We'll also display your logo on our web page and the Indiegogo page.  We've had about 4500 visitors so far.  BUY $250  BUY $500.  

You can also purchase Stump Armour so they can be given away.  We will list your company's logo and how many pairs were purchased on our web page and the Indiegogo page.  BUY NOW

Overseas orders:

Overseas orders of Stump Armour will not be completed until Customs regulatory requirements are determined and we are in compliance.  We plan to have this in order in July.  We will take preorders to gauge demand and then move on from there.  

The Impact

Worldwide over 1 million amputations are performed yearly.  There are not a lot of prosthetic options for some of them.  A small percentage of the US amputee population will be able to use this affordable foot but we also are exploring international and potential humanitarian applications. This direction may include several variations and accessories that still need to be developed.  

In short:

– Unique product

– Maximizes mobility

– Can minimize back strain

– Individuals having difficulty with traditional prosthetics may be

 able to use Stump Armour

– Effective

– Relatively initial low cost and low lifetime cost

– Durable

– Simplistic; there are no moving parts limiting points of failure

–100% designed and constructed in the USA

–SDVOB certification pending

Manufacturing

The main component is casted metal and the cap on the bottom is polyurethane elastomer.  3D printed prototypes were made by re3D.  The Stainless steel version  is investment casted by Surecast in Bernett TX, aluminum is sand casted by AA Foundries in San Antonio TX, molds for wax castings and bronze is investment casted by Stevens Art Foundry in Bulverde TX.  The polyurethane elastomer caps are casted in house. All components are sprayed in Rhino Liner by Blue Collar Truck Outfitters in New Braunfels TX.  

 

Metallic properties:

 

Stainless steel
ASTM A 351
PSI yield: 32,100
PSI tensile 75,500
Hardness Rb 81

Aluminum
ALMAG 35
35,000 psi tensile strength
Brinell hardness 70

Silicon Bronze
95% copper
4% silicon
1% manganese

Future Developments

The next development for this product are detachable spikes and hooks for climbing.  
There are preliminary designs for a snow foot and ice climbing foot.
A swimming version with fins is planned.

We also have a patent for a carpal tunnel concept.

Other ways you can help

Please share the word.  Get this information out to any amputees you know and anyone who may be interested in helping.  

About the creator

The creator of Stump Armour is a medically retired Marine Gunnery Sergeant who participated in the 100 Entrepreneurs Project.  100 Entrepreneurs help was paramount in getting this project going.  On top of extensive military experience he has also graduated Entrepreneurial Bootcamp for Veterans (EBV) at Texas A&M’s Mays Business School.  Stump Armour is one of 2 medical patents he has pending.  He has made a career out of solving problems and continues to do so post active duty service.  

WWW.STUMPARMOUR.COM

Email questions to info@stumparmour.com
