story:
My name is Matt Oyler and I have been involved with athletics my entire life. I started doing martial arts at age 5, and by age 8 I started playing recreation football.  This path continued as I began coaching, became a certified personal trainer, and even had an amateur mixed martial arts bout at a near by casino.  I took to athletics so naturally, and whenever  things got hard in my life or I started to doubt myself, I could always turn to athletics to help me gain some sort of perspective about life. Sports and athletics have gotten me through so many difficult times. In order to pay it forward I wanted to give back to the sports community, by bringing all of my experiences into one website that might be able to help others the way it helped me. By contributing to this campaign you can help me give the most positive experience to athletes involved in our program. Funds will go directly to maintenance of the site and to the amazing team I have supporting me, in making my dream a reality. They have given up time with their families, and sacrificed so much of their personal lives because of a belief in me and what I am trying to accomplish. 

    My goal is to raise $300,000. We know this is a lofty goal, but here at UBC we reach for the stars. This would cover yearly salaries for my entire team, upgrades and maintenance for the site, and marketing to get our message out there. If I weren’t to raise all of the money, I would take what I did make and still take care of my team. I believe in them and their talents. If they are with me, I can make this site a success. (I have posted a youtube video in the gallery section of this campaign page to better explain exactly where the funds will be allocated.)

 

I believe in this project because it is designed to give back. My goal was to add as much value to these athletes as possible, while asking very little in return. I wanted athletes and parents of athletes to feel someone is finally looking out for them. I set my price for membership at $5 a month because I believe in giving every one an equal opportunity to achieve greatness. For the price of a Big Mac combo, they can have access to top notch training methods and mental exercises that are designed to build athletic skills and self confidence. 

 

     When I was a young coach years ago, I began coaching football at the Jr. High school I played at. When I was playing there, our team was terrible, and winning records were not synonymous with our school. The lessons I learned though, how to pick myself back up, try my hardest, believe in myself, love my teammates even through the hard times, were lessons that made me the man I am today. So when I had an opportunity to go back as a coach, I swore to myself I would give that team every thing I had.  During our summer break I decided to develop a workout program for the athletes. Three times a week all summer long the boys would wake up at 7:00 to meet me on the field for conditioning and drills. Then we would make our way up to the weight room to workout. The boys quickly developed a mentality of this is just what we do at this school. We work harder and put in more time than anyone else does. By my third year at that school we celebrated our first championship. Not our first championship as a coaching staff, but the school's first championship ever. All of the credit does not go to me and my summer program, as we had an amazing coaching staff, but there is something to be said about teams spending many hours together, training and building that mentality of this is just what we do. 

 

I’ve seen so many sites almost do what My Team Trainer is trying to accomplish. The thing is, I have dedicated my entire life to athletics. From being a player myself , to coaching, to training and motivating; this is all I have ever known. I know the problems and hurdles each and every person involved with any sport has to overcome, and I believe I have a great solution. 

Please help me share my message. Please help me grow this program to reach all athletes. Everyone deserves an equal opportunity to achieve his or her best. Our programs here at My Team Trainer can help them do that. You can help us make this a success. You can help others achieve their dreams. Thank you.
story_txt:
My name is Matt Oyler and I have been involved with athletics my entire life. I started doing martial arts at age 5, and by age 8 I started playing recreation football.  This path continued as I began coaching, became a certified personal trainer, and even had an amateur mixed martial arts bout at a near by casino.  I took to athletics so naturally, and whenever  things got hard in my life or I started to doubt myself, I could always turn to athletics to help me gain some sort of perspective about life. Sports and athletics have gotten me through so many difficult times. In order to pay it forward I wanted to give back to the sports community, by bringing all of my experiences into one website that might be able to help others the way it helped me. By contributing to this campaign you can help me give the most positive experience to athletes involved in our program. Funds will go directly to maintenance of the site and to the amazing team I have supporting me, in making my dream a reality. They have given up time with their families, and sacrificed so much of their personal lives because of a belief in me and what I am trying to accomplish. 
    My goal is to raise $300,000. We know this is a lofty goal, but here at UBC we reach for the stars. This would cover yearly salaries for my entire team, upgrades and maintenance for the site, and marketing to get our message out there. If I weren’t to raise all of the money, I would take what I did make and still take care of my team. I believe in them and their talents. If they are with me, I can make this site a success. (I have posted a youtube video in the gallery section of this campaign page to better explain exactly where the funds will be allocated.)
 
I believe in this project because it is designed to give back. My goal was to add as much value to these athletes as possible, while asking very little in return. I wanted athletes and parents of athletes to feel someone is finally looking out for them. I set my price for membership at $5 a month because I believe in giving every one an equal opportunity to achieve greatness. For the price of a Big Mac combo, they can have access to top notch training methods and mental exercises that are designed to build athletic skills and self confidence. 
 
     When I was a young coach years ago, I began coaching football at the Jr. High school I played at. When I was playing there, our team was terrible, and winning records were not synonymous with our school. The lessons I learned though, how to pick myself back up, try my hardest, believe in myself, love my teammates even through the hard times, were lessons that made me the man I am today. So when I had an opportunity to go back as a coach, I swore to myself I would give that team every thing I had.  During our summer break I decided to develop a workout program for the athletes. Three times a week all summer long the boys would wake up at 7:00 to meet me on the field for conditioning and drills. Then we would make our way up to the weight room to workout. The boys quickly developed a mentality of this is just what we do at this school. We work harder and put in more time than anyone else does. By my third year at that school we celebrated our first championship. Not our first championship as a coaching staff, but the school's first championship ever. All of the credit does not go to me and my summer program, as we had an amazing coaching staff, but there is something to be said about teams spending many hours together, training and building that mentality of this is just what we do. 
 
I’ve seen so many sites almost do what My Team Trainer is trying to accomplish. The thing is, I have dedicated my entire life to athletics. From being a player myself , to coaching, to training and motivating; this is all I have ever known. I know the problems and hurdles each and every person involved with any sport has to overcome, and I believe I have a great solution. 
Please help me share my message. Please help me grow this program to reach all athletes. Everyone deserves an equal opportunity to achieve his or her best. Our programs here at My Team Trainer can help them do that. You can help us make this a success. You can help others achieve their dreams. Thank you.

story:
Who We Are

Many people want to be healthy and do good, but often struggle to find the time, make the changes, and simply don’t know who to trust. With www.remediumglobal.com we take the help you create a daily, positive routine that works in conjunction with our carefully curated products.

Remedium’s mission is help solve these issues. We unite people with certified products and programs for healthy living that contribute to great causes.

With Remedium:

  1. You discover socially responsible brands.
  2. You select quality products you want.
  3. You quickly see the difference you make.

Learn more about our mission over at www.remediumglobal.com as the first ever Healthy Living and Giving Kit to bring you quality health and fitness products connected with certified causes that do sustainable good.

The Remedium Box

We connect conscious consumers with purposeful brands through a simple box. The Remedium Healthy Living and Giving Kit delivers quality products to subscribers. We guarantee our Healthy Living and Giving Kit will save you money by beating the retail price of the products.

Our box provides products and expert insight that helps you with G.R.E.E.N. living:

  • G.rowth - Personal and professional development to make positive, lasting changes.
  • R.elationships - Meaningful connections with partners, family, groups, and more.
  • E.xercise - Fun and quick workouts with quality products that provide variety and results. 
  • E.nvironment - Find adventures, explore your surroundings, and help the planet
  • N.utrition - Enjoy healthy, quick, and tasty foods from certified and conscious brands

Products are selected for their quality and the story they represent. The Remedium seal of approval stands for good: a quality product, supporting a cause that increases quality of life.

 

Examples of the products that come in the box are:

1. Goji Berry Chocolate 

Delicious, antioxidant-rich, vegan, fair trade dark chocolate with superfoods in bite-sized pieces and convenient pouches. You'll love the taste and how it makes you feel.

Irresistible, Tiny 72% Dark Chocolate Cubes With 100% Organic Goji Berries Packaged In a Resealable Bag.  Five North Chocolate is proudly: vegan, fair trade, 72% cocoa, naturally rich in antioxidants, and low in sugar.

Certifications - We're proud of the relationship we have with our cocoa, sugar, and vanilla ingredient suppliers. Fair trade certification ensures fair wages, good working conditions, no child or forced labor, and a democratic workplace.

2. Moringa Lift 

Moringa oleifera Native to India and Africa, Moringa (Moringa oleifera) is a nutritionally complex superfood.
Vegan - Vegetarian - Gluten Free, NON GMO Project Verified, Kosher and Halal Certified
Certifications - B Corp, Certified Vegan, Gluten-Free, Non-GMO, USDA Organic, Earth SEER

3. Moon Valley Organics Muscle rub 

Rejuvenating All-Over Herbal Body Rub and Soother.  Rejuvenating Rub combines the cooling and calming properties of Mint and Lavender with Arnica's ability to bring temporary relief to minor aches, pains and bruised areas.  This makes for a perfect go-to salve for soothing and relaxing the body from a throbbing head, to an aching toe.

Pure Ingredients: Organic safflower oil, organic beeswax, organic lavender essential oil, organic arnica, organic calendula, organic comfrey, organic mint essential oils, organic tapioca starch, and natural vitamin e made from sunflowers.

Use: Massage into troubled areas, breathe deep and chill out. Great for relieving headaches, massage into temples, jaw line, neck and shoulder area.

Certifications - Made with care in Washington State, Gluten free, box is made from 100% post-consumer recycled content, Tube is 100% recyclable, certified organic by the WA state dept. of agriculture.

4. Chicobag

The ChicoBag Travel Pack is the perfect backpack to take with you on any adventure. Made from lightweight recycled materials, this bag is both earth-friendly and versatile! It conveniently stuffs into a built-in pocket for travel. You can adjust the shoulder and sternum straps, or pack your favorite water bottle into the stretchy side pockets. Whether you’re heading to a festival, going to a baseball game, or traveling the world, this bag has your back!

Certifications – rePETe is a trademarked term ChicoBag uses to identify products made from recycled materials. All ChicoBag rePETe products contain certified Repreve fabric which is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles. In addition, many products have other recycled components like carabiners, cording and cord locks.

 

What We Do

Our quest reaches from across the globe to our own backyards to directly connect with purposeful people and causes that do good in four key areas:

Our team partners with people who have these things in common:

  • Improving life in meaningful, measurable and sustainable ways.
  • Creating quality products to support life-changing causes.
  • Multiplying the good by connecting with conscious consumers.

We honor and work with individuals, organizations, causes and businesses who do a world of good, the world over.

These are teams who have heard stories of plight, and decided to dedicate their work and their gifted skills to do something about it.

They each bring their own creativity, solutions and passion to measurably improve quality of life. Through unselfish outreach, funding and many other means, each of these organizations help turn stories of suffering into stories of progress and hope.

Why We Do It

Thousands of stories go untold each day. Stories of pain and suffering. Stories of negligence, corruption and destruction. Stories of people, of animals, and of the planet.

But there are also stories of generosity and dedication. Stories of change, pursued with love and integrity. Stories that, if told, would make us stand up, take notice and captivate us with their purpose. Every story told and every purchase made has a ripple effect.

We measure our collective effort so you see firsthand the tidal waves of positive change you are bringing to people, animals, the environment, communities and even governments!

Being involved in these stories gives us all a greater purpose. Our daily actions have meaning. We are improving quality of life.


 

The Remedium Pledge

  • Connect caring people to caring businesses and causes in easy and mutually beneficial ways.
  • Bring honest evaluations of business practices, products and causes with transparency and clarity.
  • Guarantee our Healthy Living and Giving Kit will save you money beating the retail price.
  • Promote healthy living.
  • Clearly demonstrate the mission and impact of the businesses and causes we work with.
  • Offer quality products from trusted organizations.
  • Show consumers proof of doing good.

Remedium is registering as a Benefits Corporation established under State of Florida Law. What this means is that our focus is on benefiting others, including our own employees, above and beyond the normal corporate focus on stockholder or investor returns.

In short, our core founding purpose is to sustainably support causes and humanity before monetary ROI considerations.

Whenever possible, Remedium multiplies the good that is being accomplished with your purchase for the cause you care about. We do this by joining the brands and organizations in their giving (missions).

Unite Global Good

Your stand with Remedium in “doing good” isn’t limited to a one-time purchase. You become part of the Remedium impact – day after day, year after year - long term, sustaining global good. Become part of our community and Unite Global Good with us at www.remediumglobal.com.

Our People Our Story

   Eric, Co-Founder

Eric developed the concept for Remedium with his wife, Carol, and the plan with their business consultant, Douglas. He delights in connecting people with amazing causes and cool, practical products that give back. Eric has co-owned and operated a successful, growing e-commerce business with Carol since 2014.

Roots: Illinois - USA

 

   Carol, RDN, LDN, Co-Founder

Carol has a passion and special touch for helping others live healthy lives in practical and sustainable ways. She is a licensed dietitian and current dental student at the University of Florida with a knack for style and travel.

Roots: Lima - Peru

 

  Jorge, Order Fulfillment and Inventory Controller

Jorge enjoys working with a team that is enthusiastic and caring with every interaction. He enjoys learning about fitness and eating delicious Peruvian food. He has 3 years experience with e-commerce and he is excited to bring together subscription boxes that will help people’s health.

Roots: Lima - Peru

 

   Randolph, Order Fulfillment and Inventory Controller

Randy is team player who has helped to cultivate an approach of service above self by providing consistent support to all customers. Remedium’s hands on training and learning has propelled Randy with providing excellent order fulfillment and customer care. He is a multi-talented musician, who is living his dream of traveling both domestically and internationally as a Music Director and Producer.

Roots: Tortola - British Virgin Islands

 

   Andrea, Relational and Logistics Manager

Andrea likes to focus on strategic planning and keeping systems running smoothing and efficiently. Andrea graduated from the University of Florida with a passion to use business as a greater tool to do good. She loves the idea of connecting quality products to consumers while benefiting those who made them.

Roots: Lima - Peru

 

  Reinaldo, Customer Care

Rey joined the Remedium team to experience the vision of great products and trustworthy causes come together. Reinaldo works in various aspects of Remedium to unify the team efforts with providing excellent customer service, managing inventory and using repricing software to keep prices updated. Reinaldo joined the Remedium team to help provide a better future for others around the world. Rey says cooperation is the key to a better tomorrow.

Roots: San Pedro Sula -Honduras

 

  Bruna, Account Manager

Bruna has been working with Remedium for over a year as an Order Fulfillment and Inventory Controller. She says what excites her about working with Remedium she would respond, "Not only do I have the comfort of working from home, but I have the chance to be a part of an organization that values it's customers".

Roots: Jacmel - Haiti

 

   Sarah, Web Development & Social Media Marketing

Sarah has been a graphic & web designer for over five years and a manager for a multimillion dollar retailer for seven years. As an artist of many tools (computers, cameras and kilns), she obsesses over color palettes, fonts, and textures. She's excited to be able to use her skills toward global positive change through Remedium.

Roots: Florida- USA

 

   Douglas, Operations Director

Doug is a business specialist with over thirty years of experience. He optimizes Remedium's operations, analyzes causes and product certifications, aligns goals to our business plan and mission, and maximizes use of resources.

Roots: Ohio - USA

 

   Lorraine, Account Manager

Lorraine is an account manager at Remedium and has been with the company since April 2016. She is a graduate of Temple University with a Bachelor's degree in Speech Language & Hearing Sciences. Lorraine enjoys working with Remedium and believes in its mission to supply customers with products that increase quality of life.

Roots: Ghana - West Africa

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

How does Remedium choose the causes to support?

Our causes must impact global good in four recognized areas of activities: humanity, environmental, social responsibility, and animal welfare.  We then seek the most effective, productive brands, organizations, projects, etc., that use quality products to sustain their cause.

How does Remedium choose the brands in the Remedium Healthy Living and Giving Kit?

Remedium has several levels of certification and qualification standards. First, the brand or cause must be acknowledged through one of the 80 third party organizations as listed on the Eco Label Index (http://www.ecolabelindex.com/ecolabels/). Next, we check to make sure the brand is current and in good standing with their certification. Then, we directly look at the good work the brand, organization or group has done and help measure the positive impacts of their current efforts. Finally, we test the products for quality, durability, and effectiveness.

Is Remedium a nonprofit?

Remedium is purposefully structured as a “Social Benefit” corporation in the state of Florida.  By state statue, a “B” corporation is a “for-profit” company, however, the statue empowers employees to be fully involved in the management and operations of the corporation.  Further, the statue dictates that Remedium puts the causes above investor returns. This structure provides sustainability for operations, benefits to employees, and powerful partnerships with causes of various sizes and situations.

 

I have a brand that does good - how can I partner with Remedium to be included in a future box?

Yes, Remedium is always looking to be part of brands and projects that made a real-world difference.  We are interested in both early stage as well as existing projects and organizations.

Where does the Remedium Box ship?

Remedium can ship globally.  Contact Remedium with any special shipping requests you might have.

What is the Remedium cancellation policy?

Remedium specifies to customers the deadline of each quarterly subscription for cancellations. If a customer cancels on or before that cancellation date, the request will be honored at no charge. If the customer requests to cancel after the deadline has passed, Remedium will make attempt to honor the customers request and explain any reason for inability to cancel. 

Does Remedium accept returns?

We do not accept returns on boxes or items included in boxes. We only replace items if they are defective, damaged, or missing from your shipment. If an item arrives damaged or missing from your box contact us within 7 days of delivery and we will mail you a replacement item at no cost to you.  If the item is damaged, you may be asked to email us a photo of the item, which will be be used to improve quality assurance processes.

We have a 100% customer satisfaction policy for current, active subscribers that may allow for certain exchanges under specific circumstances.

In the event that your box is returned to us because of an incorrect or invalid mailing address, then we can either:

Issue you a refund less the cost of shipping or

We can ship your box to your corrected address after you pay the shipping fee for us to re-ship your box.

When are products available for reorder?

Products from a Remedium Box will be available for reorder at various times depending on logistics and the quantity available. Typically items will be available for re-order within 14 days of box delivery. It is best to check our website at www.remediumglobal.com for the most up-to-date items.

Can I purchase multiple Remedium Boxes?                                                                                

Absolutely! A Healthy Living and Giving Kit is a powerful gift for a friend, loved one or a team. Special multiple subscription pricing is available! Contact us to create a special box package specifically for your needs.

What are Remedium’s future plans - beyond the box?

Our boxes will grow to offer the best selection of themes, health/fitness, nutrition and quality products for the largest age range, demographic profile and hobby interests. Our products enable customers to share box content that says you care about the recipient and causes for the world.

In the future, we want to take you directly to the cause through podcasts, live streaming video and social media. You come to know the people and their story on a personal level. We desire to create, expand, and support the very best programs and operations across the globe.

We help causes by offering a sustainable funding plan structure to constantly provide funds, enabling them to deliver ever greater impacts vs. solely unpredictable donation streams or goodwill contributions.

Thank you for being a part Remedium’s mission to sustainably increase the quality of life by uniting people with transparent, quality products and causes.

Together, we’re uniting global good.

If an item arrives damaged or missing from your box contact us within 7 days of delivery and we will mail you a replacement item at no cost to you.  If the item is damaged, you may be asked to email us a photo of the item, which will be be used to improve quality assurance processes.We have a 100% customer satisfaction policy for current, active subscribers that may allow for certain exchanges under specific circumstances.In the event that your box is returned to us because of an incorrect or invalid mailing address, then we can either:Issue you a refund less the cost of shipping orWe can ship your box to your corrected address after you pay the shipping fee for us to re-ship your box.When are products available for reorder?Products from a Remedium Box will be available for reorder at various times depending on logistics and the quantity available. Typically items will be available for re-order within 14 days of box delivery. It is best to check our website at www.remediumglobal.com for the most up-to-date items.Can I purchase multiple Remedium Boxes?                                                                                Absolutely! A Healthy Living and Giving Kit is a powerful gift for a friend, loved one or a team. Special multiple subscription pricing is available! Contact us to create a special box package specifically for your needs.What are Remedium’s future plans - beyond the box?Our boxes will grow to offer the best selection of themes, health/fitness, nutrition and quality products for the largest age range, demographic profile and hobby interests. Our products enable customers to share box content that says you care about the recipient and causes for the world.In the future, we want to take you directly to the cause through podcasts, live streaming video and social media. You come to know the people and their story on a personal level. We desire to create, expand, and support the very best programs and operations across the globe.We help causes by offering a sustainable funding plan structure to constantly provide funds, enabling them to deliver ever greater impacts vs. solely unpredictable donation streams or goodwill contributions.Thank you for being a part Remedium’s mission to sustainably increase the quality of life by uniting people with transparent, quality products and causes.Together, we’re uniting global good.

story:
Who we are

Renegade Running is a retail store and community of runners in Oakland, California, opening March 2020. Combining a curated collection of running shoes and apparel with training support and community programming, we strive to make running an inclusive experience for all across race, age, gender, and physical ability. 

Our store will offer a curated line of high quality fashion-forward, technical activewear brands, as well as the latest running shoes, apparel, accessories, and nutrition. The store will also be a hub for a diverse running crew and catalyst for other community programs that encourages the athlete in everyone.

Let’s run together.

Why we're here

As two founders of color with backgrounds in competitive running, public education, and coaching, we're merging our passions to create a running community rooted in support, diversity, and big goals.  

We're Oakland residents through and through. We witness the heart and passion that courses through the city’s veins. As one of the most ethnically diverse major cities in the country we have seen how communities grow closer and stronger together.

Renegade Running is inspired by the origins of the ‘revolutionary spirit’ in Oakland. We are reclaiming the ‘renegade’ name to challenge the assumptions of what a runner is and can be. Renegades show up despite the hardships and challenges they face inside and outside of the sport.

What We Need & What You Get

We're getting ready for the grand opening of our brick-and-mortar store at 45 Grand Avenue in March! Before we open, we invite you to join our Founders Crew as one of the first members of our community. Depending on which perk you choose, you'll receive our first- and limited-edition gear, or your choice of membership access to our Runner's Lounge. All Founders Crew members will be invited to a sneak peek event and meet-and-greet before our public opening, too. 

The Runner's Lounge

We'll stock the best running gear for your athletic journey, AND we know that it's all the little things that keep runners healthy. Our Runner's Lounge will be open before and after store hours for Lounge Members only, and will be stocked with free recovery tools (foam rollers, bands and balls, TRX, and Theragun), nutritional products, and 1:1 support. Lounge members at the Silver and Gold levels can also receive discounted or free access to Normatec recovery boots, an anti-gravity treadmill, and other high-tech tools to keep you running (or recovering) at your best.

The Impact

When you join our Founders Crew, you're officially part of the Renegade community from day one. You'll also be helping us get to the starting line with a ton of excitement and momentum, as well as supporting our future community initiatives. With a focus on inclusivity, we want to support local middle and high school cross-country programs, offer free child care for single parents on our weekly runs, and handout free nutrition at our pop-ups on running routes in the city. Our goal is to become a leading voice for representation in the running world while also educating members of the benefits of running on the roads and trails. 

Risks & Challenges

We know the challenges small retail stores face against the "big box" or online competitors. We know that new and small businesses can always struggle to make ends meet. But we believe that the core of the Renegade spirit is community, and that a diverse community (you!) will be our greatest added value. We're excited to meet the challenge of investing in the human capital necessary to succeed as a business and resource.

Other Ways You Can Help

Join our Strava Run Club or follow us on Instagram! Or, drop us an email and let us know what you want and need from your running community.

story:
What is 3SYS Hand Sanitizer? 

High-quality, homemade hand sanitizer made to kill viruses and bacteria, with a higher alcohol content than store-brands like Purell. Easy to bring with you on the go when you can’t wash your hands with soap and water.

 

Our Story

3SYS was started by us, three sisters who live in NYC and are in high school, middle school, and even pre-school! It was difficult for us to see the immense shortages of sanitizer and other much needed products in the wake of the Coronavirus outbreak, so we decided to make our own hand sanitizer to help our community. Learn more about us at www.3sys.org

 

50% of Profits to Charity

We will be donating 50% of our profits to organizations serving students and children who are affected by Coronavirus and also to provide N95 and surgical masks to healthcare workers in NYC. Thank you for supporting us and our journey to help others in our community! While this disease and its impact are horrific, it is important that we think of others and help those in need.

story:
Pain is your teacher. Don’t mask it, let it be your guide.

We believe that feeling good isn’t the same as healing. It’s time to shift our collective perception of pain.

Let pain be your teacher. Pain is your body’s way of communicating with you. Don’t mask your pain, download PainPal AI and let pain be your guide.

IMfit’s dedicated team of experts has perfected a program that combines AI with human expertise to make their proven methods accessible to individuals from home. We’re using data informed by human pain, deep learning and AI to reshape your human potential and revolutionize our collective relationship to physical pain.

The insights are in your pain, and the power to heal is in your hands.

For over a decade, the body experts at IMfit have been performing a combined set of methodologies that target and eliminate pain by releasing blockages in the body’s fascial system. 

Our goal was to develop a treatment that was affordable, accessible, interactive, educational, and simple to use at home!!

Introducing PainPal AI

Thanks to all who have already supported our campaign and continue to support us. Your enthusiasm and belief in this service inspires us daily to continue to exceed your expectations! 

It’s finally time to find empowerment in your pain and let PainPal AI guide your healing journey!

 It’s easy to use

Create your avatar!

Think of your avatar as the ultimate buddy system.

Meet your (pre-treatment) digital self, you two are in this together!

Complete your initial at-home body scan to create your personal avatar who translates your pain for you and guides you throughout your healing journey. 

The more committed you are to your avatar, the better; your avatar reflects your successes, shortcomings, patterns and potential and will empower you exponentially as you progress.

 Personalized Pain Prescription

Along with your avatar, you’ll get a personalized pain plan based on the unique nature of your pain to target the source of the dysfunction in a fun and rewarding way in under 15 minutes a day.

 

 

 Set Your Daily Prescription and Lifestyle Behaviours

Settings and Features

Your Dashboard

Your PainPal AI dashboard is your daily check-in point where you can track your progress, update your lifestyle trackers, and ultimately bring awareness back to your body. 

Your Settings

 

Here’s where you can fine tune your experience and set yourself up for success. Smart daily reminders will create new patterns and condition your unconscious to establish a new normal. You’ll get hydration reminders to keep your healing process on track, as well as postural check-ins and personalized treatment prompts to rewire your body consciousness for a better you.

Tracking and reports

 

PainPal AI generates accurate regular reports to track your success. You can also share these reports and save them for future reference. Looking back on your progress is almost as rewarding as mastering your pain.
 

 Rethinking our collective relationship to pain.

Our aim is to encourage a global shift in our collective attitude towards pain. Pain, be it mild or acute, is not to be feared, instead it should be seen as a precious ally; it's time for our collective consciousness to view pain the way a health practitioner does, as a tool for learning. 

We see this as just the beginning of something great, and we believe that anyone who experiences our treatment will become a champion of our cause. Join our effort to create that vital shift in collective perception, to help us bring consciousness back to our bodies and by doing so we’ll continue to refine the technology that learns from pain.

Hear from one of our experts

We Developed This App for our Clients

Our curiosity and ambition to create the best experience and results for our clients lead us to develop PainPal AI. The app offers many of the incredible and life changing benefits that our clinic offers. It allows us to meet the high demand we’ve created and make the service more accessible, affordable and offer our clients a type of training, mental conditioning, body consciousness and learnable techniques that you can’t find in the clinic.

Here’s how our clients have described their experience in their own words:

Holly's Success Story!

Holly was a typical client for IMfit, a 27 year old woman suffering from ongoing lower back pain, and feeling betrayed by her body. That is where her story started but where it finished is something entirely different. 

Holly took part in the Total Health Reform (THR) program at IMfit. In a short period of time, her pain reduced and almost disappeared, her body transformed and she changed her beliefs regarding what is possible for herself.

Kal's Success Story!

Kal is a 42 year old crane operator starting to have major pain issues from his work and lifestyle. Pain was starting to plague him in whatever he did. He took part in the THR program and transformed his body and became pain free.

 IMfit, the Experts Behind the Innovation

IMfit Health Innovations Inc.,  is a world class bio-hacking center located in Victoria, BC, Canada. We have been successfully tackling pain conditions for over 10 years, and now you can do the same at home.

The IMfit team has been refining their treatment modalities; Fascial Contouring and Intentional Movement, to target and eliminate the issues causing pain for their clients.

Click below to see the IMfit team performing part of an assessment.

For more information on IMfit Health Innovations visit www.imfitreform.com
 

Our Stories

Philip Gough - Creator and Lead Facilitator

22 years ago I suffered an injury climbing a mountain in South Korea. My life changed there and then. It took 71/2 hours to hike up, and over 22 hours to crawl down. The pain in my knees were blinding, and every step was torture. My life was never the same. I spent the next 20 years searching for a solution. Year after year things just got worse. I couldn't sit in a movie theater without my knees killing me. Flying on a plane was excruciating. As I got closer and closer to 50 years of age, I started to worry about if I would be able to walk in my later years! It got so bad that on one particular instance, I jumped off the sidewalk and onto the street (what 4-6 inches) and I thought my legs were going to collapse!

That was the lowest point in my pain journey, but the story has a happy ending. After years of searching and trying all kinds of different treatment methods, I found a solution that worked, Fascial Contouring.

I want to introduce you to the future of pain relief and long term change, PAINPAL!"

Stephan Guenette - Creator and Lead Facilitator

My twenties were largely spent as a mountain guide and outdoor athlete. I completed several remote expeditions, and served as a wilderness first aid instructor in the Arctic and for the Canadian military. Eventually I started to notice that my body was in constant pain, especially in my knees, hips and low back. I needed to find answers otherwise my fate was tied to being put on long surgical wait lists, without guarantee of successful outcomes. 

Now in my mid-thirties, I am pain free and more mobile than in my twenties. I even placed on the podium at the National Championships for Ninja warrior obstacle course racing.   

After over a decade of learning about Fascia and its relationship to pain and movement, many years of effort went into founding and developing these comprehensive manual therapy and movement programs at IMfit Health Innovations. It is now  a pleasure to introduce this bite-sized version of all our efforts to you via Fascial Self Release (FSR) and the PainPal App.

Ryan Verra - Creator and Visionary 

As a former professional and current extreme sport athlete, I've had my fair share of testing the body and a have had a host of injuries and challenges; from hitting a concrete wall in a formula car race at 9 x gravity to crashing in the Panamanian jungle on a skydiving stunt.

5 years ago I was introduced to my partners Phil and Stephan and their Fascial Contouring and Intentional Movement systems. I've seen the systems evolve into what it is today, through me any many other clients. Now at 38 yrs, my structure and body functions are similar to where I was more than a decade ago.  

Two years ago I invested in an extended research and development stage and offered my skillsets to add onto and create IMfit with Phil and Stephan. Taking these systems to the next level; into the advanced Bio-Hacking realm, here we created modalities no one had seen before and with such massive success and evolutionary change in ourselves and clients. 

As an adventurer I've spent much time around the world, deep in competition and on the edge of cliffs facing down into the abyss. As a former professional race car driver, I've had the opportunity to work with world class teachers and learning coaches to really test my self and dial in specific ways to retain information and create change. Gaining experience and training around the world in some very challenging environments has taught me a lot of skill sets in understanding the human psyche in specific ways; fear, emotional patterns and brain states.

Choosing to engage in these challenges came with many emotional challenges, injuries, dysfunctional patterns and traumas; all of which are translated into knowledge and functionality under what we have been able to develop and share with you here.

Bringing these skill sets and experience, and accompanied by current science, we have worked with developers to create an A.I. system that learns with you, from you, to create specific ways to teach retention learned programs and redefine how our bodies communicate with pain.  I'm very excited to have your support and take this journey with us. Thank you.

story:
A 360 degree approach to pet care.

Felcana takes a whole home approach to understanding your cat or dog. Our Helix health tracker on their collar works with our Micro-Location Beacons around the home to monitor all aspects of their health, behaviour and environment.

 

 

Using subtle Micro-Location Beacons, the Felcana system measures: activity; drinking; eating; sleeping; ambient temperature; and home location.

This 360 degree approach means you can understand your pet’s normal, and set goals for a healthy life together.

Micro-Location Beacons

Prototypes

Helices

 

 

 

 

With its comfortable and durable design, precise engineering and waterproof construction, Felcana meets the toughest daily demands of your cat or dog.

Felcana has four core components making up the Felcana Pack:  

Helix: a smart device that attaches to any cat or dog collar to track activity

Micro-Location Beacons: positioned around your home to track behavioural and environmental factors

Home Hub: Helix’s charging station, range extender, and your pet’s data nest

Universal clip: comfortably and securely connects Helix to any collar

Felcana was created by veterinarians for pet owners – the app is able to intelligently understand key signs of illness in every pet. We also know that pets are individuals – the app picks up on your cat or dog’s uniqueness and tailors insights according to habits and personality. Has your dog started sleeping a lot more, is your cat eating less. Know your pets normal.

 

Felcana is designed specifically for cats and dogs. The Helix is lightweight, miniaturised and comfortable for your pet. It’s also durable, robust and waterproof in order to withstand your cat or dog’s toughest adventures.   

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

The Felcana ecosystem is designed for you and your pet to stay connected all day, every day, providing reassurance for you, and cloud-based data for your vet.

 

Felcana is controlled through the free Felcana app. Our intelligent app translates pet sensor data and user inputs into actionable insights for truly personalised pet healthcare.   

100% free – no monthly subscription or hidden fees 

Mobile app available on iOS and Android 

Web app available for both desktop and mobile browsers 

All our apps and APIs are free for all users and third parties 

Compatible with Fitbit and Jawbone human fitness trackers

 

Use the app to:  

View your pet’s health at a glance using the easy-to-read health dashboard  

Track progress of any custom-set health goals and monitor any significant changes in activity or behaviour 

Receive early warning when your pet is unwell 

Connect with your vet, dog walker, trainer, groomer or anyone else important in your pet’s life

 

 

A world-class team of veterinarians and engineers have developed Felcana: to be the best, for your pet, for you and your vet. We’ve spent the last year designing, testing, and refining Felcana with:

Pet owners and their pets

Vets, vet nurses, and vet technicians

Dog walkers and groomers

Pet retailers

Ergonomics experts 

Our Kickstarter pledges will allow Felcana to improve the health and welfare of pets across the world. We want you and your pets to be part of our story.

 

 

 

 

 

The Felcana team invents and makes (and some of us are veterinary surgeons too). Between us we've created and delivered numerous digital products and consumer electronics devices. We've worked at Dyson, Raspberry Pi, SAM Labs, Morphy Richards, and Bain & Company (not to mention vet clinics, animal shelters, dog groomers and farms!). There are always challenges, but our promise is that we'll rise to meet them with all our might. As we always have done. We'll do everything in our power to leave our backers well looked after, and deliver their rewards on-time or early.

Felcana devices will be certified to operate in the regions we sell them in. We're working with Underwriters' Laboratories (UL), the global leader in testing and certification, to ensure all requirements are met. 
We've given a conservative estimate of delivery dates. We're committed to keeping you informed of our progress in the months following the campaign. Our promise to deliver will be challenged at all times by the known complexities of manufacturing, production scheduling, shipping between continents, and more.

In the event that unexpected issues arise in the delivery schedule, we will do our utmost to minimize the impact on our backers and dedicate ourselves to providing the best, most honest, experience.

As a backer you're incredibly important to us and we look forward to making you and your pets part of our story.
story_txt:
A 360 degree approach to pet care.Felcana takes a whole home approach to understanding your cat or dog. Our Helix health tracker on their collar works with our Micro-Location Beacons around the home to monitor all aspects of their health, behaviour and environment.  Using subtle Micro-Location Beacons, the Felcana system measures: activity; drinking; eating; sleeping; ambient temperature; and home location.This 360 degree approach means you can understand your pet’s normal, and set goals for a healthy life together.Micro-Location BeaconsPrototypesHelices

 
   With its comfortable and durable design, precise engineering and waterproof construction, Felcana meets the toughest daily demands of your cat or dog.Felcana has four core components making up the Felcana Pack:  Helix: a smart device that attaches to any cat or dog collar to track activityMicro-Location Beacons: positioned around your home to track behavioural and environmental factorsHome Hub: Helix’s charging station, range extender, and your pet’s data nestUniversal clip: comfortably and securely connects Helix to any collarFelcana was created by veterinarians for pet owners – the app is able to intelligently understand key signs of illness in every pet. We also know that pets are individuals – the app picks up on your cat or dog’s uniqueness and tailors insights according to habits and personality. Has your dog started sleeping a lot more, is your cat eating less. Know your pets normal. Felcana is designed specifically for cats and dogs. The Helix is lightweight, miniaturised and comfortable for your pet. It’s also durable, robust and waterproof in order to withstand your cat or dog’s toughest adventures.                               The Felcana ecosystem is designed for you and your pet to stay connected all day, every day, providing reassurance for you, and cloud-based data for your vet. Felcana is controlled through the free Felcana app. Our intelligent app translates pet sensor data and user inputs into actionable insights for truly personalised pet healthcare.   100% free – no monthly subscription or hidden fees Mobile app available on iOS and Android Web app available for both desktop and mobile browsers All our apps and APIs are free for all users and third parties Compatible with Fitbit and Jawbone human fitness trackers Use the app to:  View your pet’s health at a glance using the easy-to-read health dashboard  Track progress of any custom-set health goals and monitor any significant changes in activity or behaviour Receive early warning when your pet is unwell Connect with your vet, dog walker, trainer, groomer or anyone else important in your pet’s life  A world-class team of veterinarians and engineers have developed Felcana: to be the best, for your pet, for you and your vet. We’ve spent the last year designing, testing, and refining Felcana with:Pet owners and their petsVets, vet nurses, and vet techniciansDog walkers and groomersPet retailersErgonomics experts Our Kickstarter pledges will allow Felcana to improve the health and welfare of pets across the world. We want you and your pets to be part of our story.     The Felcana team invents and makes (and some of us are veterinary surgeons too). Between us we've created and delivered numerous digital products and consumer electronics devices. We've worked at Dyson, Raspberry Pi, SAM Labs, Morphy Richards, and Bain & Company (not to mention vet clinics, animal shelters, dog groomers and farms!). There are always challenges, but our promise is that we'll rise to meet them with all our might. As we always have done. We'll do everything in our power to leave our backers well looked after, and deliver their rewards on-time or early.Felcana devices will be certified to operate in the regions we sell them in. We're working with Underwriters' Laboratories (UL), the global leader in testing and certification, to ensure all requirements are met. We've given a conservative estimate of delivery dates. We're committed to keeping you informed of our progress in the months following the campaign. Our promise to deliver will be challenged at all times by the known complexities of manufacturing, production scheduling, shipping between continents, and more.In the event that unexpected issues arise in the delivery schedule, we will do our utmost to minimize the impact on our backers and dedicate ourselves to providing the best, most honest, experience.As a backer you're incredibly important to us and we look forward to making you and your pets part of our story.

story:
Who We Are

Hi, I'm Najah Salleh, the President and Founder of One Meal.  I have lived in Mebane, North Carolina for the last 6 years.  Those of you that know me also know I love to eat, so when I heard about the local food pantry in Mebane closing down I decided to do what I could to help those in my community who are food insecure.  The overall food insecurity rate in North Carolina is 18.6%, close to 2 million people!*  I was positive there was something, however small, I could do.  So I found a group of spectacularly amazing women (Corine Wilkins-Mebanite & Anne Zamorski-native New Yorker) with the same idea and One Meal was born.  We came up with the idea of feeding the hungry one hot meal each week and have been doing that for over a year now.  In that year, we have turned this little idea into an official 501(c)3 non-profit organization.  We are a group of dedicated women who live in Mebane, NC that are concerned about people going hungry in our community.  The goal of this campaign is to acquire funding to both maintain our current services and expand our efforts.

Who We Serve

"North Carolina ranks in the ten worst states in the percentage of children under 18 who are lacking food on a regular basis."**  One Meal provides a hot, nutritious meal to underserved families and individuals in Mebane every Monday evening.  It's not nearly enough, but it is something.  We started with 50 hot meals, we now serve anywhere from 70-80 hot meals every week.  As One Meal comes close to doubling the amount of people originally served it has become more and more obvious that the ability to put food on the table is a luxury many cannot afford.  The most gratifying part of One Meal is to see a hungry child sit down right there on the sidewalk and start eating immediately.  Over 40% of the children attending local elementary schools are eligible for reduced or free lunch.  In addition to serving children, One Meal serves the elderly, the differently-abled, the homebound and solitary individuals who need the help.

What We Need

It costs around $200 to feed 70 people a hot meal, although some meals are less expensive than others.  One Meal has hosted food drives and obtained in-kind donations from both local grocery stores and restaurants to mitigate the cost of the meals, but at this time we are petitioning for a years worth of funding, $10,400.  In 2014, the funds One Meal did receive were distributed as follows: 

  • 82% of donations went to the purchase of food and directly-related supplies (i.e. food containers for distribution, cutlery, small plastic cups to hold salad dressing and condiments, etc.).  
  • 16% consisted of administrative costs associated with getting licensed as a charitable organization in North Carolina and obtaining a 501c3 status from the IRS, and 
  • 2% of funding went towards transportation costs.  
One Meal does hope to be able to spend over 90% of future donations on food and directly-related costs as the IRS determination is of minimal cost to maintain and all individuals associated with the organization are volunteers. 

We want to feed people in a caring and compassionate manner and we are asking for your financial support in making this desire a continued reality.  If our goal is not reached we will use whatever funds that have been donated to keep feeding people in the manner that we have been. If you choose to donate, which we hope you will, know that your money is feeding the hungry in North Carolina. 

One Meal Vision

Mebane has no homeless shelter and targeting certain populations and demographics can be tricky.  We have used the local newspaper and word of mouth, but plan on using agencies already serving the population we feed like Social Services and reduced school lunch programs so that we can concentrate our efforts on those that need food the most.

One Meal's long term goal is to become a full-service soup kitchen that both serves hot meals every night to the hungry and delivers those hot meals to those that are homebound. We would like to involve Mebane businesses by having various local organizations purchase and prepare the meal 1 day out of each month.  In this manner the community would be taking care of its own.  We would need a facility/building to achieve this goal as One Meal is currently home-based.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute at this time, you can still help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about the One Meal campaign.
  • Share the One Meal Indiegogo campaign on facebook and twitter!

And that's all there is to it.  THANK YOU!

*http://www.feedingamerica.org/hunger-in-america/our-research/map-the-meal-gap/?_ga=1.26757437.1829484689.1427982020

**Data is from 2014 Hunger in America Study, by Feeding America and the Food Hardship in America 2012 Report from the Food Research and Action Center.

story:
Why We Need Your Help:

Sombra is ready for production, and we are fundraising to pay for a die-cut, silk-screens and to order a bunch of Polypropylene sheets to make the first production run. We need $3000 to make this happen. 


Why You Should Get a Sombra:

Here is why you should own a Sombra and consider contributing to this campaign:

  • Sombra will keep you safe, by making you visible from all directions.
  • Sombra will look awesome on any bike, city or mountain
  • Sombra is so easy to install, you can do it in the dark
  • Sombra will make you a friendly cyclist, to other cyclists as well as car drivers
  • Sombra is made of natural Polypropylene, it's 100% recyclable
  • Sombra will be locally made and we will ship it worldwide for free

 


How Sombra Came To Light:

One night, I was cruising the bicycle lanes in central London, when another cyclist flew by me.  He had one of those blinking, bright-red taillights, and in the dark it played some nasty tricks on my eyes. 

The light was so intense that even as the cyclist pushed further away, I kept feeling disoriented.  With cars on my right and the sidewalk to my left, I was forced to stop so I would avoid diving head first into the curb.Needless to say I was annoyed, but my annoyance quickly turned to irony when I realized I had the exact same type of taillight, and that I was probably annoying other cyclists too.

The next day, I went online to look for an alternative, non-blinding taillight. However, all I could find were lousy, cheap-looking things that could barely be seen from ten meters away.  I admit, I would rather blind someone than have them not see me at all.

That evening, before going to bed, I turned my reading lamp on to catch up on some reading, and then it hit me.  A lampshade! Not only will it eliminate the blinding effect of my taillight, it will also make others see me from directions they never could before!

Months and hundreds of iterations later, this "lampshade" turned from an idea to a product I now call Sombra, which I will make generally available as soon as this campaign meets its goal. 



Technical Information:

Please note, Sombra is a tail-light diffuser and requires an existing tail-light (not included). Please read below to make sure Sombra fits your bicycle and tail-light.

  • Sombra fits most bicycle seat-post clamps provided by top brands like Specialized, Trek, Giant, Raleigh, Cannondale and others. Sombra cannot be fitted on front bolt or diagonally cut clamps.
  • Sombra fits popular seat-post mounted tail lights including Mars 4.0, Planet Bike Superflash Turbo, PB Blinky 7, PB Blinky Super Flash, Portland Design Works Red Planet, PB Blinky 5, Cateye Reflex, NiteRider Cherry Bomb, PDW Danger Zone, Cateye Rapid 3, Knog Frog Strobe and Cateye Rapid 5. Sombra does not fit rack, helmet, handlebar or bag mounted lights, or lights that protrude more than 5.5 cm (2 inches) from the seat-post.



The Sombra Design Proccess:

The first ever Sombra design made of paper and aluminium: 

The next few models were experiments with Polypropylene:

The first design with a seat-post clamp connection instead of a bracket:



Important Notes:

As with all products, moving to the production phase reveals new challenges, we will do everything to make sure Sombra is ready in time and made with attention to detail and to the highest quality possible.

I have personally brought many complex products to market over the past twelve years, be sure that if any set-backs arise I will meet the challenges and make sure Sombra is ready and on its way to you! 

Safety Disclaimer:

Cycling on roads is dangerous, as long as we share our route with motorists we are more vulnerable then they are; be safe! wear a helmet, wear high visibility gear and use bicycle lights. Sombra alone cannot keep you safe, you need to ride safe and use the appropriate safety gear always!

Thank you for supporting us!

Sincerely,

Offer Canfi

story:
That Damned Gym

The reason for founding That Damned Gym is simple: I am here to offer an alternative to the culture that big gyms have to offer. That Damned Gym is here to cater to those of you who are dedicated to the betterment of yourself and realize that there are no shortcuts.


Why does Oslo need That Damned Gym?

There is a lack of gyms in Oslo that offer dedicated people a motivating environment. The average gym is excellent at providing pats on the back and boosts to one's ego. This may be enough for some. That Damned Gym will provide something else entirely.

That Damned Gym offers pain, suffering, and results. There will be hard-working individuals around you at all times, pushing you past what you thought yourself capable of.

Bench pressing 200 kg and having big biceps isn't necessarily what we're after. Big numbers are great, but That Damned Gym values commitment and the willingness to continuously push yourself farther. As we will be dedicated members only, you won't find people hogging the squat rack to do bicep curls, people taking selfies, nor mirrors to flex in.


How will That Damned Gym work?

To become a member of That Damned Gym, members must pass an evaluation period. This will last three months. Members will be judged on both physical and mental progress, effort, and attitude. After these three months it will be clear if the member is fit to remain in the That Damned Gym family. This is to ensure that the environment remains productive and that you as a member get your money's worth.

To remain a member after the evaluation period, just keep up the hard work. Simple.


Why donate?

That Damned Gym will be opening no matter what. The reason I am seeking additional funding is to expand the gym as quickly as possible. In other words, there will be a place for your personal training sessions even before the final goal is achieved.

By donating you are helping more than a training studio. You are helping spread That Damned Gym's ideals and focus on true fitness, not just the appearance of it.

story:
For details of Patron Program, click here.

ALL ANDROIRD, IOS, WINDOWS APPS for FREE!

3DH technique is reverse of breathing regulation by yoga.  By studying researchers of modern times and ancient sages on effects of respiration rate, rhythm and cycle, we built breathing sensors and algorithm which tracks burnout levels of your body. This helps you intervene to uplift your health with right workouts, exercises and yoga to maintain health and fitness.  


For any queries and suggestions, mail us. We are listening 

Email: support@nozpad.com

BILL OF MATERIAL for POC of BREEZE
  1. Two Breathing Sensor (special Microphones)
  2. Bluetooth Board
  3. Power Unit 250 mAH
  4. Two Nose pads 

What is Science of Three Dimensional Health Indicative Breathing?

 Answer: Rate, Rhythm, Cycle

3DH tracks the three key parameters of respiration to diagnose vital health parameters and predicts evolving health systems. Following are of few of key top level research papers to refer.

PREDICTIVE RESEARCH on RESPIRATION

  • https://www.mja.com.au/journal/2008/188/11/respiratory-rate-neglected-vital-sign
  • http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/16723921
  • http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8410395
  • http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15918825
  • http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15797273
  • http://erj.ersjournals.com/content/9/2/371.full.pdf
  • http://www.bg.ic.ac.uk/research/r.schroter/paper3.pdf
  • http://www.jiaci.org/issues/vol21issue01/1.pdf
  • http://informahealthcare.com/doi/abs/10.3109/00016489409126084
  • http://paperity.org/p/37496859/assessment-of-nasal-parameters-in-determination-of-olfactory-dysfunction-in-parkinsons
  • http://www.slideshare.net/drbhargav/nasal-cycle-swara-yoga

Health Alarm: NOZPAD predicts workout needs and health deviations.

HIGH ACCURACY

Nozpad devices have high accuracy of 99.6% 3DH respiration tracking during measurements in test conditions with natural ambient noise.


PERKS.

Our Indiegogo backers get 40% off on each of 3 device.

You also get the exclusive entry in our beta BREEZE, SOLO & ADVENTURE program. Join the gang!

Stay updated on Beta program.

GIVE FEEDBACK. SHARE OPINION. JOIN THE CROWD.
Tweet & Share #Nozpad to win (TBA at End of Campaign, 10 Each)

 




Nozpad Type 1. Meet ADVENTURE!  


Nozpad Type 2. Trendy SOLO Eyewear!


Nozpad Type 3. Easy BREEZE!


SOLO has same features as BREEZE and built into a wearable eyewear which makes it an optimal choice for home, office, party and outdoor usage. You can connect these wearables with Android, iOS and Windows app.


ADVENTURE is like Google Android glass, just wear it and do your stuffs. Health tracking is natively built in hardwares of the device.

To use SOLO or BREEZE, firstly power-on the device, connect with your smart-phone(or smart glass or PC) using bluetooth and open the Nozpad app on mobile. And wear your device.


With such a powerful respiration tracking system, we are creating decentralised #InternetOfHealth system. Nozpad can become Bitcoin of Health!
* * * * *
WE ARE MAKING A SOCIAL IMPACT
NOZPAD is wearable nose-wear and eyewear device for tracking of breathing rate, rhythm and cycle for health and fitness. This predicts early warning signs of evolving health conditions.
Join us to make an open and accessible standard of health diagnosis #InternetOfHealth 

 


We are adding more breathing diagnostic medical templates through machine model.

OUR MOTIVATION
We have experienced breathing challenges of many people who had problems of shallow breath, asthma, apnea, sleep-breath disorder and other chronic challenges. These problem has become widely more concerning for childrens who are often not able to express their pains or their physiological deviations and consequently these are often ignored because of milder symptoms. This has motivated us to research the diagnosis methods and requirements of an improved preventive technique. 



FOR ALL ACTIVITIES

Nozpad is suitable for all age groups and all types of activities including during sleep. 

NOZPAD DIAGNOSTIC FEATURES

 Nozpad app provides Status & Prediction types of health diagnosis. 
  1. Current and Trailing Statistics  shows rhythm line graphs of left and right nostril air pressure(waves), breathing rate variation and Body-Mass-Index to Breath Ratio.

  2. Three Dimensional Health predictive diagnosis is the crucial part of Live Health monitoring system which shows average breath shortfall and identified health conditions.


Explain: Average Breath Shortfall: A metric of breathing balance measure and completeness of breathing. It has three levels, 
(a) Green zone(Below 50%) indicates safe level
(b) Blue zone(50% - 80%) indicates concern and needs intervention.
(c) Red zone(>80%) indicates special attention and expert consulting.

Explain: Health Indications: This is a predictive metric derived from pattern of breathing rate, rhythm and cycle. We employ machine learning models built using exhaustive datasets of test cases to identify cardio activity, airflow, and balance of overall physical system. These indicators are helpful to consult with an expert of breath diagnosis.
We will gradually add more health indications to create a universal health standards based on breathing.

Demo of using Nozpad for general destressing workouts

NOZPAD SOCIAL FEATURES
You can create a closed group of family, friends, and expert health advisors using the social app for an improved lifestyle management.


DATA PRIVACY
Social features of Nozpad are optional and predictive functions work without sharing your data with us. We never share direct or indirect affiliated data with any third party.
Our privacy policy is available at http://www.nozpad.com/ts/privacy.html
Our warranty is available at http://www.nozpad.com/ts/refund.html

MEDICAL APPLICABILITY AND RELIABILITY

NOZPAD is built using computer based machine learning techniques derived from proven medical parameters. And human touch and care is irreplaceable as in case of doctors, expert professionals and specialised therapists.


PRODUCT IMPACT VISION

We aim to create low cost health diagnosis system based on integration of many bodies of knowledge. So that a sustainable health system can be created for new global economic challenges of affordability and viability for masses. In long term, we aim to reduce the cost of Nozpad upto one dollar for globalised affordability through creating an ecosystem of health service providers and beneficiaries. We call it Internet of Health powered by breathing. It will be secure, source-anonymised for privacy and low-cost health syste. Also the platform will be open for public audits and open api for free collaboration and further innovation. 



PRODUCT TECHNOLOGY

BREEZE and SOLO are based on Bluetooth technology for connecting with a smartphone for connectivity. These devices are power efficient as all the signal processing is done with wave spectrum analysis and filter on-chip. Therefore smartphones are not impacted with any processing overheads. The wireless technologies used by Nozpad are compliant to strict regulations of US and European governing units. Nozpad is a patent pending technology.

The TEAM

Nozpad was founded by couple Sharmistha and Prabhat in 2014. They have combined experience of 15 years and backed by developers, analysts and designers who bring-in cutting edge advantage to their vision. Originally formed in Pune, the company is operated from Singapore and Toronto along with channel partners.


HOW FAR HAVE WE REACHED?

We are currently pre-beta-testing our products in the pilot program with athletes in Pune, India. We are ready to got for production stage for ADVENTURE smart glasses, SOLO Eyewears glasses, and micro-compact BREEZE nosewear device. 


Risks and challenges

SOLO & BREEZE are completely tested and working while ADVENTURE is in progress at rapid pace. We’re currently ramping up at our factory and are ready to see this campaign go big.

Forecasting Risk

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan. We’ve learned a lot from the past one year, but sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk

We’ve built a very capable team who have worked for the past 1 year on this technology. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Terms and Conditions

All backers with EU shipping addresses will have their rewards fulfilled by our notified agent.
story_txt:
For details of Patron Program, click here.
ALL ANDROIRD, IOS, WINDOWS APPS for FREE!

3DH technique is reverse of breathing regulation by yoga.  By studying researchers of modern times and ancient sages on effects of respiration rate, rhythm and cycle, we built breathing sensors and algorithm which tracks burnout levels of your body. This helps you intervene to uplift your health with right workouts, exercises and yoga to maintain health and fitness.  

For any queries and suggestions, mail us. We are listening 
Email: support@nozpad.com









BILL OF MATERIAL for POC of BREEZE
Two Breathing Sensor (special Microphones)
Bluetooth Board
Power Unit 250 mAH
Two Nose pads 









What is Science of Three Dimensional Health Indicative Breathing?
 Answer: Rate, Rhythm, Cycle
3DH tracks the three key parameters of respiration to diagnose vital health parameters and predicts evolving health systems. Following are of few of key top level research papers to refer.
PREDICTIVE RESEARCH on RESPIRATION

https://www.mja.com.au/journal/2008/188/11/respiratory-rate-neglected-vital-sign
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/16723921
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8410395
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15918825
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/15797273
http://erj.ersjournals.com/content/9/2/371.full.pdf
http://www.bg.ic.ac.uk/research/r.schroter/paper3.pdf
http://www.jiaci.org/issues/vol21issue01/1.pdf
http://informahealthcare.com/doi/abs/10.3109/00016489409126084
http://paperity.org/p/37496859/assessment-of-nasal-parameters-in-determination-of-olfactory-dysfunction-in-parkinsons
http://www.slideshare.net/drbhargav/nasal-cycle-swara-yoga






Health Alarm: NOZPAD predicts workout needs and health deviations.


HIGH ACCURACY
Nozpad devices have high accuracy of 99.6% 3DH respiration tracking during measurements in test conditions with natural ambient noise.




PERKS.
Our Indiegogo backers get 40% off on each of 3 device.
You also get the exclusive entry in our beta BREEZE, SOLO & ADVENTURE program. Join the gang!
Stay updated on Beta program.



GIVE FEEDBACK. SHARE OPINION. JOIN THE CROWD.

Tweet & Share #Nozpad to win (TBA at End of Campaign, 10 Each)
 





Nozpad Type 1. Meet ADVENTURE!  






Nozpad Type 2. Trendy SOLO Eyewear!



Nozpad Type 3. Easy BREEZE!



SOLO has same features as BREEZE and built into a wearable eyewear which makes it an optimal choice for home, office, party and outdoor usage. You can connect these wearables with Android, iOS and Windows app.





ADVENTURE is like Google Android glass, just wear it and do your stuffs. Health tracking is natively built in hardwares of the device.To use SOLO or BREEZE, firstly power-on the device, connect with your smart-phone(or smart glass or PC) using bluetooth and open the Nozpad app on mobile. And wear your device.






With such a powerful respiration tracking system, we are creating decentralised #InternetOfHealth system. Nozpad can become Bitcoin of Health!


* * * * *
WE ARE MAKING A SOCIAL IMPACTNOZPAD is wearable nose-wear and eyewear device for tracking of breathing rate, rhythm and cycle for health and fitness. This predicts early warning signs of evolving health conditions.Join us to make an open and accessible standard of health diagnosis #InternetOfHealth 
 






We are adding more breathing diagnostic medical templates through machine model.


OUR MOTIVATION
We have experienced breathing challenges of many people who had problems of shallow breath, asthma, apnea, sleep-breath disorder and other chronic challenges. These problem has become widely more concerning for childrens who are often not able to express their pains or their physiological deviations and consequently these are often ignored because of milder symptoms. This has motivated us to research the diagnosis methods and requirements of an improved preventive technique. 








FOR ALL ACTIVITIES

Nozpad is suitable for all age groups and all types of activities including during sleep. 


NOZPAD DIAGNOSTIC FEATURES


 Nozpad app provides Status & Prediction types of health diagnosis. 


Current and Trailing Statistics  shows rhythm line graphs of left and right nostril air pressure(waves), breathing rate variation and Body-Mass-Index to Breath Ratio.


Three Dimensional Health predictive diagnosis is the crucial part of Live Health monitoring system which shows average breath shortfall and identified health conditions.




Explain: Average Breath Shortfall: A metric of breathing balance measure and completeness of breathing. It has three levels, 
(a) Green zone(Below 50%) indicates safe level
(b) Blue zone(50% - 80%) indicates concern and needs intervention.
(c) Red zone(>80%) indicates special attention and expert consulting.


Explain: Health Indications: This is a predictive metric derived from pattern of breathing rate, rhythm and cycle. We employ machine learning models built using exhaustive datasets of test cases to identify cardio activity, airflow, and balance of overall physical system. These indicators are helpful to consult with an expert of breath diagnosis.
We will gradually add more health indications to create a universal health standards based on breathing.

Demo of using Nozpad for general destressing workouts

You can create a closed group of family, friends, and expert health advisors using the social app for an improved lifestyle management.

Also the platform will be open for public audits and open api for free collaboration and further innovation.

These devices are power efficient as all the signal processing is done with wave spectrum analysis and filter on-chip. Therefore smartphones are not impacted with any processing overheads. The wireless technologies used by Nozpad are compliant to strict regulations of US and European governing units. Nozpad is a patent pending technology.

They have combined experience of 15 years and backed by developers, analysts and designers who bring-in cutting edge advantage to their vision. We are currently pre-beta-testing our products in the pilot program with athletes in Pune, India. We are ready to got
