story:
Ver la campaña en español



Watch LSE video

Watch testimonal video

The fluttering of sound


You do not need to search the sound anymore.

The sound flies to you, feel its fluttering. You can disconnect the mind, and trust that your WIIM© Smartwatch works as a second skin to extend your senses.

The places with WIIM© technology use the last advances of wearable products. Your WIIM©Smartwatch absorbs certain hearing signals from the environment and transforms them into vibration.

People with hearing impairments remain sensory connected with their environment when WIIM© technology is added to a place. Their smartwatch detects alerts and  alarms around them which are transformed into sensations for their skin. Spaces with sensory effect.


WIIM© Technology

WIIM© is a new technological product designed by us with care and dedication for the only purpose of making life easier for people with hearing problems.

We aim is to provide you with adequate wellbeing and return the freedom and sense of tranquillity to those who need to control what they cannot hear. 

Turn your home into a place with sensory effect with WIIM© Technology, and let the sound caress you.


After installing WIIM© in your home, you may feel the doorbell and daily notifications from your environment in your skin with a soft and precise fluttering. You will know if your phone is ringing, the baby cries or the  washer already finished. It also protects you by alerting if smoke, gas, water or other situation is detected.

WIIM© creates a virtual and sensory space, where all alerts and alarms activated in its action radius are transmitted with tactile effect to the person.  

We want you discover your daily routine with this new way of  feeling the space and sound.


Transmitters:

1.  Door sensor
It detects if someone knocks the door

2. Appliance sensor
It detects when the appliances have finished

3. Smoke sensor
It detects fire 

4. Gas sensor
It detects toxic, volatile and flammable gases leakage

5. Flood sensor 
It detects water in not appropriate zones

6. Weather alert
It alerts about natural phenomena (tornadoes, storms, etc.)

And we are working on other integrations which are included in the section of  “Improvements/Goals”.



Friend button (SOS)

If you need help

If you need help you can push the friend button. You do not need to be within the action radius of WIIM©. The friend button is available 24 hours  a day to assist you when you have a difficulty, in any place (home, street, etc.).

* Geolocation data is stored encrypted and can only be accessed in case of emergency.

** Medical data is stored with strong encryption specially HL7 data.



Your contact person is also informed

The contact person registered for your friend button will always be informed about the notifications that you are receiving through the Smartwatch. We have developed this application for them for iOS and Android.


2 houses, just one WIIM©    

The innovative value of WIIM© Technology includes not only its capacity to create a virtual place where the person may receive all alarms, but also its technological umbrella, the internet connection (IoT) and the possibility to share sensors connecting several places to the same system. 

Someone with two or more houses with WIIM© technology will receive all signals automatically activated in each action radius, as the person is in either house. 


Accessible community

And It is important for us that this technology allows to connect us at human levels, since it links public and private (home) places, constructing a more accessible community for everybody, where the minority's needs are also listened by the majority. The creation and connection of places accessible for everyone allow us to be closer.

Those who have WIIM© Smartwatch will receive the alarms and alerts in their houses, offices and leisure places (according to the contracted services) without cost, if these places have the system installed with their action radius in which the watch will be connected.


Companies, Institutions

Reinventing services

The companies, besides the classic safety sensors (water, gas, fire, etc.), may adapt their WIIM services, according to their areas and specific needs, discovering new ways of accessibility.

If your company wants to know the customized services offered by us, contact us and we will be pleased to inform you about all the possibilities.


Accessible Hotel

Ex:  Notification of breakfasts and hotel offers.




WIIM© facilitates its App for people with watches who want to install the service.


SDK for developers

WIIM© facilitates the access through an API Restful, so you can integrate your own sensors. Develop your own applications using WIIM alerts. 

Available from February 2016.


Thematic application

WIIM© also wants to help their clients increase their possibilities of living new spaces and leisure activities. Therefore, we are working on the development of mobile applications that provide enjoyment in the following areas:

  • Guided tours with videos subtitled in sign language.
  • Visits to Museums
  • Research on “text to speech” and “speech to text”, it means, the possiblity of bringing the voice of a call to text and vice versa.


    • Rewards




    Installation at home

    The installation at home is simple, without wiring of all wireless elements which can be adapted to the needs of every place. The home kit is constituted by the following elements:

    - Gateway (data collecting and internet connection)

    - Series of wireless sensors connected to gateway:

    • Fire detection sensors 
    • Gas leak sensor
    • Flood sensor
    • Toxic gas sensors
    • Triggers to be integrated to the different appliances.
    • Wireless buttons for the doorbell.
    • Wirelles emergency buttons to be installed in strategic and potentially dangerous places such as the tub.

    Gateway and sensors with  backup battery to prevent it from switching off if there is a cut-off of the power supply. It has connection to internet to send alerts.


    Funding goal

    WIIM© Background


    Team

    Antonio Sánchez Pineda

    CEO, Computer Engineer specialized in IoT and Fiware. 6 years of experience. Developer of  web and mobile applications for Google Glass, Android Wear, Pebble and Epson BT-200.  Full time commitment.

    Beatriz Valiente Rodríguez

    Marketing and communication. More than 9 years  of experience in marketing and communication, working in companies such as McCann Erickson. Full time commitment.

    Raúl Molina Sánchez

    3 years of experience as developer of mobile applications.

    Ana Belén Vera Cárdenas

    Communication. 

    José Alberto Casanueva Pérez

    Software developer. 

    Jesús Agustín Castillo Gómez

    Software developer. 


    Thanks to:

    Rafael Maranon-Abreu

    Advisor and mentor of our project from beginning, he helps us about his vision of the product and how to improve it in order to final customer can enjoy it. Currently he is working as Product Manager in Amazon Lab126.

    Fernano Molina Rodríguez

    Graphic designer with more than 10 years of experience.


    Guarantee and confidentiality

    • We guarantee privacy in the case of doorbells and appliances.
    • 2 years of warranty
    • Geolocation data is stored encrypted and can only be accessed in case of emergency.
    • Medical data is stored with strong encryption HL7 data.

    You may consult our Legal Advice and Privacity Police in the following link:




    FAQs


    1. About us

    We are Hearing Software, a group of people who got together to create WIIM© project. From the beginning we wanted to work alongside deaf people, from friends and family with hearing problems who helped us transmitting their real needs and entities, such as associations dedicated to help people with hearing disabilities, have taken part in our project, validating our thesis, advising and suggesting improvements to develop a product that provides real solution in their lives. WIIM© is a product that uses technology as a channel to help people with hearing disabilities.


    2. Using the Friend Button (SOS)

    The friend button (SOS) is an orange, easily accessible, located on the watch and user can always use it when he-she feels at risk or help is needed. The friend button (SOS) has access to GPS to facilitate location and medical record helping to act quickly and wisely. By using the button, a warning will be sent to the mobile phone registered in our servers (application available on mobile).

    There is an option to upgrade and connect to emergency services (only on those countries available).


    3. Is my data stored safely?

    Yes, WIIM© is 100% secure. Geolocation data is stored encrypted and can only be accessed in case of an emergency. Similarly, medical data is stored under strong encryption using HL7 medical data.


    4. What is included in each WIIM© Pack?


    1) WIIM Pack 1 Home + watch

    It includes a pack with five sensors, a SmartWatch WIIM©, service alerts and notifications all inclusive (IoT) and mobile applications:

    -1 WIIM© Smartwatch

    -1 Pack of sensors:

    • 1 sensor for the doorbell
    • 1 sensor to detect smoke/gas/fire
    • 2 sensors to detect order two appliances
    • 1 sensor for detecting flooding

    -WIIM mobile - Applications created WIIM©.


    2) WIIM Pack 1 Home without watch 

    It includes a pack with five sensors, service alerts and notifications all inclusive (IoT) and mobile applications.

    This option does not include our WIIM© SmartWatch because it is designed for those who want to use their own SmartWatch. In that case you can download the application and install on your Android wear, Pebble or iWatch.)

    -1 Pack of sensors:

    • 1 sensor for the doorbell
    • 1 sensor to detect smoke/gas/fire
    • 2 sensors to detect order two appliances
    • 1 sensor for detecting flooding

    -WIIM mobile - Applications created WIIM©.


    5. What is the crowdfunded gift?

    The crowdfunded gift is our initiative to give WIIM© to one or more persons (depending on the money raised) who have financial difficulties and cannot afford WIIM©. People will be chosen by a deaf association. WIIM© will not make receive any profit and the money raised will go entirely to produce the packs


    6. Can I buy sensors separately?

    Yes, we also have available other sensors such as "baby warnings", "motion detectors", "intercom between rooms", among others. As these become available you can contact us and extend your WIIM© Pack with these new premium sensors and economic conditions. In addition, we continue to work on developing new integrations.


    7. How can I install it?

    There are two ways. You can install WIIM© yourself or ask for an installer. If you wish to install on your own, you will have a full tutorial support, a full guide and all our channels available to help you with success. But if you prefer that someone do it for you, WIIM© is currently training several engineers in different  areas to carry out  this service for you. When placing your order, please indicate whether you want the self-installing kit or not and, depending on your local area, will notify you if  it is available and how much it would cost.


    8. Is it warranted?

    Yes, WIIM© comes with two years warranty.


    9. When I will get it?

    February 2016. 

    Do not worry, we will contact to let you know the exact delivery date and we will keep sending regular updates with the order status.


    10. What can I do if I have any questions, problems or suggestions?

    You can contact us through email (support@wiim.eu), web (wiim.eu), Skype (TBA) and forum (TBA) for any questions, suggestions, problems you may have.





    Ver vídeo en LSE

    Ver vídeo testimonial

    El aleteo del sonido

    Ya no es necesario correr en busca del sonido.

    El sonido vuela hasta ti, siente su aleteo. Puedes desconectar la mente, y confiar en que tu WIIM©  Smartwatch funciona como una segunda piel para extender tus sentidos.

    Los espacios con la tecnología WIIM©  usan los últimos avances de los productos wearable. Tu WIIM©  Smartwatch absorbe determinadas señales auditivas de tu entorno y las transforma en vibración. 

    Cuando a un espacio le sumas la tecnología WIIM© , las personas con problemas de audición permanecen sensorialmente conectadas con su entorno. Su Smartwatch capta avisos y alarmas que suceden a su alrededor y los transforma en sensaciones para su piel. Espacios con efecto sensorial.


    WIIM© Technology

    WIIM©  es un nuevo producto tecnológico, diseñado por nosotros con mimo y esmero con el único fin de hacer la vida más fácil a las personas que tienen problemas de audición.

    Nuestro deseo es darles bienestar. Devolver la libertad y la sensación de tranquilidad a aquellas personas que necesitan controlar lo que no llegan a escuchar. Por ello creamos espacios adaptados para todos, en los que el sentido del tacto nos guía y nos permite movernos, a través del sonido, con autonomía y flexibilidad.

    Convierte tu hogar en un espacio con efecto sensorial con WIIM© Technology, y déjate acariciar por el sonido. 


    Al instalar WIIM©  en tu hogar sentirás como los timbres y avisos diarios de tu entorno llegan a tu piel con un suave pero preciso aleteo avisándote si han llamado a la puerta, si está sonando el teléfono, si llora el bebé, o si ya ha acabado la lavadora que pusiste. Además te protege avisándote si detecta la señal de humo, gas, agua u otras situaciones de alerta.

    De forma invisible WIIM©  genera un espacio virtual pero sensorial, donde todas las alertas y avisos activados en su radio de acción se transmiten a la persona con efecto táctil.  

    Con WIIM©  queremos que descubras cómo es tu día a día con esta nueva manera de vivir el espacio y el sonido.




    Transmisores:

    1.  Sensor puerta
    Detecta si llaman a la puerta

    2. Sensor electrodomésticos
    Detecta el fin de los  electrodomésticos

    3. Sensor humo
    Detecta incendios

    4. Sensor gas
    Detecta fuga de gases tóxicos, volátiles e inflamables

    5. Sensor inundación
    Detecta agua en zonas no apropiadas

    6. Alerta meteorológica
    Aviso de fenómenos naturales (tornados, tormentas, etc.)

    Y otras integraciones en la que estamos trabajando e incluimos en el apartado de “Mejoras/Metas”.




    Botón Amigo (SOS)

    Siempre que necesites ayuda

    Siempre que necesites ayuda puedes pulsar el botón amigo. No es necesario que estés dentro del área de acción de WIIM© . El botón amigo está disponible 24 horas del día para atenderte cuando sientas dificultad o riesgo, en cualquier lugar (casa, calle, etc.), dentro y fuera del radio de acción.

    *Los datos de geolocalización se guardan cifrados y solo se puede acceder a ellos en caso de emergencia.

    **Datos médicos son guardados con cifrado de Seguridad Alta para datos médicos HL7.

    Tu persona de contacto, también informada

    La persona de contacto que hayas puesto para tu botón de amigo estará siempre avisada de las alertas que te llegan a ti a través del Smartwatch. Para ellos hemos desarrollado esta aplicación móvil para iOS y Android.


    2 viviendas, 1 solo WIIM© 

    El valor innovador de WIIM©  Technology no es solo la capacidad de crear ese espacio virtual donde la persona recibe todas las alertas sino que además su paraguas tecnológico, la conexión a internet (IoT) y la posibilidad de compartir sensores permite que el servicio llegue más lejos generando la posibilidad de conectar varios espacios a un mismo sistema.



    Una persona con dos o más viviendas que instale el servicio recibirá automáticamente todas las señales que se activen en cada uno de los radios de acción, según se encuentre en una u otra casa. 


    Sociedad accesible
    Y algo importante para nosotros es que esta tecnología nos da la posibilidad de conectarnos a nivel humano ya que une espacios, tanto privados (hogares) como públicos, acercándonos a la idea de construir una sociedad más accesible para todos, donde las necesidades de una minoría sean también escuchadas por la mayoría. La creación y conexión de espacios que sean accesibles para todos nos permite estar más cerca los unos de los otros. (poner en negro)


    Aquellas personas que dispongan de WIIM© Smartwatch recibirán los avisos y notificaciones en casa (según servicios contratados) pero también podrán seguir recibiendo avisos en su entorno laboral, en sus zonas de ocio, etc. (sin coste) siempre y cuando estos espacios/establecimientos tengan instalado el sistema con su radio de acción a donde se conectarán sus relojes.


    Empresas, Instituciones

    Reinventado servicios

    Las empresas, además de los sensores clásicos de seguridad (agua, gas, fuego, etc.), podrán adaptar los servicios de WIIM© según su área temática y necesidades específicas, descubriendo nuevas formas de accesibilidad.

    Si eres empresa y quieres conocer los servicios personalizados que podemos ofrecerte, ponte en contacto con nosotros, estaremos encantados de contarte todas las posibilidades.


    Hotel Accesible

    Ej. Aviso de desayunos y ofertas del hotel.







    WIIM©  facilita su App para las personas que tengan sus propios relojes y quieran instalarles el servicio.


    SDK para desarrolladores

    WIIM©  facilita el acceso a través de una API Restful para que puedas integrar tus propios sensores. Desarrolla tus propias aplicaciones usando las alertas de WIIM© . 


    Aplicaciones temáticas

    WIIM©  también quiere contribuir a que sus clientes aumenten sus posibilidades a la hora de vivir nuevos espacios y formas de ocio. Para ello estamos trabajando en el desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles que aporten disfrute en los siguientes ámbitos:

    • Rutas guiadas turísticas con video en lengua de signos y subtítulos.
    • Visita en Museos
    • Investigación sobre “text to speech” y “speech to text” (llevar la voz de una llamada a texto y viceversa.)


    Recompensas



    Instalación en el hogar

    La instalación en el hogar es sencilla, sin cableado, de todos los elementos inalámbricos lo cual permite adaptarse a todas las necesidades de cada espacio. El kit hogar está compuesto:
    - Gateway (recolector de datos y conexión a internet)
    - Serie de sensores inalámbricos conectados al gateway

    • Sensores de detección de incendio
    • Sensores de fugas de gas
    • Sensores de inundación
    • Sensores de gases tóxicos
    • Triggers para integrarlos con los distintos electrodomésticos.
    • Botones inalámbricos tanto para el timbre de la puerta.
    • Botones inalámbricos de emergencia que instalan en lugares estratégicos y potencialmente peligrosos como la bañera.

    Gateway y sensores con batería de respaldo para evitar que se apague en caso de caída de suministro eléctrico y con conexión a internet para poder mandar las alertas.



    Objetivo de financiación

    Historia WIIM©


    Equipo

    Antonio Sánchez Pineda

    CEO, ingeniero informático especializado en IoT y Fiware. 6 años de experiencia. Desarrollador de aplicaciones web y móviles para Google Glass, Android Wear, Pebble y Epson BT-200. Dedicación full time.

    José Cámara Placencia

    Ingeniero industrial e ingeniero informático. Más de 35 años de experiencia desarrollando sistemas electrónicos. Ha trabajado en empresas como Corpoelec, en la cual diseñó la modernización de la tercera hidroeléctrica más grande del mundo llamada Guri en Venezuela. Dedicación full time.

    Beatriz Valiente Rodríguez

    Marketing y comunicación. Más de 9 años de experiencia en el sector del marketing y la comunicación, trabajando en empresas como McCann Erickson. Dedicación full time.

    Raúl Molina Sánchez

    3 años de experiencia como Desarrollador de aplicaciones móviles.

    Ana Belén Vera Cárdenas

    Communication. 

    José Alberto

    Software developer. 

    Jesús

    Software developer. 


    Agradecimientos a:

    Rafael Maranon-Abreu

    Asesor y mentor de nuestro proyecto desde el principio, nos aconseja sobre su visión del producto y cómo mejorarlo para que el usuario final pueda disfrutarlo al máximo. Actualmente trabaja como Product Manager en Amazon Lab126.

    Fernano Molina Rodríguez

    Diseñador gráfico con más de 10 años de experiencia.


    Garantías y confidencialidad

    • Los datos de geolocalización se guardan cifrados y solo se puede acceder a ellos en caso de emergencia.
    • Los datos médicos son guardados con cifrado de Seguridad Alta para datos médicos HL7.
    •  Garantizamos privacidad en el caso de los timbres de la puerta y electrodomésticos.
    • 2 años de garantía.

    Consulte nuestros Avisos legales y Política de Privacidad en el siguiente enlace:




    Proceso I+D+i


    Evolución:

    Primeras pruebas de sensores y verificación del servidor.


    Sensores comerciales que finalmente serán usados con WIIM. 


    FAQs


    1. ¿Quiénes somos?

    Somos Hearing Software, un grupo de personas que se ha unido para dar vida al proyecto WIIM©. Desde el principio hemos querido ir de la mano de las personas sordas, desde amigos y familiares con problemas de audición que nos han ido ayudando y transmitiendo sus necesidades reales hasta entidades claves para ellos como las federaciones y confederaciones que han ido escuchando nuestro proyecto, validando nuestras hipótesis, aconsejando y sugiriendo mejoras para desarrollar un producto que aporte solución real en sus vidas. WIIM© es nuestra propuesta de valor, un producto que usa la tecnología como canal y la pone al servicio de la comunidad sorda. 


    2. ¿Qué incluye el Botón Amigo (SOS)?

    El botón amigo (SOS) es un botón naranja, de fácil acceso, ubicado en el reloj para que la persona lo pueda pulsar siempre que se sienta en peligro o considere que necesita ayuda. Con GPS, para facilitar la localización y con historial médico para actuar rápidamente y con buen criterio. Al pulsarlo llegará un aviso al móvil del familiar o persona de contacto (aplicación disponible en el móvil).

    Opcionalmente, se podrá solicitar los servicios de teleasistencia en los países que esté disponible para coordinar familiares y servicios de emergencias.


    3. ¿Mis datos están protegidos?

    Sí, WIIM© es 100% seguro. Los datos de geolocalización se guardan cifrados y solo se puede acceder a ellos en caso de emergencia. Igualmente, los datos médicos son guardados con cifrado de Seguridad Alta para datos médicos HL7.


    4. ¿Qué incluye los Pack WIIM©?


    1) Pack WIIM 1 Hogar + reloj

    Incluye un pack con 5 sensores, un Smartwatch WIIM©, el servicio de alertas y notificaciones todo incluido (IoT) y aplicaciones para móviles.

    Desglose:

    -1 WIIM© Smartwatch

    -1 Pack de sensores:

    • 1 sensor para el timbre de la puerta
    • 1 sensor para detectar humo/gas/fuego
    • 2 sensores para detectar el fin de dos electrodomésticos
    • 1 sensor para detectar inundación

    -Aplicaciones móviles creadas por WIIM©.


    2) Pack WIIM 1 Hogar sin reloj

    Incluye un pack con 5 sensores, el servicio de alertas y notificaciones todo incluido (IoT) y aplicaciones para móviles.

    Esta opción no incluye nuestro WIIM© Smartwatch porque está pensada para los que quieren usar sus propios Smartwatch. Para ello tienen que descargarse la aplicación e instalarla en su Android wear, Pebble o iWatch.)

    Desglose

    -1 Pack de sensores:

    • 1 sensor para el timbre de la puerta
    • 1 sensor para detectar humo/gas/fuego
    • 2 sensores para detectar el fin de dos electrodomésticos
    • 1 sensor para detectar inundación

    -Aplicaciones móviles creadas por WIIM©.


      5. ¿En qué consiste el regalo colectivo?

      El regalo colectivo es nuestra iniciativa de regalar WIIM© a una o varias personas (según dinero recaudado) que tienen dificultades económicas y no pueden permitirse comprar WIIM©. Las personas serán elegidas por una Asociación de Sordos. WIIM© no se queda con ningún beneficio, de este modo, salvo los gastos de producción, el resto del dinero recaudado por esta vía irá íntegramente a la creación de los Packs para estas personas.


      6. ¿Puedo comprar más sensores aparte de los que vienen en el Pack WIIM©?

      Sí, también tenemos disponibles otros sensores como por ejemplo “avisos del bebé”, “avisos de movimiento” “intercomunicador entre habitaciones”, entre otros. En cuanto estén disponibles puedes ponerte en contacto con nosotros y ampliar tu Pack WIIM© con estos nuevos sensores premium y sus condiciones económicas. Además, seguimos trabajando en el desarrollo de nuevas integraciones.


      7. ¿Cómo lo instalo?

      Hay dos formas. Puedes instalar WIIM© tú mismo o solicitar que te lo instalen. Si deseas instalarlo por ti solo, dispondrás de un completo tutorial de apoyo y de todos nuestros canales disponibles para ayudarte. Si bien prefieres que te lo instalen, WIIM© está actualmente formando a diferentes personas en diferentes zonas geográficas para que puedan ofrecerte este servicio. Así que con tu pedido puedes indicarnos tu preferencia y, según tu zona geográfica, te notificaremos si está disponible y su coste.


      8. ¿Tiene garantía?

      Sí, WIIM© tiene una garantía de 2 años.


      9. ¿Cuándo lo voy a recibir?

      Febrero 2016. 

      No te preocupes, nos pondremos en contacto contigo para definir la fecha exacta de entrega y te estaremos siempre informando de cómo va tu pedido.


      10. ¿Y si tengo alguna duda, problema o sugerencia?

      Siempre podrás contactar con nosotros a través de cualquiera de nuestros canales disponibles para ti: email (support@wiim.eu), web (wiim.eu), skype (pendiente) y foro (pendiente). Todos ellos disponibles para dudas, sugerencias, problemas o cualquier cosa que necesites.
story_txt:
Ver la campaña en español




Watch LSE video
Watch testimonal video
The fluttering of sound




You do not need to search the sound anymore.
The sound flies to you, feel its fluttering. You can disconnect the mind, and trust that your WIIM© Smartwatch works as a second skin to extend your senses.


The places with WIIM© technology use the last advances of wearable products. Your WIIM©Smartwatch absorbs certain hearing signals from the environment and transforms them into vibration.



People with hearing impairments remain sensory connected with their environment when WIIM© technology is added to a place. Their smartwatch detects alerts and  alarms around them which are transformed into sensations for their skin. Spaces with sensory effect.



WIIM© Technology
WIIM© is a new technological product designed by us with care and dedication for the only purpose of making life easier for people with hearing problems.
We aim is to provide you with adequate wellbeing and return the freedom and sense of tranquillity to those who need to control what they cannot hear. 
Turn your home into a place with sensory effect with WIIM© Technology, and let the sound caress you.



After installing WIIM© in your home, you may feel the doorbell and daily notifications from your environment in your skin with a soft and precise fluttering. You will know if your phone is ringing, the baby cries or the  washer already finished. It also protects you by alerting if smoke, gas, water or other situation is detected.

WIIM© creates a virtual and sensory space, where all alerts and alarms activated in its action radius are transmitted with tactile effect to the person.  
We want you discover your daily routine with this new way of  feeling the space and sound.









Transmitters:
1.  Door sensorIt detects if someone knocks the door
2. Appliance sensorIt detects when the appliances have finished
3. Smoke sensorIt detects fire 
4. Gas sensorIt detects toxic, volatile and flammable gases leakage
5. Flood sensor It detects water in not appropriate zones
6. Weather alertIt alerts about natural phenomena (tornadoes, storms, etc.)
And we are working on other integrations which are included in the section of  “Improvements/Goals”.







Friend button (SOS)
If you need help
If you need help you can push the friend button. You do not need to be within the action radius of WIIM©. The friend button is available 24 hours  a day to assist you when you have a difficulty, in any place (home, street, etc.).




* Geolocation data is stored encrypted and can only be accessed in case of emergency.
** Medical data is stored with strong encryption specially HL7 data.




Your contact person is also informed

The contact person registered for your friend button will always be informed about the notifications that you are receiving through the Smartwatch. We have developed this application for them for iOS and Android.




2 houses, just one WIIM©    
The innovative value of WIIM© Technology includes not only its capacity to create a virtual place where the person may receive all alarms, but also its technological umbrella, the internet connection (IoT) and the possibility to share sensors connecting several places to the same system. 


Someone with two or more houses with WIIM© technology will receive all signals automatically activated in each action radius, as the person is in either house. 



Accessible community
And It is important for us that this technology allows to connect us at human levels, since it links public and private (home) places, constructing a more accessible community for everybody, where the minority's needs are also listened by the majority. The creation and connection of places accessible for everyone allow us to be closer.


Those who have WIIM© Smartwatch will receive the alarms and alerts in their houses, offices and leisure places (according to the contracted services) without cost, if these places have the system installed with their action radius in which the watch will be connected.

Companies, Institutions

Reinventing services

The companies, besides the classic safety sensors (water, gas, fire, etc.), may adapt their WIIM services, according to their areas and specific needs, discovering new ways of accessibility.
If your company wants to know the customized services offered by us, contact us and we will be pleased to inform you about all the possibilities.


Accessible Hotel
Ex:  Notification of breakfasts and hotel offers.






WIIM© facilitates its App for people with watches who want to install the service.



SDK for developers


WIIM© facilitates the access through an API Restful, so you can integrate your own sensors. Develop your own applications using WIIM alerts. 
Available from February 2016.


Thematic application
WIIM© also wants to help their clients increase their possibilities of living new spaces and leisure activities. Therefore, we are working on the development of mobile applications that provide enjoyment in the following areas:

Guided tours with videos subtitled in sign language.

Visits to Museums
Research on “text to speech” and “speech to text”, it means, the possiblity of bringing the voice of a call to text and vice versa.



Rewards













Installation at home
The installation at home is simple, without wiring of all wireless elements which can be adapted to the needs of every place. The home kit is constituted by the following elements:
- Gateway (data collecting and internet connection)
- Series of wireless sensors connected to gateway:


Fire detection sensors 
Gas leak sensor
Flood sensor
Toxic gas sensors
Triggers to be integrated to the different appliances.
Wireless buttons for the doorbell.
Wirelles emergency buttons to be installed in strategic and potentially dangerous places such as the tub.


Gateway and sensors with  backup battery to prevent it from switching off if there is a cut-off of the power supply. It has connection to internet to send alerts.


Funding goal
WIIM© Background





Team

Antonio Sánchez Pineda

CEO, Computer Engineer specialized in IoT and Fiware. 6 years of experience. Developer of  web and mobile applications for Google Glass, Android Wear, Pebble and Epson BT-200.  Full time commitment.
Beatriz Valiente Rodríguez

Marketing and communication. More than 9 years  of experience in marketing and communication, working in companies such as McCann Erickson. Full time commitment.
Raúl Molina Sánchez

3 years of experience as developer of mobile applications.Ana Belén Vera CárdenasCommunication. José Alberto Casanueva PérezSoftware developer. Jesús Agustín Castillo GómezSoftware developer. 

Thanks to:

Rafael Maranon-Abreu
Advisor and mentor of our project from beginning, he helps us about his vision of the product and how to improve it in order to final customer can enjoy it. Currently he is working as Product Manager in Amazon Lab126.
Fernano Molina Rodríguez
Graphic designer with more than 10 years of experience.

Guarantee and confidentiality


We guarantee privacy in the case of doorbells and appliances.
2 years of warranty
Geolocation data is stored encrypted and can only be accessed in case of emergency.
Medical data is stored with strong encryption HL7 data.

You may consult our Legal Advice and Privacity Police in the following link:




FAQs

1. About us

We are Hearing Software, a group of people who got together to create WIIM© project. From the beginning we wanted to work alongside deaf people, from friends and family with hearing problems who helped us transmitting their real needs and entities, such as associations dedicated to help people with hearing disabilities, have taken part in our project, validating our thesis, advising and suggesting improvements to develop a product that provides real solution in their lives. WIIM© is a product that uses technology as a channel to help people with hearing disabilities.



2. Using the Friend Button (SOS)

The friend button (SOS) is an orange, easily accessible, located on the watch and user can always use it when he-she feels at risk or help is needed. The friend button (SOS) has access to GPS to facilitate location and medical record helping to act quickly and wisely. By using the button, a warning will be sent to the mobile phone registered in our servers (application available on mobile).
There is an option to upgrade and connect to emergency services (only on those countries available).

3. Is my data stored safely?

Yes, WIIM© is 100% secure. Geolocation data is stored encrypted and can only be accessed in case of an emergency. Similarly, medical data is stored under strong encryption using HL7 medical data.



4. What is included in each WIIM© Pack?

1) WIIM Pack 1 Home + watch
It includes a pack with five sensors, a SmartWatch WIIM©, service alerts and notifications all inclusive (IoT) and mobile applications:

-1 WIIM© Smartwatch
-1 Pack of sensors:

1 sensor for the doorbell
1 sensor to detect smoke/gas/fire
2 sensors to detect order two appliances
1 sensor for detecting flooding

-WIIM mobile - Applications created WIIM©.

2) WIIM Pack 1 Home without watch 

It includes a pack with five sensors, service alerts and notifications all inclusive (IoT) and mobile applications.
This option does not include our WIIM© SmartWatch because it is designed for those who want to use their own SmartWatch. In that case you can download the application and install on your Android wear, Pebble or iWatch.)
-1 Pack of sensors:

1 sensor for the doorbell
1 sensor to detect smoke/gas/fire
2 sensors to detect order two appliances
1 sensor for detecting flooding

-WIIM mobile - Applications created WIIM©.

5. What is the crowdfunded gift?

The crowdfunded gift is our initiative to give WIIM© to one or more persons (depending on the money raised) who have financial difficulties and cannot afford WIIM©. People will be chosen by a deaf association. WIIM© will not make receive any profit and the money raised will go entirely to produce the packs

6. Can I buy sensors separately?

Yes, we also have available other sensors such as "baby warnings", "motion detectors", "intercom between rooms", among others. As these become available you can contact us and extend your WIIM© Pack with these new premium sensors and economic conditions. In addition, we continue to work on developing new integrations.


7. How can I install it?

There are two ways. You can install WIIM© yourself or ask for an installer. If you wish to install on your own, you will have a full tutorial support, a full guide and all our channels available to help you with success. But if you prefer that someone do it for you, WIIM© is currently training several engineers in different  areas to carry out  this service for you. When placing your order, please indicate whether you want the self-installing kit or not and, depending on your local area, will notify you if  it is available and how much it would cost.

8. Is it warranted?
Yes, WIIM© comes with two years warranty.

9. When I will get it?
February 2016. 

Do not worry, we will contact to let you know the exact delivery date and we will keep sending regular updates with the order status.
10. What can I do if I have any questions, problems or suggestions?

You can contact us through email (support@wiim.eu), web (wiim.eu), Skype (TBA) and forum (TBA) for any questions, suggestions, problems you may have.









Ver vídeo en LSE
Ver vídeo testimonial
El aleteo del sonido

Ya no es necesario correr en busca del sonido. 


El sonido vuela hasta ti, siente su aleteo. Puedes desconectar la mente, y confiar en que tu WIIM©  Smartwatch funciona como una segunda piel para extender tus sentidos.



Los espacios con la tecnología WIIM©  usan los últimos avances de los productos wearable. Tu WIIM©  Smartwatch absorbe determinadas señales auditivas de tu entorno y las transforma en vibración. 





Cuando a un espacio le sumas la tecnología WIIM© , las personas con problemas de audición permanecen sensorialmente conectadas con su entorno. Su Smartwatch capta avisos y alarmas que suceden a su alrededor y los transforma en sensaciones para su piel. Espacios con efecto sensorial.

WIIM© Technology


WIIM©  es un nuevo producto tecnológico, diseñado por nosotros
con mimo y esmero con el único fin de hacer la vida más fácil a las
personas que tienen problemas de audición.
Nuestro deseo es darles bienestar. Devolver la libertad y la
sensación de tranquilidad a aquellas personas que necesitan
controlar lo que no llegan a escuchar. Por ello creamos espacios
adaptados para todos, en los que el sentido del tacto nos guía y
nos permite movernos, a través del sonido, con autonomía y
flexibilidad.

Convierte tu hogar en un espacio con efecto sensorial con
WIIM© Technology, y déjate acariciar por el sonido. 







Al instalar WIIM©  en tu hogar sentirás como los timbres y avisos diarios de tu entorno llegan a tu piel con un suave pero preciso aleteo avisándote si han llamado a la puerta, si está sonando el teléfono, si llora el bebé, o si ya ha acabado la lavadora que pusiste. Además te protege avisándote si detecta la señal de humo, gas, agua u otras situaciones de alerta.


De forma invisible WIIM©  genera un espacio virtual pero sensorial, donde todas las alertas y avisos activados en su radio de acción se transmiten a la persona con efecto táctil.  


Con WIIM©  queremos que descubras cómo es tu día a día con esta nueva manera de vivir el espacio y el sonido.







Transmisores:
1.  Sensor puertaDetecta si llaman a la puerta
2. Sensor electrodomésticosDetecta el fin de los  electrodomésticos
3. Sensor humoDetecta incendios
4. Sensor gasDetecta fuga de gases tóxicos, volátiles e inflamables
5. Sensor inundaciónDetecta agua en zonas no apropiadas
6. Alerta meteorológicaAviso de fenómenos naturales (tornados, tormentas, etc.)
Y otras integraciones en la que estamos trabajando e incluimos en el apartado de “Mejoras/Metas”.






Botón Amigo (SOS)

Siempre que necesites ayuda
Siempre que necesites ayuda puedes pulsar el botón amigo. No es necesario que estés dentro del área de acción de WIIM© . El botón amigo está disponible 24 horas del día para atenderte cuando sientas dificultad o riesgo, en cualquier lugar (casa, calle, etc.), dentro y fuera del radio de acción.






*Los datos de geolocalización se guardan cifrados y solo se puede acceder a ellos en caso de emergencia.


**Datos médicos son guardados con cifrado de Seguridad Alta para datos médicos HL7.


Tu persona de contacto, también informada

La persona de contacto que hayas puesto para tu botón de amigo estará siempre avisada de las alertas que te llegan a ti a través del Smartwatch. Para ellos hemos desarrollado esta aplicación móvil para iOS y Android.


2 viviendas, 1 solo WIIM© 


El valor innovador de WIIM©  Technology no es solo la capacidad de crear ese espacio virtual donde la persona recibe todas las alertas sino que además su paraguas tecnológico, la conexión a internet (IoT) y la posibilidad de compartir sensores permite que el servicio llegue más lejos generando la posibilidad de conectar varios espacios a un mismo sistema.






Una persona con dos o más viviendas que instale el servicio recibirá automáticamente todas las señales que se activen en cada uno de los radios de acción, según se encuentre en una u otra casa. 



Sociedad accesible 

Y algo importante para nosotros es que esta tecnología nos da la posibilidad de conectarnos a nivel humano ya que une espacios, tanto privados (hogares) como públicos, acercándonos a la idea de construir una sociedad más accesible para todos, donde las necesidades de una minoría sean también escuchadas por la mayoría. La creación y conexión de espacios que sean accesibles para todos nos permite estar más cerca los unos de los otros. (poner en negro)




Aquellas personas que dispongan de WIIM© Smartwatch recibirán los avisos y notificaciones en casa (según servicios contratados) pero también podrán seguir recibiendo avisos en su entorno laboral, en sus zonas de ocio, etc. (sin coste) siempre y cuando estos espacios/establecimientos tengan instalado el sistema con su radio de acción a donde se conectarán sus relojes.


Empresas, Instituciones
Reinventado servicios 

Las empresas, además de los sensores clásicos de seguridad (agua, gas, fuego, etc.), podrán adaptar los servicios de WIIM© según su área temática y necesidades específicas, descubriendo nuevas formas de accesibilidad.
Si eres empresa y quieres conocer los servicios personalizados que podemos ofrecerte, ponte en contacto con nosotros, estaremos encantados de contarte todas las posibilidades.





Hotel Accesible
Ej. Aviso de desayunos y ofertas del hotel.





















WIIM©  facilita su App para las personas que tengan sus propios relojes y quieran instalarles el servicio.

SDK para desarrolladores


WIIM©  facilita el acceso a través de una API Restful para que puedas integrar tus propios sensores. Desarrolla tus propias aplicaciones usando las alertas de WIIM© . 

Aplicaciones temáticas


WIIM©  también quiere contribuir a que sus clientes aumenten sus posibilidades a la hora de vivir nuevos espacios y formas de ocio. Para ello estamos trabajando en el desarrollo de aplicaciones móviles que aporten disfrute en los siguientes ámbitos:



Rutas guiadas turísticas con video en lengua de signos y subtítulos.

Visita en Museos
Investigación sobre “text to speech” y “speech to text” (llevar la voz de una llamada a texto y viceversa.)




Recompensas










Instalación en el hogarLa instalación en el hogar es sencilla, sin cableado, de todos los elementos inalámbricos lo cual permite adaptarse a todas las necesidades de cada espacio. El kit hogar está compuesto:
- Gateway (recolector de datos y conexión a internet)

- Serie de sensores inalámbricos conectados al gateway





Sensores de detección de incendio


Sensores de fugas de gas


Sensores de inundación


Sensores de gases tóxicos


Triggers para integrarlos con los distintos electrodomésticos.


Botones inalámbricos tanto para el timbre de la puerta.


Botones inalámbricos de emergencia que instalan en lugares estratégicos y potencialmente peligrosos como la bañera.





Gateway y sensores con batería de respaldo para evitar que se apague en caso de caída de suministro eléctrico y con conexión a internet para poder mandar las alertas.

FAQs



1. ¿Quiénes somos?

Somos Hearing Software, un grupo de personas que se ha unido para dar vida al proyecto WIIM©. Desde el principio hemos querido ir de la mano de las personas sordas, desde amigos y familiares con problemas de audición que nos han ido ayudando y transmitiendo sus necesidades reales hasta entidades claves para ellos como las federaciones y confederaciones que han ido escuchando nuestro proyecto, validando nuestras hipótesis, aconsejando y sugiriendo mejoras para desarrollar un producto que aporte solución real en sus vidas. WIIM© es nuestra propuesta de valor, un producto que usa la tecnología como canal y la pone al servicio de la comunidad sorda. 




2. ¿Qué incluye el Botón Amigo (SOS)?
El botón amigo (SOS) es un botón naranja, de fácil acceso, ubicado en el reloj para que la persona lo pueda pulsar siempre que se sienta en peligro o considere que necesita ayuda. Con GPS, para facilitar la localización y con historial médico para actuar rápidamente y con buen criterio. Al pulsarlo llegará un aviso al móvil del familiar o persona de contacto (aplicación disponible en el móvil).
Opcionalmente, se podrá solicitar los servicios de teleasistencia en los países que esté disponible para coordinar familiares y servicios de emergencias.


3. ¿Mis datos están protegidos?Sí, WIIM© es 100% seguro. Los datos de geolocalización se guardan cifrados y solo se puede acceder a ellos en caso de emergencia. Igualmente, los datos médicos son guardados con cifrado de Seguridad Alta para datos médicos HL7.
4. ¿Qué incluye los Pack WIIM©?1) Pack WIIM 1 Hogar + reloj

Incluye un pack con 5 sensores, un Smartwatch WIIM©, el servicio de alertas y notificaciones todo incluido (IoT) y aplicaciones para móviles.
Desglose:
-1 WIIM© Smartwatch
-1 Pack de sensores:

1 sensor para el timbre de la puerta
1 sensor para detectar humo/gas/fuego
2 sensores para detectar el fin de dos electrodomésticos
1 sensor para detectar inundación

-Aplicaciones móviles creadas por WIIM©.

2) Pack WIIM 1 Hogar sin reloj
Incluye un pack con 5 sensores, el servicio de alertas y notificaciones todo incluido (IoT) y aplicaciones para móviles.
Esta opción no incluye nuestro WIIM© Smartwatch porque está pensada para los que quieren usar sus propios Smartwatch. Para ello tienen que descargarse la aplicación e instalarla en su Android wear, Pebble o iWatch.)
Desglose
-1 Pack de sensores:

1 sensor para el timbre de la puerta
1 sensor para detectar humo/gas/fuego
2 sensores para detectar el fin de dos electrodomésticos
1 sensor para detectar inundación


-Aplicaciones móviles creadas por WIIM©.



5. ¿En qué consiste el regalo colectivo?

El regalo colectivo es nuestra iniciativa de regalar WIIM© a una o varias personas (según dinero recaudado) que tienen dificultades económicas y no pueden permitirse comprar WIIM©. Las personas serán elegidas por una Asociación de Sordos. WIIM© no se queda con ningún beneficio, de este modo, salvo los gastos de producción, el resto del dinero recaudado por esta vía irá íntegramente a la creación de los Packs para estas personas.


6. ¿Puedo comprar más sensores aparte de los que vienen en el Pack WIIM©?

Sí, también tenemos disponibles otros sensores como por ejemplo “avisos del bebé”, “avisos de movimiento” “intercomunicador entre habitaciones”, entre otros. En cuanto estén disponibles puedes ponerte en contacto con nosotros y ampliar tu Pack WIIM© con estos nuevos sensores premium y sus condiciones económicas. Además, seguimos trabajando en el desarrollo de nuevas integraciones.



7. ¿Cómo lo instalo?
Hay dos formas. Puedes instalar WIIM© tú mismo o solicitar que te lo instalen. Si deseas instalarlo por ti solo, dispondrás de un completo tutorial de apoyo y de todos nuestros canales disponibles para ayudarte. Si bien prefieres que te lo instalen, WIIM© está actualmente formando a diferentes personas en diferentes zonas geográficas para que puedan ofrecerte este servicio. Así que con tu pedido puedes indicarnos tu preferencia y, según tu zona geográfica, te notificaremos si está disponible y su coste.



8. ¿Tiene garantía?
Sí, WIIM© tiene una garantía de 2 años.


9. ¿Cuándo lo voy a recibir?


Febrero 2016. 
No te preocupes, nos pondremos en contacto contigo para definir la fecha exacta de entrega y te estaremos siempre informando de cómo va tu pedido.


10. ¿Y si tengo alguna duda, problema o sugerencia?
Siempre podrás contactar con nosotros a través de cualquiera de nuestros canales disponibles para ti: email (support@wiim.eu), web (wiim.eu), skype (pendiente) y foro (pendiente). Todos ellos disponibles para dudas, sugerencias, problemas o cualquier cosa que necesites.

story:
Wellness and You (WAY) can help!!

Help us boost our start up and reach its target of £3000 to support people with wellness solutions. 

Who are we?

We are Wellness and You (WAY). Our team is made up of 10 people volunteering to launch WAY in April 2015. 
Our values are: 

  • Wellness - Keeping wellness and good (healthy, first-rate, excellent) wellbeing at the core of all our services.
  • Accessibility - Ensuring convenience to our high-quality.
  • You - Always focusing and listening to you, what you need, what you like and what you don't like.

What do we do?

  • We provide wellness solutions for individuals and workplaces using social, environmental and innovative digital products leading to stronger and more productive people in life and work.
  • We integrate our services in everyday environments to make the concept of wellbeing accessible, enjoyable and in keeping with the fun things in life.

Why are we doing it?

  • We are launching WAY because we passionately believe that wellness should be accessible for all. From our experience we know there is a lack of accessible, engaging solutions available to you at home and in work. We are going to change that.
  • Your support and donations will evolve our work to the next level and ensure we can provide services initially in London and then develop them for a National audience.

What do we need the money for?

  • Hackathon - We will be able to create an interactive website with mobile function enabling more people to access our online services.
  • Product Development - will allow us to refine our current exciting wellness solutions and pilot them with more people.
  • Marketing - will allow us to develop our marketing team and interactive events.

With your support we will improve peoples' wellness leading to better relationships, feeling more productive at work and able to survive city life. 

Individually, the team have loads of experience of improving wellbeing, running projects and delivering honest and trustworthy services to make WAY a success. 

We believe the key to wellbeing is connecting with others and joining us will allow you to connect with others too!

Other ways you can help.

 We are really thankful for you taking the time to read this. If you want to go the extra mile, there are so many ways you can help WAY (pun intended). 

  • Share the campaign via social media. Help us reach our target quicker and we’ll be able to roll out more services to you that will allow us to lead to improved wellness for all.
  • Contact us at social@way-uk.com to give us some suggestions and learn about other ways to support us.

Thanks again!

The WAY Team

www.way-uk.com

story:
Have you ever experienced the comfort of a built-in automatic flushing toilet? Have you ever wanted to experiment the same comfort at home? We've seen a few companies trying to bring us that smart toilet experience,but the smart toilet that's been delivered is not all that smart: They always flushing on us. Le Flusher is different: If the other automatic toilets are considered as smart, Le Flusher would be the smartest of them . It is not only about how it looks and feels but especially how it works.

For the last 7 months , the team spent more time in a toilet than ever trying to find a design that won't  harm the aesthetic of your toilet : 


OUR PROTOTYPE 





Le Flusher isn't just a pretty package — this compact, yet powerful device helps you save up to 50% of water than conventional toilet, helping you make a huge positive impact on the planet and, of course, on your wallet.



   

 Le Flusher can make a half flush or a full flush based on the amount of time you spent on the toilet.


With this mechanism we can save you per year , up to 11,980 gallons of water :



The Brain is equipped with four adhesives which will allow it to adhere to the wall.It is equipped with a proximity sensor that can detects when you are using the toilet. Once you are done, The Brain allotted 10 - 12 seconds for you to wipe and dispose of the materials , contrary to other automatic toilets. Afterward, The Brain send a signal to The Worker to lift up the flapper to flush the toilet.

For some reason , children always forget to flush their deeds. The worse scenario is when it is a guess who discover the mess.You can imagine the end of the story.

                    

Le Flusher uses a technology called Proximity Sensing to detect whenever someone is sitting on the toilet. This technology has been around for so long, we were able, with precision, to use these metrics to automatically initiate a half flush or a full flush which help you to save on water compare to standard toilet not equipped with "Le Flusher".

The Brain Assembly


The Worker (Mechanical part) Assembly



 1- Unpack the device and lift up the tank cover.

 2- stop the water  and flush the toilet.

 3- Install the Worker  in the tank and Place the tank cover  back.

 4- Connect the worker to the brain. DONE!

Once in place, turn on the device and allow the synchronization process to begin, which can takes up to two minutes, and Le Flusher is ready to be use. 

We have come to Indiegogo to share our project with all of you! Our incredible  community of home automation supporters, you deserved the comfort of a better toilet, a smarter toilet that can flush by itself, and it doesn't have to cost a fortune. We also want to hear and learn from you—your suggestions and feedback will not only help us improve our project, but will also be implemented into our rewards and further flushing device design. We know this is an ambitious project, but we are certain that with your help Le Flusher will become a worldwide reality.




For us, Indiegogo is not just a way to get this thrilling project to you, it is a way to hear from and learn from you. With your help and support we know we can get this to the whole world.


             Where we are now and what's next

After more than 7 months of engineering development and testing we now have a highly functional and performing lab prototype. Currently we're working closely with the factory manufacturers to prepare the production setup, and finalize materials and components for the mass manufacturing. Here is our production timeline:



     

          RISK & CHALLENGES

We know great quality is hard to find, and with this project we cannot afford having bad quality components. That’s why we are in contact constantly with our producer in china , to ensure only the best materials are being used in our flusher kit. Developing the awesome flushing device to blend with the aesthetic of your bathroom  is not easy, that’s why we are working hard to give you the best product ever.Any changes in the design , you'll be the firsts to be notified.

We are a motivated team who has decided to take this challenge and give you only our best!

    

              Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)


Help! What if I forgot to pay for shipping?

No problem. If you're outside the US and forgot to pay your shipping, simply order the International Shipping perk. Just make sure to enter the same personal information you provided with your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.


Am I supposed to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US?

Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk. When you pledge, add the shipping amount indicated in your perk as an "additional gift" or simply order the International Shipping perk with the same personal information.

Have you tested it, will it really work?

For the last 7 month ,we have spent more time inside of a bathroom than ever.We have spent more than a month and a half to test the product to make sure you get what you buy. Our designer  spent weeks  on the design to come up with the best design that will blend into your bathroom.Our  Electronic engineers spent months to optimize the battery life of the device 

I am concerned about putting a plug-in device in the water… Isn’t that dangerous?
We made sure that our device complies with the standards in place. Even if the motor inside the worker would never touch the water ( the overflow control in the tank will prevent that) but as an precaution, we made sure that it is water - proof.
So  worries.
Where on the toilet can I place Le flusher? The Brain and the Worker ?
The Worker goes and hang inside the tank without really touching the water. The Brain goes on the wall behind the toilet at a certain level so that the sensors can detect any person sitting on the toilet or in front of it pointing in the right direction.

What material is it made of? Is it heavy?

The whole Worker part  box is made out of regular plastic, and the whole Brain part is made of the best quality glossy plastic which make look really aesthetic. The Brain is really  light.

Is there any Le Flusher authorised dealer?

Of course, We are hoping to have many. Matter of fact,  you can become one.See our authorized Reseller / Distributor pack or shoot us an email : info@leflusher.com

For press inquiries please contact info@leflusher.com

story:
A New Cinderella Story

(A Transsexual Cinderella)
Hey there,
Thanks for clicking on my GoFundMe.


Let me introduce myself  
       Hi, My name is Juelz, I am a 24 yr old college student, studying mobile Development. I am a big sister, and the glue that keeps my family together.
I started to campaign for my Surgeries in the hopes that beautiful people like you would Poof in as my Fairy God Parents and help make a life long wish come true. 
With being a full time college student, working 40+ hours a week, and making time to step in and help my younger sisters with school and everyday life, Im left like Cinderella before the ball. 

      Having FFS, Body, and SRS are my biggest hurdles in my life and I know that I wouldn't be able to achieve any of them without a miracle. Having these surgeries are so imperative for me to continue living and functioning in society. 

      Not everyone understand what it means to be a transsexual, and for each transsexual its slightly different, but for me waking up trapped in a body that just doesn't seem to fit is pure agony everyday. The awkward stares, the gossip right in front of you, and the immediate dismissal of who you are the minute people start to speculate. its Rough!!! I know that having surgery wont make it go away completely but at least some of the noise will die down and I wont feel like a prisoner in my own body. 


What I Need & What You Get

  • I have had (2) free consultations with doctors specializing in (FFS) Facial Feminization Surgery, and (BCFS) Body Contouring & Feminization Surgery and so far Im expected to need $30,000-$45,000 to reach my transition goals, which include, travel expenses, recovery homes, medications, pre- surgical testing, and the surgeries themselves. 
  • Thank you so much Fairy God Parent(s) for granting me such an amazing wish. I could not ask for anything more spectacular than to wake up and recognize the face looking back at me in the mirror.  For those who are unable to make a financial contribution, sharing my story on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, with friends, family, and other Fairy Godparents is just as important and I thank you for doing so. 
  • To my Fairy God parents who can make financial contributions this is what I can offer in my gratitude:

  • $1 Handwritten thank you note. 

  • $5 Personal hand drawn picture of you as my Fairy God Parent with a Thank you note.

  • $10 Handwritten Original Poem thanking you with Magick Dust, & a hand drawn photo of you as my Fairy God Parent.

  • $25 Handwritten Poem with Magick Dust, hand drawn Photo of you as my Fairy God Parent, and a Photocopy of a Mobile Application Name of your very Own.

  • $50 Handwritten Poem with Magick Dust, and personal Shoutout on Social media Personally Thanking you for your contribution. a hand drawn photo of you as my Fairy God Parent.

  • $100 Handwritten Poem with Magick Dust, a Personal Shout out on Social Media thanking you Personally for your contribution, a Custom made Shirt or Hoodie with Magick Dust with the Poem On the Back.

  • $300 Personal Shoutout on Social Media, Custom beanie, hoodie, or shirt with a Magick Dust and Personal Thank You Poem, and an autographed calendar after I am healed up.

  • $500 Personal Shoutout on Social Media, Custom beanie, hoodie, or shirt with a Magick Dust and Personal Thank You Poem, and an autographed calendar after I am healed up. And opportunity to meet me at a meet and greet with Personal Photos. :-)


The Impact

  • My campaign will ensure that I can work in society without fear of not being hired because of discrimination, and with fear of harassment. Many people don't realize that their questions are either extremely intrusive or offensive. I understand some people genuinely want to be informed, and having these surgeries will give me the confidence to go out and become an advocate. 
  • I can't express enough how difficult it is to be a young trans-person with the incredibly high cost of endocrinologist, insurances that may or may not cover visits and lab work, therapy and the cost of getting your Letter(s) or Recommendation for Sex Reassignment Surgery, even the long and sometimes humiliating process of public changing your legal name.
  • I need to have these surgeries to Finalize my legal name change, and gender marker change and birth certificate.   Once those are Finalize it will be easier to hold down a job, even with the EEOC I personally have faced a ton of discrimination and I would like to work just as hard and feel as important to my work as any other person does without fear I will be fired for "NO REASON"

Risks & Challenges

    I plan on getting out in the world in giving back as soon as I can, I believe in paying it forward, and thanks to you all paying it forward to me, I will be able to become someone else's fairy God Parent and make such an incredible dream become a reality for them.  After surgery I plan on working ever so hard in all of my endeavors of mobile development and pushing more trans inclusive sites and mobile applications.

    To be honest I am completely terrified of having surgery but I am even more terrified of it never coming to fruition. I don't think I will be able to continue functioning. I have been strong all my life but for it to never happen will be devastating. I know so many of you can understand how traumatic a surgery to keep someone alive is, and thats what these surgeries are for me. 
Battling deep depression, being ostracized, publicly humilated, and the target of a trans hate crime have all been apart of my life before i was 25 years old. With a dream, a wish, and a prayer, all of what I have endured can all be worth it with the help from incredible people like you. 

    With Soooooo Much LOVE,
    Thank you from the bottom of my heart. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Keep in mind if you just aren't able to make a financial contribution just spreading the word about me and my wish is just enough to help put a smile on my face. :-)
  • Check out the IndieGoGo tools

Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo!

$50 Handwritten Poem with Magick Dust, and personal Shoutout on Social media Personally Thanking you for your contribution. a hand drawn photo of you as my Fairy God Parent.

$100 Handwritten Poem with Magick Dust, a Personal Shout out on Social Media thanking you Personally for your contribution, a Custom made Shirt or Hoodie with Magick Dust with the Poem On the Back.

$300 Personal Shoutout on Social Media, Custom beanie, hoodie, or shirt with a Magick Dust and Personal Thank You Poem, and an autographed calendar after I am healed up.

$500 Personal Shoutout on Social Media, Custom beanie, hoodie, or shirt with a Magick Dust and Personal Thank You Poem, and an autographed calendar after I am healed up. And opportunity to meet me at a meet and greet with Personal Photos. :-)


  The Impact 
My campaign will ensure that I can work in society without fear of not being hired because of discrimination, and with fear of harassment. Many people don't realize that their questions are either extremely intrusive or offensive. I understand some people genuinely want to be informed, and having these surgeries will give me the confidence to go out and become an advocate. 
I can't express enough how difficult it is to be a young trans-person with the incredibly high cost of endocrinologist, insurances that may or may not cover visits and lab work, therapy and the cost of getting your Letter(s) or Recommendation for Sex Reassignment Surgery, even the long and sometimes humiliating process of public changing your legal name.
I need to have these surgeries to Finalize my legal name change, and gender marker change and birth certificate.   Once those are Finalize it will be easier to hold down a job, even with the EEOC I personally have faced a ton of discrimination and I would like to work just as hard and feel as important to my work as any other person does without fear I will be fired for "NO REASON" 

  Risks & Challenges
    I plan on getting out in the world in giving back as soon as I can, I believe in paying it forward, and thanks to you all paying it forward to me, I will be able to become someone else's fairy God Parent and make such an incredible dream become a reality for them.  After surgery I plan on working ever so hard in all of my endeavors of mobile development and pushing more trans inclusive sites and mobile applications.
    To be honest I am completely terrified of having surgery but I am even more terrified of it never coming to fruition. I don't think I will be able to continue functioning. I have been strong all my life but for it to never happen will be devastating. I know so many of you can understand how traumatic a surgery to keep someone alive is, and thats what these surgeries are for me. Battling deep depression, being ostracized, publicly humilated, and the target of a trans hate crime have all been apart of my life before i was 25 years old. With a dream, a wish, and a prayer, all of what I have endured can all be worth it with the help from incredible people like you. 

    With Soooooo Much LOVE,    Thank you from the bottom of my heart. 
  Other Ways You Can Help 
Keep in mind if you just aren't able to make a financial contribution just spreading the word about me and my wish is just enough to help put a smile on my face. :-) Check out the IndieGoGo tools 
 Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo!

story:
Bit of bad news from Goa, India but don't worry! I'm in hospital after a jeep pulled out of a side road without seeing me on my motorbike. It hit me hard and shattered my left leg up to the calf. Had a 3 hour operation on Monday night 10 till 1. The accident happened at 5:00 in the afternoon. Now there's a 3 week wait before the major operation, to put rods in my fibia and tibia, which were both fractured in the accident. It all happened so fast. One second I was sitting on my lovely Royal Enfield bike, the next second I was sitting on the floor, with my left leg shattered, the 2 bones clearly on show, and my foot only held on with 2 thin pieces of skin, and blood gushing like out of a pump. It was horrible to look at, I can tell you. Anyway, the 2 girls in the jeep took me straight to the hospital, and that's probably what saved my life and probably saved my leg.
They're not helping to pay for the operation though, and without insurance all help would be greatly appreciated.

story:
The Heavenly Smiles Racing Team consists of my wife and I, plus our two surviving children.

We are using our race cars to draw attention towards childhood cancer. A great example of how effective this can be is the Breast Cancer Society that uses vehicles displaying its logo in all kinds of venues across North America.

The cars are the image of the Driving Change campaign. We often find people will approach us to learn more about the little car and ask about the hand prints. The car opens the door to talk about kid’s cancer and the need for more research. 

We are asking for funding for kids cancer research.

story:
The EVO Gym base is made out of three components — a rubber top plate for slide resistance, a polycarbonate body, and aluminum support anchors — one on each side for you to attach the resistance bands, and one in the center to sturdily support your body weight.

There are two arms that go under the base and the hinge in the middle, connecting both of the arms. They lock in the middle at this hinge that only rotates in one direction, 180 degrees, preventing you from having to use your own weight to keep the sides from collapsing inward.

 

 

The EVO Gym bands have notches that hook into the base that allow you to load up multiple bands and change the weight, or change workout by changing the height of the band.

Each band has six small balls inserted inside at 10-inch intervals to serve as notches. These notches allow resistance to begin at varying heights, making it possible to perform deadlifts or overhead presses with the same bands. You simply take the band, slide it into the slot at the end of the base, and pull the notch against the slot in a secure position.

You can add up to four resistance bands on each side of the base, meaning that you can reach over 300lbs of resistance.

EVO Gym comes with two handles and a lightweight steel bar so you can perform a broad range of exercises.

Hook the resistance bands to the handles or the bar then hook to the base and perform exercises as you see fit.

EVO Gym is lightweight and portable to go with you anytime, anywhere. The handles and resistance bands can be stored in the convenient pouch, while the steel bar can be broken down into three small pieces. All of EVO Gym’s pieces can be stored in the foldable base.

EVO Gym is also a very convenient size, allowing for easy transport in most backpacks, suitcases, and even large purses.

 

 

EVO Fitness LLC was founded by Mitchell McBrayer as a way to help people take control over their lives and feel empowered no matter how busy life gets. He is passionate about removing obstacles and creating opportunities. He came up with the idea for EVO Gym while planning his first trip to Thailand and trying to find something he could buy to stay in shape while overseas. The best thing he could find was resistance bands, but while using them, he found the experience to be extremely limiting. The bands could help him get a good workout if he stood on them at the right positions, but he wanted a more conventional training experience — a way that he could track his progress, use heavier weight, and perform movements that were too awkward to do with a few bands. This led to EVO Gym.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make EVO Gym a reality. Our goal is to raise money for inventory and build a community around EVO Gym. The money raised will be used for inventory, backend developments, such as a platform for training programs, and additional media.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order an EVO Gym, if you’re a supporter of EVO Gym, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

We can’t thank you enough for your support!

 

 

Risks and challenges

There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce, and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring EVO Gym to your home, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

story:
Do you believe in dreams & ideas?

Be one of the first supporters and get limited edition perks




Yalantis about happi - Word from the developers

Check out how our (hopefully) developers see happi - world's first automatic mood tracker and mood up-er!





#happigogo - help us make this happen

every contribution is important no matter if 1$ or more - let's boost happi together!


By every contribution to happi, we are empowered and one step closer to making world's first app of this kind freely accessible to everyone around the world. Please contribute because everything is pointless without the community, but that's just a reason more to unite.

Time goes really fast, and the deadline is nearer every minute, but we can do this together!

Here's how money will be used and key facts about happi:



happi - key facts and functions


How is happi "world's first"?

- happi is world's first app that counts emojis and emoticons you've exchanged in different IM-apps and shared on your social media

What IM-apps and social media are covered?

- Due to technical reasons, happi will analyze messages from all Facebook Messenger, all SMS messages and direct Twitter messages (200 newest)

Is happi iOS or Android?

- Happi will be Android due to technical reasons (for example, SMS fetching is not enabled in iOS), but if the budget makes it possible, we will launch an iOS app that does everything the same, but focuses on Facebook Messenger and statuses

What emotions will be covered?

- In the first version, we want to cover LOVE emoticons, HAPPY emoticons and SAD emoticons and emojis. Different emoticons will be counted and analyzed within these gorups (i.e. :), :)), :D, :-) as HAPPY emoticons).

Will you focus only on emoticons and emojis?

- happi will focus only on emoticons and emojis except in Facebook statuses where "feeling" part would be counted (i.e. Feeling sad, happy, in love etc.)

What about mood up-er?

- happi will display notifications with lifting content - proverbs and motivation. It will also help you be aware of different jubilees, i.e. that you have just exchange :* #100 with Mike, so that you can celebrate your friendships and relationships.

Will i be able to turn the notifications off?

- Yes. Either for different emoticons/emojis, different person or totally.

Privacy concerns?

- None, because no messages are stored or shared with anyone, happi only analyzes what's in your inbox, sent messages or statuses, and it only focuses on emojis and emoticons. You can share the results you get (check the video for screen previews).



happi budget plans





budget plans for app developing segment



As the developers suggested, 78% of the budget will go to app functions and developing, and around 11% for quality assurance and 11% for project management.



world's 1st automatic feeling tracker and mood up-er



happi is an app that gives you well illustrated overview and statistics of your use of different emojis and emoticons throughout the different channels - both instant messages and status updates - and in different periods. Based on that, happi let's you know how happy, sad, in love, etc. you were in the different periods of time, as well as how much certain emojis you've exchanged with someone.


But happi is not doing "just" this. You're up to receive short motivational updates (customizable and non-spammy), as well as tailored reminders, for example: Did you know that you've just exchanged 1000th :D with John? Keep being so awesome, guys! or You've just sent a <3 number 100 - Keep spreading love ;)


happi as mood up-er


 



It's never only the data but the story behind it, or what we see and create out of it. That's why happi focuses on giving you both the relevant results and feedback based on them. You will now be aware of different jubilees, big and small, so that you could celebrate your friendships and relationships. For example, Did you know that you and Lucie have just exchanged over 200 :*? or It's 100 days since you and John exchanged the first :D!


To make sure you're always comfortable with these notifications, you will always be able to disable them, or notifications about certain emojis and emoticons exchanged with a certain person etc.


Besides, we will prepare some lifting content and cool notifications that will appear from time to time, just to make your day better.

happi as emoji & emoticon tracker
and as feeling tracker




We want happi to be a smooth and easy-to-use app, but also a trustworthy companion. It will only focus on emojis and emoticons, making sure that your data is safe! Based on the number of different emojis and emoticons in different periods, you could get both useful and interesting insights in your feelings and what you've shared in different periods. 

Here are some of the functionalities happi gives:

- Overview of different emojis via different channels
- Customizable but easy-to-use analytics-menu
- Clever graphic illustrations of the results
- Customazibale push notifications with both reminders and positive messages


happi as a community:
 countless possibilities


As happi grows, the happi-community grow as well. Not only could you learn more about yourself, but we all could learn more about us as a community. For example, wouldn't it be awesome to when do we send most <3 or from where in the city most of the :D and feel-good emoticons and emojis are exchanged? The happi app could be a new opportunity to revisit the way we interact and learn more about the feelings we share.


Giving back to the community


We believe in the communities and we believe in giving back. Besides bringing positive changes through happi app itself, we want to try to help other good cuases. If we fund the project sucessfully, we will invest 30% of all the money over the budget (20k $) into positive social and entreprenourial indiegogo projects, and the rest we will invest in adding new functions to the happi app and spreading happi-ideas. 


If we manage to fund happi successfully, 
everyone who donated will get an ads free version,
 no matter how much they've donated



happi and privacy:
no compromises


We want to build the secure app powered by the community, and privacy is one of our top priorities. No messages or updates are stored, and the app focuses only on emojis and emoticons in these. We make no compromises when it comes to privacy.

#happigogo

help happi become reality!


You can help happi either by contrbuting and by spreading the word. Each contribution is really important to empower the community and build happi!



Follow us on:


  1. Facebook - Happi App (FB/hihappiapp)
  2. Twitter  - @hihappiapp
  3. Instagram - @hihappiapp
  4. Snapchat - @hihappiapp

Remember to use #happiegogo with your comments, ideas and feedback!

Check out the perks and surprises! All contributions are important - no matter how big or small
