story_txt:
Eine deutsche Version dieser Seite befindet sich weiter unten!

Let's Make Camping Easier!  
As passionate campers we were disappointed by common tents. Long and complicated build-up, poor quality and they often lacked of usability and functionality. That's why we have started GENTLETENT. We wanted to create an easy-to-use, convenient but also high quality and functional CAMPING TENT for everyone who’s up for saving time, stress and money.



Easier, faster and more intuitive to pitch than common tents 



Erected in 60 seconds
Gentletents are air-filled camping tents containing no rods and poles. While others are sorting out tent parts and „building“-up tents, you just have to inflate the tent and save a lot of time!





Striking with the press of a button
Putting your Gentletent down is a matter of seconds. High quality valves guarantee safe and secure in/de-flating. No worries about forgetting a tent part, our airtents come in a convenient one-piece design.




A packaging growing with your tent
Don’t worry if you have put down your tent in a hurry, our unique packaging will „grow“ with your package size to contain all the necessary stuff: tent, pump, tent pegs.







A functional and weatherproof mobile home in an one piece design 




A comfortable, generous and functional shape
We have abandoned the igluu shape to create a more convenient and spacious interior. 2 air openings for air exchange, no skewed walls and a comfortable height will make your tent a mobile home. 




No additional tent parts for a stressless and easy camping experience
The airtent construction, our high quality and breathable components make it possible to reduce tent parts such as poles, rods and additional tent walls. By reducing the complexity of a tent, we are creating a one-piece tent which is still reparable and easy to maintain but very handy to use.






Flexibility and functionality as never seen before in a tent 






Carry your Gentletent around - the next adventure is already waiting
A small package size and little weight will make your Gentletent easy to transport. Carry it around, stow it in your car or in the pannier of a motorcycle. Because camping shouldn’t be just a long planned activity - Gentletents enable you to go camping spontaneously.



Connectable to any car, bus, caravan & motorcycle 
Leave your stuff in your vehicle and create an additional awning by using our GT-Car-Connection. It seamlessly connects to your car/bus and also saves some anchoring.




A tent for every purpose
A tent isn’t just a bare sleeping berth. We are considering tents as versatile mobile homes with high functionality and a stunning usability. The answer to the needs of camping lovers who appreciate both an easy and comfortable experience. 





Wind- and weatherproof components for safe, secure and long lasting camping experiences 









High quality components
Resilient components such as Cordura and TenCate AllSeason Touring withstand any weather. UV-resistant, breathable and robust, our fabrics create a stable and weatherproof tent. 





Testing under various conditions 
During the development of our Gentletents we have run several tests proving the quality of our tents. Convince yourselves!




























 
GENTLETENT MODELS: 3 types for every camping purpose 




Making camping easier means providing different models for every purpose. We have developed 3 Gentletents, differing in size but including all the neat features mentioned above.





The Allrounder: Gentletent S





The perfect combination for a spontaneous camping trip with friends or family. Fool-proof usability and great functionality combined in our 3-person tent.





CONNECTABLE to any vehicle
SAVES TIME AND STRESS
Fast build-up, NO POLES, no additional tent parts
Stable and WEATHERPROOF


LONG LASTING components

SPACIOUS interiour but small package when deflated

PORTABLE and suitable for bus, car and motorcycle campers

The Travel Companion: Gentletent XS



An extremely smart 2-person tent for spontaneous camping trips. The Gentletent XS is the best partner for any camping purposes. It's not just resistant to water, wind and frost, with the included hand-pump it's also set up in less than a minute!





SAVES TIME AND STRESS

Fast build-up, NO POLES, no additional tent parts
Stabile and WEATHERPROOF

The multipurpose tent: Gentletent Classic



No other tent is as versatile as the GENTLETENT CLASSIC. You can use it as an awning, community tent or for sleeping.The stand-alone version of the CLASSIC comes without front and back walls and is a perfect sun protection and roofing. The GT- CAR-CONNECTION creates a seamless unit between tent and vehicle.  (check out the ADD-ONS section for further information).
As a camping-tent it can accomodate up to 6 persons and with the included electric air pump, it's set up in a few minutes.

FEATURED IN:











 
WHAT MAKES OUR GENTLETENT SO SPECIAL?





SIMPLE USE

Our tent is built up within a minute and taking it down is even easier. All you need is a Gentletent and an air-pump, which is part of delivery. Say goodbye to the pitch-frustration of your old tent! 


















Our tent is built up within a minute and taking it down is even easier. All you need is a Gentletent and an air-pump, which is part of delivery. Say goodbye to the pitch-frustration of your old tent!




With a packaging size as small as a bedroll our Gentletents are perfect travel companions, flexible and easy to transport. You can even take it on a plane as handluggage.




 
 

UNIQUE DESIGN




Air-filled pipe-system:Gentletents are air-filled camping tents. Therefore we have created a revolutionary pipe-system holding a singular and replacable inner pipe.Covered by extremly robust Cordura fabrics which is also used in motorcycling safety clothes, the air filled pipe system will remain stable and give our tents the extraordinary shape and design.The unique form facilitates the wateroutlet and withstands even the windiest weather. Hydrostatic head ranges from 600-10.000mm.






Colours:Gentletents are available in 2 colours. We will contact you after your purchase asking for your favorite colour option.






OUTSTANDING QUALITYExtraordinary quality and a fair sustainable production are very important to us. After all we want our clients to have a real nature experience. 

 





Gentletent TentwallThe Gentletent's coating is made out of TenCate All Season Touring.The canvas is known for its:

Lightness & durability
UV-resistance,
high breathability,
waterproof
weather resistant and
observance of high enviromental restrictions


















     Gentletent Pipe System:The most important part of a Gentletent is its elastic and resistant thermoplastic polyurethane pipe. It is covered by Cordura, an abrasion-proof cloth that is even used  for riding suits and workwear. So we can guarantee full protection to our tube-system and longevity for all  our Gentletents!








Rafting ValvesTo ensure the required safety, we use high quality rafting valves for our Gentletents. Possible overpressure is prevented by a special overload pressure valve.











   Tent Pegs   The Gentletent comes with high  quality tent pegs, which are very  robust and hardly bendable. They are  suitable for nearly every ground and to  be honest, compared to other tent  pegs they look really cool!







 GENTLE ATMOSPHERE
High quality components and generous air openings provide an excellent indoor tent climate. The breathability of our fabrics avoids condensation build-up and makes a night in a Gentletent as enjoyable as being home.
 












ADD-ONS

 

GENTLETENT CAR CONNECTION


A lot of people love camping but don't want to go without their car. That's why we offer a connection for the Gentletent S and Classic. With vacuum cups it's pleasingly easy to attach your Gentletent to any car. The Gentletent Classic can even be connected to any camping bus, so you can use it as an awning.







GENTLETENT POWERPACK

You also can't do without your Smartphone or other electronic devices while camping? That's no problem anymore. With the Gentletent Powerpack you can equip your Gentletent with solar power and you'll never run out of battery again. 





 

 
SUPPORT US



In the last two years we've been working very hard on creating the Gentletent. After several of prototypes, testing and improving our product, we're ready for serial production.
Now it's up to you! With your support we'll be able to start the next chapter of the Gentletent-Story. We've put together some perks and fantastic Gentletent-bundles you'll receive in reward of your help.

+ Thank You Note


 


SPREAD THE WORD




You know someone who might be interested in a Gentletent?
Tell your friends and followers from our campaign & share our project on your social networks!










 

TIMELINE








SHIPPING & DELIVERY



Too keep the shipping costs as little as possible we are in contact with world wide delivery services.. Right after our campaign we will send you further instructions concerning shipping costs and payment.

Nevertheless we guarantee that we won't charge you more than the prices in the following graphic: 






Please Note:



Shipping for the Gentletent Goodies (GT Bag XS, GT Bag S & GT InflatBag) is free!
Our shipping costs do not include any taxes or charges you may incur on arrival in your country!


OUR TEAM



Gernot Rammer - CEO
Jürgen Haller - CTO
Markus Strengberger - CCO
Christoph Weidinger -  product development
Tetyana Auer - product development
Michael Peer - communication/media






FAQ

What are the payment options?You can pay via paypal or creditcard. After you chose your perk you will be redirected to Paypal where you can chose payment options without any registration. Please contact us via crowdfunding@gentletent.com  if you haven't access to any of those options.
What happens if the funding goal isn’t reached?Indiegogo offers flexible funding, which means that every ordered Gentletent will be produced and shipped anyway, even if we don’t reach the funding goal.

Is the Gentletent waterproof?Yes, the fabrics of our Gentletents are wind-, water-, and weatherproof. The unique form of the tent promotes the water outlet. Therefore the fabrics aren’t subjected to high waterpressure. Hydrostatic head of the Gentletent: Flyer - 600mm, Floor - 10.000mm.

What about strong winds?The resistent carcase of the Gentletent provides only little windage. The circular form also guarantees for stability and resistance in any situation.

Can I use another airpump beside the delivered one?Yes of course! You can use any airpump that meets following requirements: 300mbar, 0,3 bar or 4,5 psi. Though you need a fitting adapter, which is delivered with all of our airpumps.

Will you ship internationally?Yes!
What are your shipment fees?Too keep the shipping costs as little as possible we decided to charge shipment fees by the end of our campaign. Nevertheless we guarantee you a maximum fee for every product, which you can see when ordering your Gentletent.

My question wasn’t answered yet. Can I contact you?Of course you can contact us through mail at crowdfunding@gentletent.com or visit our website at http://www.gentletent.com



THANK YOU



for supporting us and helping make camping easier

















Wir machen Zelten einfacher!
  
Als leidenschaftliche Camper waren wir von traditionellen Zelten enttäuscht. Komplizierter Aufbau, mangelnde Qualität und die fehlende Flexibilität veranlassten uns dazu, es RICHTIG zu machen. Wir gründeten Gentletent. Unsere Vision war es, ein Zelt zu entwickeln, dass in puncto Handhabung, Funktionalität neue Maßstäbe setzt und dabei hochwert verarbeitet und für alle Camping-Situationen gerüstet ist.  Unsere Gentletents sind  Zelte für alle, die Zeit, Stress und Geld sparen wollen!



Schneller Aufbau, kinderleichte Handhabung und weniger Stress 



Aufgebaut in 60 Sekunden
Während andere noch mit Zeltstangen hantieren, sind unsere Airtents bereits aufgebaut. Möglich macht es das pneumatische Rohrsystem, das durch eine Handpumpe gefüllt wird und so das Zelt in Form bringt.





Abbau mit einem Knopfdruck
Um sein Gentletent abzubauen, genügt es die Ventile zu öffnen. Nach wenigen Sekunden kann das Zelt samt Handpumpe und Zeltnägel in der Tasche verstaut werden. Und das Beste: Es gibt keine Stangen oder andere Teile, die man vergessen könnte!




Einpacken leicht gemacht
Bei uns wird das Zelt nicht in eine Tasche gestopft. Unsere Verpackung passt sich dem zusammengeklappten Zelt an und bietet Platz für Zelt, Pumpe und Zeltnägel







Funktionales, wind- und wetterfestes Design  




Ein neuartiges Design für mehr Platz & Komfort
Wir haben bewusst auf die Iglu-Form herkömmlicher Zeltsysteme verzichtet. So schaffen wir mehr Raum und Sitzhöhe durch den Wegfall schräger Wände, angenehmen Luftaustausch mit 2 Luftöffnungen und eine wetterstabile Form.



Keine Stangen = kein Stress
Die Airtent-Bauweise ermöglicht uns in Kombination mit hochwertigen und atmungsaktiven Komponenten auf Stangen und andere Zeltteile zu verzichten. 





Noch nie gesehene Flexibilität & Funktionalität 






Mitnehmen, auspacken und fertig!
Das geringe Packmaß und Gewicht machen ein Gentletent transportabel. Egal ob über die Schulter geschnallt, im Kofferraum oder in der Seitentasche des Motorrads, mit unseren Zelten haben Sie endlich wieder die Möglichkeit spontan Zelten zu gehen.



Nahtlose Anbindung an PKW, Bus oder Motorrad
Lass dein Gepäck im Auto und genieße eine zusätzliche Überdachung. Die GT-Car-Connection macht es möglich und schafft eine nahtlose Verbindung zwischen Zelt und Fahrzeug.





Wind- und wetterfeste Komponenten für ein sicheres und langes Camping-Vergnügen 









Hochwertige Komponenten
Widerstandsfähige Komponenten wie Cordura und TenCate AllSeason Touring halten jedem Wetter und jeder Belastung stand.  UV-resistent, atmungsaktiv und robust - unsere Stoffe sorgen für ein stabiles und wetterfestes Zelt.





Dutzende Tests bestanden 
In unserem 2-jährigen Entwicklungsprozess haben wir unsere Zelte dutzenden Tests unterzogen um uns der Qualität und Sicherheit unseres System zu versichern.



























 
GENTLETENT MODELLE: 3 Größen für jede Gelegenheit







Einfacheres Zelten heißt auch auf die Bedürfnisse der Camping-Liebhaber einzugehen. Unsere Gentletents gibt es in 3 verschiedenen Größen - allesamt vereinen sie die Vorzüge unserer neuen Zeltgeneration.





Der Allrounder: Gentletent S



Das perfekte Zelt für einen spontanen Ausflug mit Freunden oder Familie. Kinderleicht zu bedienen, Platz für 3 Personen und doch leicht und einfach zu transportieren. 




An alle Fahrzeuge anzuschließen


SPARE Zeit und Stress
Kinderleichter Aufbau, ohne Stangen und anderen Zelteile
Stabil und wetterfest

LANGLEBIGE Komponenten

GROßZÜGIGES  Platzangebot bei kleinem Packmaß

TRANSPORTABLE, ideal für Motorad, PKW und Bus-Reisende






Technische Spezifikationen:
Personen:  3
Außenmaß: 255x168cm
Innenmaß: 227x140cm

Höhe: 82-155cm
Rohrsystem aus  CORDURA ® - robust & stabil
Zeltstoff aus witterungsbeständigem TenCate, UV-resistent & hoch-atmungsaktiv  
Gewicht: 4.0kg inklusive Handpumpe, Verpackung, Abspannung und Zeltnägel
Packmaß: 60x30x15cm






Der ideale Reisebegleiter: Gentletent XS



Ein kompaktes und leichtes 2-Personen Zelt.  Das Gentletent XS ist der ideale Partner für spontane Camping-Ausflüge. Aufgebaut in weniger als einer Minute, überzeugt das XS durch seine wasser-, wind- und frostfeste Komponenten.





SPARE Zeit und Stress

Supereinfacher Aufbau
Wind- und wetterfest, stabil dank Airtent-Technologie

LANGLEBIGE Komponenten

KLEINES Packmaß
EINFACH zu transportieren










Technische Spezifikationen:
Personen: 2
Außenmaß: 233x128cm
Innnenmaß: 205x100cm
Höhe: 75-125cm

Rohrsystem aus  CORDURA ® - robust & stabil


Zeltstoff aus witterungsbeständigem TenCate, UV-resistent & hoch-atmungsaktiv  

Gewicht: 3.5kg inklusive Handpumpe, Verpackung, Abspannung und Zeltnägel
Packmaß: 50x30x15cm







Das Allzweckzelt: Gentletent Classic



Kein Zelt ist so vielseitig wie das Gentletent Classic. Nutze es als Vordach, als Aufenthalts- oder als Schlafzelt.
Die Basisversion des GT Classic wird ohne Front- und Rückwand geliefert und überzeugt als flexible Vordach-Lösung.
Mithilfe der GT-Car-Connection schaffst du eine nahtlose Verbindung zwischen Zelt und Fahrzeug. (Im Bereich "Erweiterungen" findest Du mehr Infos über die Autoverbindung) Als Schlafzelt bietet das Classic Platz für bis zu 6 Personen und ist dank der elektrischen Pumpe in wenigen Minuten einsatzbereit.







ANSCHLUSS an alle Fahrzeuge
Elektrische Pumpe für noch SCHNELLEREN AUFBAU

WIND- und WETTERFEST

LANGLEBIGE Komponenten

ERWEITERBAR durch: GT-Car-Connection, Vorder- und Rückwände,...

VIELSEITIG einsetzbar
Angenehme Raumhöhe














Technische Spezifikationen:
Personen:  6
Grundfläche: 385x270cm
Höhe: 185-235cm

Rohrsystem aus  CORDURA ® - robust & stabil


Zeltstoff aus witterungsbeständigem TenCate, UV-resistent & hoch-atmungsaktiv                  

Gewicht: 10.0kg inklusive Verpackung, elektrische Pumpe, Abspannung und Zeltnägel
Packmaß: 60x40x30cm







BEKANNT AUS:











 
WAS MACHT UNSERE GENTLETENTS SO BESONDERS?





SIMPLE USE


Bei der Entwicklung unserer Zelte stand die einfache Handhabung im Vordergrund. Der Auf- und Abbau eines Gentletents soll so einfach wie möglich funktionieren. 


















Unsere Zelte sind innerhalb einer Minute aufgebaut. Alles, was du brauchst, ist ein Gentletent und eine Handpumpe (im Lieferumfang enthalten). Es gibt keine Stangen, die durch Laschen gefädelt werden müssen, und keine komplizierten Aufbauprozeduren.




Das nächste Abenteuer wartet schon auf dich. Deshalb legen wir Wert auf ein geringes Gewicht und kompakte Verpackungsmaße. So kann das Gentletent leicht verstaut werden und ist immer in Griffweite, wenn dich die Lust packt.




 
 

UNIQUE DESIGN




Rohrsystem:Das Herz eines jeden Gentletents ist sein revolutionäres Rohrsystem. Ein durchgängiger elastischer 10 Meter langer Schlauch mit einer Füllkapazität von 154 Liter (Gentletent XS) wird von einem robusten und verwindungssteifen Textilmantel in Form gehalten. Während die einzigartige Figur des Gentletents den Wasserabfluss begünstigt, hält der Rohrkörper sogar starken Winden stand. Unsere Zeltstoffe verfügen über eine Wassersäule von 600 - 10.000mm.






Farben:Jedes Gentletent ist in 2 der folgenden Farbkombinationen erhältlich. Nachdem du dich für ein Gentletent Modell deiner Wahl entschieden hast, kontaktieren wir dich bzgl. Farbauswahl.






OUTSTANDING QUALITYAußergewöhnliche Qualität und nachhaltige faire Produktionsbedingungen stehen im Zentrum unserer Bemühungen. 

 





Gentletent ZeltstoffDie Zeltwand unserer Gentletents besteht aus hochwertigem TenCate All Season Touring.Der Zeltstoff überzeugt durch:
Geringes Gewicht & hohe Widerstandsfähigkeit
UV-Resistenz
Hohe Atmungsaktivität
Wind-, Wasser- und Wetterfestigkeit
Umweltverträgliche Fertigung

















     Gentletent Pipe System:Der Schlauch aus thermoplastischem      Polyurethan wird von einem Cordura-   Mantel umhüllt. Letzteres findet vor    allem bei Schutzbekleidungen    (Motorsport, Feuerwehr und Militär)    Anwendung und sorgt durch seine    Abriebfestigkeit für  den sicheren Schutz des Luftsystems!








Rafting ValvesDie Verwendung hochwertiger Ventile erleichtert das Aufpumpen der Gentletents . Und keine Sorgen: Der eingebaute Überdruckmechanismus verhindert, dass du zuviel Luft einpumpst.











   Tent Pegs   Unsere Zeltnägel   sind stabil und kaum zu verbiegen. Mit     diesen Heringen seid ihr für sehr viele    Untergrundarten bestens gerüstet.







 GENTLE ATMOSPHERE
In unseren Zelten fühlt man sich wie zuhause. Das gewährleisten nicht nur die verarbeiteten Materialien und deren Atmungsaktivität, sondern auch die spezielle Form der Zelte. Mit 2 separaten Öffnungen ist für einen regen Luftaustausch gesorgt,  zudem wird Kondensbildung durch atmungsaktive Stoffe verhindert. 
 












ERWEITERUNGEN

 

GENTLETENT CAR CONNECTION


Viele wollen Zelten, aber dabei nicht auf ihr Fahrzeug verzichten. Mit der GT-Car-Connection bieten wir euch die Möglichkeit eure Gentletents mit Motorrad, PKW und Bus zu verbinden. So erspart ihr euch den lästigen Weg zum Auto und zurück. Der Autoanschluss erfolgt einfach per Zip am Gentletent und mit Saugnäpfen auf eurem Fahrzeug. Das erspart euch nicht nur die Abspannung eures Zeltes, sondern schafft auch ein schützendes Vordach.






 

GENTLETENT POWERPACK

Camping heißt die Natur genießen, aber wir wissen, dass manche von euch dabei nicht auf Mobiltelefon und Co verzichten wollen. Deshalb gibt es das Gentletent Powerpack. Die Solarfläche wird einfach an das Rohrsystem montiert und ein Kabel führt in den Zeltinnenraum, wo euer Mobiltelefon mit Solarenergie aufgeladen wird. 





 

 
UNTERSTÜTZE UNS




Nach 2-jähriger Entwicklung sind wir bereit für den nächsten Schritt. Mit eurer Hilfe und eurem Beitrag in Form eines Perks können wir den nächsten Schritt machen.
Jeder Beitrag zählt, deshalb haben wir eine Reihe von nützlichen Goodies zusammengestellt, aus denen ihr euren Favoriten auswählen könnt.


PERKS



GOODIES




GENTLETENTS






WEITERSAGEN




Du kennst jemanden, der an einem Gentletent interessiert sein könnte? Teile unser Projekt auf Facebook und Co und lass die Welt daran teilhaben!











 

TIMELINE









SHIPPING & DELIVERY




Wir wollen die Versandkosten so gering wie möglich halten. Nach dem Kampagnenende senden wir euch nähere Informationen dazu.
Wir garantieren, dass die Versandkosten die Preise in der nachfolgenden Tabelle nicht übersteigen werden!
 







Beachte:

Die Versandkosten beinhalten keine Zoll- oder sonstige Einfuhrgebühren, die gegebenenfalls anfallen können!


UNSER TEAMGernot Rammer - CEOJürgen Haller - CTO


Markus Strengberger - CCO
Christoph Weidinger -  Produktentwicklung
Tetyana Auer - Produktentwicklung
Michael Peer - Kommunikation/Medien

story:
LET'S BEAT CANCER

Have you or someone you love been diagnosed with Cancer?  1 in 2 Men and 1 in 3 Women will be diagnosed with Cancer? Where do we begin after Cancer starts! 

Cancer App is for patients seeking a support network and so much more.Cancer App is the road-map to; other patients, important questions you should be asking your doctors, disease specific oncologists and effective treatments.

Based on research and information we’ve gathered from cancer surgeons nationwide, out of pocket expense and the cost of being diagnosed with cancer is a real problem. In some cases patients cannot afford to receive the care they need. Cancer App also provides a means to help by seamlessly integrating fundraising within the app itself so patients can easily connect with their existing social network and support community!

Snapshot:

  • Access to others fighting Cancer near by
  • Resources to empower patients throughout their recovery 
  • Financial support, realize the generosity of friends and family

OUR STORY

I was shocked to discover my mom was diagnosed with Cancer at the age of 61.  I was in my late 20s at the time and never thought anyone in our family would get sick. I felt so helpless and scared. All I could do is ask questions. I wish I had known the right questions to ask. 

I remember my mother lying there after surgery and the terrified look on her face when the doctor said "The Cancer has spread to your liver and the tumors are too large to remove. Your heart is strong and I can see you've done a great job of taking care of yourself." Unfortunately despite living a healthy lifestyle, Cancer doesn't discriminate.  My mother struggled by experimenting with different treatments with no real direction.

My mom died from her Colon Cancer. We didn't have the knowledge to make a difference. We didn't know anyone else going through this. We didn't have access to other people fighting Cancer or information about treatments that were working. I realize now, day after day and years later that I didn't just lose my mother to Cancer, I lost my best friend.  

This Cancer App is for other patients like my mom, their family and friends.  It's time to empower others in their fight against Cancer.  Join us in helping people worldwide.

HOW THIS APP WILL HELP

  • Connect with others near you for support, information and knowledge
  • Find the right doctors and treatments for you
  • Find treatment centers
  • Share your experience with others fighting cancer
  • Get facts about your Cancer
  • Get a checklist of questions you need to be asking your doctors
  • Get financial help, realize the generosity of your friends and family

YOU ARE NOT ALONE

Connect with patients and our resources to learn how to plan for your diagnosis.

FEATURES

CONNECT

Currently, 7.6 million people die from Cancer each year. Treatment cost range from tens to hundreds of thousands of dollars. Our application has the potential to not only connect cancer patients with the information they need, but help them realize the generosity and support of their friends, family and colleagues.

TREATMENT COSTS

Cost of initial Cancer treatments are more than just financial. We can all agree that when facing life threatening disease, your health should be your number one focus.

THE AUTONOMY OF CANCER

Cancer cells are cells that have lost the ability to follow the normal control that the body exerts on all cells. In our body we have billions of cells and they have different functions. It's an extremely complicated process. When particular cells escape the normal control mechanisms and they continue to grow and they may spread, that's what we call Cancer. Those cells growing together is called a tumor, more specifically a malignant tumor due to the fact it can invade nearby tissue and spread to tissues that are not nearby, which can be life threatening.

Cancer can actually occur anywhere in the body, because there are cells everywhere in the body. It's important to note that Cancer that occurs in one individual is often very different than the Cancer that occurs in another.

Once the diagnosis of Cancer is made, the first obvious question is what do you do now? 

Cancer treatment is very complex. Cancer itself is not homogeneous; there may be several slight variations in the present Cancer cells. Which means even if you're able to treat a majority of the Cancer, different variation may still exists in the body which need to be treated altogether differently. 

Preparing yourself  is one of the first steps in recovery. Know the important questions you should be asking; what your treatment options are, whether it be surgery, radiation, chemotherapy or a homeopathic approach. Discover what's working for other patients in your surrounding area as well as worldwide. Connect with other people battling the same fight as you, and lets beat cancer together!

YOUR HELP

We are ready to make this next big step, but we need your help to make it as big as we possibly can! Funds raised from our Indiegogo campaign will be used for:

  • Development of our core resources in connecting, sharing & fundraising
  • Development of our Apple® iOS and Android® OS apps
  • Development of our world wide website

Snap shot of additional costs below;

Great applications are made successful with the help of great people. We've recruited a have a team of highly skilled and dedicated executives and supporters. Their unique skill sets in their respective fields will help us reach many demographic types in delivering the opportunity for people battling Cancer to download the app and discover more than is currently available. 

CANCER EXPERIENCE

We are a team of caring, dedicated and goal oriented individuals coming together to make a difference in the lives of people fighting Cancer every day.

ENGINEERING

Young, bright and talented group of engineers working together to help fight a global epidemic. 

WHAT WE NEED

Your contributions and support will help us in developing the free Cancer App. Please donate today and let's start helping others battling the emotional, physical and financial challenges associated with having Cancer.

WAYS TO HELP

Help when you can, and how you can!

  • Every bit counts
  • Donate - choose an option below
  • Tell friends - please share our campaign on Facebook 

plus, don't forget to take advantage of the Indiegogo share tools.

CHALLENGES

  • Awareness - sharing the news of our helpful free cancer app
  • Urgency - making the app available quickly, for those struggling today
  • Creation - providing a real-time thriving application for people worldwide

PERKS

We have a ton of great Perks for our supporters. Most of these items are exclusive to our Indiegogo campaign and you. For all the details, check the column on the right or use the cheat sheet below for some of the basics.

AMAZING

Be part of something truly amazing. Everyone counts, their stories and experience. Let's be amazing together! Please donate today.

FAQ

It looks too good to be true. Is this for real?
We have an amazing team to make CancerApp one of the best cancer resources available!  Combined, our knowledge and different perspectives around cancer has helped us in designing an empowering cancer application for cancer patients, their families, cancer advocates and cancer survivors world wide.  We will continue to improve and expand the application world wide as quickly as possible.
What makes your application unique?
Our doctors, executives and people supporting the development of this application have all been effected in some way by the loss of a close friend or family member battling cancer. Each of us have a unique perspective in the fight against cancer and are utilizing our experience in developing essential tools to help others and their families fighting cancer.
There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.
When can I expect my Perks/Rewards for my contribution?
Items will be available in 4-6 weeks from your contribution date. Thank You!
Does it work with iOS and Android Devices or my computer?
Yes, CancerApp will be available in the apple app store and the google play store upon release. We will notify you as soon as we receive approval from apple and google and the app is available to download. You will also be able to access CancerApp.com on your desktop and/or mobile-web devices for a great user experience. 
Can I back-up my account?
There is no need to "back-up" your account since CancerApp is an always connected and automatically stores your data in the cloud. If your account ever needs to be reset, once you connect your new  account, it'll automatically have all the important information you've collected and saved.
How is my privacy protected?
Guarding our users' privacy is something we take very seriously. We work hard to protect your information from unauthorized access and have designed policies and controls to safeguard the collection, use, and disclosure of your information.
How secure is this?
CancerAopuses SSL encryption to secure personal data sent to and from the cloud;
CancerApp uses 256-bit AES encryption in the cloud; and digital certificates are used to authenticate devices.
How does CancerApp respect my privacy?
A combination of technology and company policies are used to protect users privacy. CancerApp complies with FTC Bureau of Consumer Protection guidelines including the Children’s Online Privacy and Protection Act (COPPA).  Company policies ensure that CancerApp only collects data it needs, keeps it safe, and retains it only as long as necessary. A company security officer reviews security of all customer data at all phases of use.  CancerApp employs industry standard best practices regarding the way data is stored and transferred. Passwords are stored using cryptographic one-way hash functions. This ensures that no one has access to a users’ password.
Where is my data stored?
CancerApp automatically uploads your data to the cloud. There’s no explicit backup step required. The data is encrypted while in transit and on the servers. In the event that you break your phone or computer you can associate the new device with the account. The data will then be available on your new computing device. 
What data does CancerApp store?
CancerApp stores certain information about you and backs it up to the cloud. It is encrypted via SSL when being uploaded or downloaded from the cloud. While stored in the cloud it is encrypted via 256-bit AES. The information stored may include your name, information required to connect to your WiFi network, various preferences, and data that is entered or acquired through your use of the applications. Such data includes photos, contacts, videos, lists.
Is CancerApp hiring?
We are always on the lookout for talented people to join our team. If you think your background and goals are aligned with ours email us your resume at 'info at CancerApp.com' to start the introduction process. 
If I have questions, how can I reach your team?
Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! 
For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. 
For all other questions regarding CancerAot, contact us support@CancerApp.com

Those cells growing together is called a tumor, more specifically a malignant tumor due to the fact it can invade nearby tissue and spread to tissues that are not nearby, which can be life threatening.
Cancer can actually occur anywhere in the body, because there are cells everywhere in the body. It's important to note that Cancer that occurs in one individual is often very different than the Cancer that occurs in another.
Once the diagnosis of Cancer is made, the first obvious question is what do you do now? 
Cancer treatment is very complex. Cancer itself is not homogeneous; there may be several slight variations in the present Cancer cells. Which means even if you're able to treat a majority of the Cancer, different variation may still exists in the body which need to be treated altogether differently. 
Preparing yourself  is one of the first steps in recovery. Know the important questions you should be asking; what your treatment options are, whether it be surgery, radiation, chemotherapy or a homeopathic approach. Discover what's working for other patients in your surrounding area as well as worldwide. Connect with other people battling the same fight as you, and lets beat cancer together!
YOUR HELP

We are ready to make this next big step, but we need your help to make it as big as we possibly can! Funds raised from our Indiegogo campaign will be used for:



Development of our core resources in connecting, sharing & fundraising
Development of our Apple® iOS and Android® OS apps
Development of our world wide website


Snap shot of additional costs below;





Great applications are made successful with the help of great people. We've recruited a have a team of highly skilled and dedicated executives and supporters. Their unique skill sets in their respective fields will help us reach many demographic types in delivering the opportunity for people battling Cancer to download the app and discover more than is currently available. 
CANCER EXPERIENCE
We are a team of caring, dedicated and goal oriented individuals coming together to make a difference in the lives of people fighting Cancer every day.









ENGINEERING
Young, bright and talented group of engineers working together to help fight a global epidemic. 










WHAT WE NEED
Your contributions and support will help us in developing the free Cancer App. Please donate today and let's start helping others battling the emotional, physical and financial challenges associated with having Cancer.
WAYS TO HELP

Help when you can, and how you can!


Every bit counts
Donate - choose an option below
Tell friends - please share our campaign on Facebook 

plus, don't forget to take advantage of the Indiegogo share tools.
CHALLENGES




Awareness - sharing the news of our helpful free cancer app

Urgency - making the app available quickly, for those struggling today
Creation - providing a real-time thriving application for people worldwide

PERKS
We have a ton of great Perks for our supporters. Most of these items are exclusive to our Indiegogo campaign and you. For all the details, check the column on the right or use the cheat sheet below for some of the basics.








AMAZING
Be part of something truly amazing. Everyone counts, their stories and experience. Let's be amazing together! Please donate today.




FAQ



It looks too good to be true. Is this for real?We have an amazing team to make CancerApp one of the best cancer resources available!  Combined, our knowledge and different perspectives around cancer has helped us in designing an empowering cancer application for cancer patients, their families, cancer advocates and cancer survivors world wide.  We will continue to improve and expand the application world wide as quickly as possible.

What makes your application unique?Our doctors, executives and people supporting the development of this application have all been effected in some way by the loss of a close friend or family member battling cancer. Each of us have a unique perspective in the fight against cancer and are utilizing our experience in developing essential tools to help others and their families fighting cancer.

There was an error with my contribution. What happened?Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

When can I expect my Perks/Rewards for my contribution?Items will be available in 4-6 weeks from your contribution date. Thank You!
Does it work with iOS and Android Devices or my computer?Yes, CancerApp will be available in the apple app store and the google play store upon release. We will notify you as soon as we receive approval from apple and google and the app is available to download. You will also be able to access CancerApp.com on your desktop and/or mobile-web devices for a great user experience. 

Can I back-up my account?There is no need to "back-up" your account since CancerApp is an always connected and automatically stores your data in the cloud. If your account ever needs to be reset, once you connect your new  account, it'll automatically have all the important information you've collected and saved.

How is my privacy protected?Guarding our users' privacy is something we take very seriously. We work hard to protect your information from unauthorized access and have designed policies and controls to safeguard the collection, use, and disclosure of your information.

How secure is this?CancerAopuses SSL encryption to secure personal data sent to and from the cloud;CancerApp uses 256-bit AES encryption in the cloud; and digital certificates are used to authenticate devices.

How does CancerApp respect my privacy?A combination of technology and company policies are used to protect users privacy. CancerApp complies with FTC Bureau of Consumer Protection guidelines including the Children’s Online Privacy and Protection Act (COPPA).  Company policies ensure that CancerApp only collects data it needs, keeps it safe, and retains it only as long as necessary. A company security officer reviews security of all customer data at all phases of use.  CancerApp employs industry standard best practices regarding the way data is stored and transferred. Passwords are stored using cryptographic one-way hash functions. This ensures that no one has access to a users’ password.

Where is my data stored?CancerApp automatically uploads your data to the cloud. There’s no explicit backup step required. The data is encrypted while in transit and on the servers. In the event that you break your phone or computer you can associate the new device with the account. The data will then be available on your new computing device. 

What data does CancerApp store?CancerApp stores certain information about you and backs it up to the cloud. It is encrypted via SSL when being uploaded or downloaded from the cloud. While stored in the cloud it is encrypted via 256-bit AES. The information stored may include your name, information required to connect to your WiFi network, various preferences, and data that is entered or acquired through your use of the applications. Such data includes photos, contacts, videos, lists.

Is CancerApp hiring?We are always on the lookout for talented people to join our team. If you think your background and goals are aligned with ours email us your resume at 'info at CancerApp.com' to start the introduction process. 

If I have questions, how can I reach your team?Please read through the FAQ first to find your answer. We are receiving a lot of special requests, and are responding as fast as possible! For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. For all other questions regarding CancerAot, contact us support@CancerApp.com

story:
Good day/Evening to you all dear readers.

My name is Simon and you simply must achieve weight loss the natural way it is the best route forward. I have spent the last 8 months building this here website  http://naturallyloseit.org It stems from a lot of personal knowledge and hours of research as well. I am disabled so I need permanently to have a diet in place as, due to the inactivity I must endure, I really have to watch my weight.

I became disabled 9 years ago and due to this I am not able to work so therefore I am without the means to save any money whatsoever. I have spent every little thing I have on the development and membership to an on line university who teach you all there is to know about building a site.

I have a selection of perks that will include varying quantities of healthy food diets to achieve weight loss the natural way. Ranging from a week so that it introduces you to healthy foods right through to a 3 months to really get you on the right path to weight loss the natural way whilst providing your body with its much needed vitamins and minerals.

All of these you will most definitely get from the advice given to you on the site. I will, along side each meal, list the vitamins and minerals they contain so that you can easily keep a track of your intake and gain the maximum weight loss the natural way you can. Remember you deserve to be happy and trim.

The photo above is from 10 years ago and I piled on nearly  80lbs.


I feel that my site is progressing really well although the one thing that I am lacking in is traffic and there really is only one thing I can do and that is to run a Google adwords campaign (ppc or Pay Per Click)

So just think on that you will not only be helping me but also the masses who have an issue with their weight.  This can be down to poor eating habits through the lack of education or simply a lack of access to the correct foodstuffs.

With this site it will go a long way to improving this terrible ordeal and at least help to educate the people in the ways of weight loss the natural way.

As you can see from the site itself it is very detailed and I am going to add more and more posts every two days.

My main obstacle 

The main obstacle/challenge that I befalls me  is the sheer volume of competition that I face. However I fail to see the point in actually parting with your money to become a member of these so called "Diet" sites when we have all the right foods stuffs readily available for us to consume. It seems like a waste of money to me and, then, you have to pay extra to purchase the foods. With the advice given on my free website you only need to buy the foods and pay  ZERO membership to access all of the information on weight loss the natural way of which there is plenty.

I really need your kind donations as I simply must get my site in front of the masses as I too put on an awful amount of weight when I became disabled and it was only due to this method that I was able to lose weight the natural way. Without it I would no doubt still be struggling. So if at all possible could you donate something no matter how small you feel it is as as they say "every little helps" !!!!

 My aim to side step a large majority of these sites by placing myself in front of the relevant people via advertising to them when they are actively searching out advice and help.

So many more calories in "Fast" convenience foods.

If you cannot contribute at this time could you please then at least share this wonderful campaign as I'm sure it will help me in my quest.  As I have said I have already spent 8 months on this project and it will be a work in progress for many years to come.

So if you are ready to achieve weight loss the natural way please add me on face book https://www.facebook.com/naturallylighter  and together we will surely make a dent in this terrible circumstance that we find ourselves in. It need not ALWAYS be our own faults. As I previously alluded to  food education plays a big part. Ignorance is not necessarily a fault.
If the knowledge needed is for yourself or for someone you care about please feel free to bookmark my site. In fact, I wholeheartedly encourage you to do so. Refer to it when ever you need questions about weight loss answering or you feel that your motivation levels are dropping or would just like further information on the subject.
It was created to assist.

There are easy to use share tools within this platform so go on, please share?

story:
Our Mission:

Hello, I’m Erika Prinz Freed, a licensed acupuncturist in the state of New York. This September I will be embarking on the Humla Medical Service Trip, a volunteer healthcare mission in one of the poorest districts in all of Nepal.  The reason I chose to enter the healthcare field is to help others—and this volunteer service trip is a true expression of compassionate care and knowledge in action. 

The Humla Medical Service Trip is a grassroots, 501(c)3 nonprofit effort. All of the volunteers, including myself, must fund their own way. 

During the Humla Medical Service Trip, I will join doctors, nurses, and healthcare volunteers, including other acupuncturists, to provide no-cost, high-quality health care to residents of the area. Our group will trek through the Himalayan mountains and set up four mobile village clinics where we will offer treatment to hundreds of patients in need of medical care. Last year the Humla Fund volunteers treated over 700 villagers in the span of seven days.

Why I’m Asking For Your Help:

I am humbly asking for your charitable support so that I can volunteer my knowledge, skills and time to help those in need. The money that you donate will help to fund my cost of the trip, including travel, lodging, food, & support staff, like translators. Every dollar you donate fund my participation in this critical volunteer mission.  

The total trip cost is $5300.00 (trip cost + airfare). The cost of the medical mission itself is $3800.00; this covers supplies, board, lodging, food, Nepalese staff for trekking & camping, & an English translator. The airfare is $1500.00. Any additional funds I raise will pay for the required personal supplies I must bring (0 degrees sleeping bag, sleeping pad, hiking boots, etc.).

The Impact:

The Humla District is one of the world’s most remote areas, and extremely poor. The men, women and children of the region face a devastating lack of education and healthcare. While the population of the Humla District is 50,000 people, there is only one hospital, which has a shortage of doctors. As a result, most illnesses and injuries go untreated. Additionally, the recent earthquakes that recently ravaged Nepal have only worsened circumstances for residents. The people of the region need hand on healthcare—and our team of experienced practicioners will be there to provide it.

Track Record of Success:

This is the second year for trip, which is a core project of the Humla Fund, a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization dedicated to strengthening the Bon culture and traditions in the Humla region of Nepal through access to quality education, healthcare and sustainable economic development. The Humla Fund solely relies on donations of medical supplies and monetary donations to provide medical care to the Humli people.

The trip is led in part by Tempa Dukte Lama, an ordained Tibetan Bon lama who was born in Humla, Nepal, into a family of Tibetan Bon and Buddhist practitioners and healers. Our group will have the opportunity to share in these teachings to build deeper bridges of understanding within the region.

For more information about the Humla Medical Service Trip or the Humla Fund, please visit http://humlafund.org/.

"The essence of having compassion for all beings is the wish to free ourselves, and all beings, from the cyclic continuum of suffering."  Tempa Dukte Lama

story:
WHAT IS THIS ABOUT?

The sports-ground in Vallecito is currently in decay. Few kids and youngsters use it for sports anymore since the facilities are in terrible shape and robberies can occur there even during day. Parents fear for the safety of their children and prefer to keep them at home. Lacking the possibility of using their public spaces, the Vallecito neighbors have few opportunities for recreational activities that contribute to the development of the youngsters and strengthen the community.

But a group of neighbors has gotten together to recover the public park. With the help of the local parish and grass-root organizations, they want to fix the damaged infrastructure and turn the place into a safe, beautiful and well used sports ground that brings all neighbors together in a stand against insecurity. We just need your help!

WHO ARE WE?

The heart of the initiative are Junior and his friends, a group of young, sports loving neighbors from Vallecito who look forward to the possibilities that come with having a better public space. They have been brought together by the local parish priest Father Juan Febrero, who is dedicated to supporting youngsters in youth gangs and offering alternatives to violence and crime.

The group’s initiative is supported by the Colectivo de Convivencia y Seguridad Ciudadana, a local grass-roots association founded in 2014 by neighbors who are tired of the worsening security situation in the area and who are joining forces to improve it. The Collective also coordinates with the local police commissioner and the Municipality of the Villa María district.

Father Juan and the Instituto de Defensa Legal (IDL) are both members of the Collective. We – César, Nancy and Isabel – are members of the IDL Citizen Security team and thus we are launching this Indiegogo campaign to support the initiative of the Vallecito neighbors.

PERKS?

Every donation will be greatly appreciated, so you can either choose one of our suggested amounts or contribute a customized amount. We also want to give something back - even if it's just a digital symbol of our gratitude. You will get the perks listed on the right and should you donate a customized amount, you will receive the perk that is closest to your amount.

HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP?

We understand that not everyone can afford to donate to this campaign, but please help contribute by sharing our story: just share the campaign's Indiegogo link on your social media and via email! Gracias!


MORE INFO FOR THE CURIOUS

WHY WE NEED YOU!

The group of neighbors has already managed to install a floodlight on the ground and Father Juan has organized a soccer tournament between youth gangs there, to show everyone that it is a space for coming together and building community.

But the sports ground’s infrastructure is damaged and very uninviting: The floor is uneven and has holes in it. The surroundings are dirty and dark; there are neither tribunes nor plants. The football pitch looks upon the street and there is no fence to keep the ball from rolling into it, forcing the players to run downhill after their ball – in front of cars racing by.

The young people want to revamp the sports ground, even out the floor, install security measures and make it beautiful, so that neighbors feel at ease when using it. But to achieve this, funds are needed!

Your help would allow them to buy or rent the following materials and fulfill these goals:

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS?

We believe that sport is a catalyst for human development and peace within a community. We want Vallecito to have a space for sports and for coming together as a community; a space that is safe and accessible to everyone. We also believe that the common struggle to revamp this public space will bring the community closer together: neighbors from different ages and backgrounds will be motivated by Father Juan and the Collective to help in cleaning, repairing and decorating the sports ground. We hope that this process will trigger more cooperation among the citizens in Vallecito so that together they can build a more secure neighborhood.

The Vallecito neighborhood is part of the Jose Carlos Mariategui (JCM) zone in Villa María del Triunfo district. This emerging district was established in 1961 as an effort to acknowledge the growing informal settlements and squatter areas on the barren hills of Lima’s south-eastern border. Today, the whole district of Villa María del Triunfo houses 441.239 citizens on 71km2, of which 56,7 % live in poverty and 3,5% live in extreme poverty.[1] The district has also shown worrisome crime rates while the police and municipal police (serenazgo) are understaffed: 1 police officer per 1952 citizens and 1 serenazgo per 3238 citizens.[2]

In a neighborhood like Vallecito, the families’ lack of resources and rising insecurity form a vicious circle that worsens urban living conditions. The circle works in many ways, one of which is through the loss of public spaces: Growing fear of robberies and assaults pushes the neighbors to stay at home instead of spending time in the public spaces of their community. Thus, these spaces are abandoned, deteriorate and become dangerous as they are frequented by local gangs or petty criminals. Needless to say, this situation discourages the neighbors even more from using their public space. Thus, the opportunities for meeting, building community and sharing resources dwindle, reinforcing the vicious circle.

Retaking the sports ground as a public space for the community is crucial for Vallecito’s security and wellbeing!

FAQs

- What happens if you raise more money than the initial goal? We have calculated the goal of this campaign based on the most important improvements needed and wished for by the local stakeholders. But there's so much more to do! Every extra dollar donated will therefore fund additional measures to make the place greener, safer and more functional to the community. Stay tuned for updates!

- What happens if you don’t reach your fundraising goal? We will restrict the activities to the absolute minimum: evening out the floor and installing the fence and lights so that the space is at least functional and safe for playing football.

- Are you only raising money through this campaign? Yes.

- How do the Vallecito neighbors get the raised funds? The raised money will be received in an IDL account and, with the supervision of Father Juan, it will be transferred to the parish account from where Father Juan, in close coordination with Junior and a member from the Collective, will withdraw money whenever a payment is due.

- Are these contributions tax deductible? Yes. IDL is a non-for-profit organization and under Peruvian law eligible to have tax-exempt status.


[1] INEI 2014: Proyección de población al 2014, and Ministerio de Trabajo 2009: Pobreza y Desarrollo Local en Lima Sur.

[2] IDL-Seguridad Ciudadana 2014: Informe Anual de Seguridad Ciudadana and IDL-Seguridad Ciudadana: Riesgos y recursos preventivos del delito - Lima Metropolitana y Callao 2013.

in poverty and 3,5% live in extreme poverty.[1] The district
has also shown worrisome crime rates while the police and municipal police
(serenazgo) are understaffed: 1 police
officer per 1952 citizens and 1 serenazgo per 3238 citizens.[2]
In a neighborhood like Vallecito, the families’ lack of
resources and rising insecurity form a vicious circle that worsens urban living
conditions. The circle works in many ways, one of which is through the loss of public spaces: Growing fear of
robberies and assaults pushes the neighbors to stay at home instead of spending
time in the public spaces of their community. Thus, these spaces are abandoned,
deteriorate and become dangerous as they are frequented by local gangs or petty
criminals. Needless to say, this situation discourages the neighbors even more
from using their public space. Thus, the opportunities for meeting, building
community and sharing resources dwindle, reinforcing the vicious circle.
Retaking the sports ground
as a public space for the community is crucial for Vallecito’s security and
wellbeing!FAQs- What
     happens if you raise more money than the initial goal? We have calculated the goal of this campaign based on
the most important improvements needed and wished for by the local
stakeholders. But there's so much more to do! Every extra
dollar donated will therefore fund additional measures to make the place greener, safer and more functional to the community. Stay tuned for updates! - What
happens if you don’t reach your fundraising goal? We will restrict the activities to the absolute
minimum: evening out the floor and installing the fence and lights so that the
space is at least functional and safe for playing football.

- Are you
only raising money through this campaign? Yes.- How do
the Vallecito neighbors get the raised funds? The raised money will be received in an IDL account and, with
the supervision of Father Juan, it will be transferred to the parish account
from where Father Juan, in
close coordination with Junior and a member from the Collective, will withdraw money whenever a payment is due.
- Are these
contributions tax deductible? Yes. IDL is a
non-for-profit organization and under Peruvian law eligible to have tax-exempt
status.


[1] INEI 2014: Proyección de población al 2014, and Ministerio de Trabajo 2009: Pobreza y Desarrollo Local en Lima Sur.



[2] IDL-Seguridad Ciudadana 2014: Informe Anual de Seguridad Ciudadana and IDL-Seguridad Ciudadana: Riesgos y recursos preventivos del delito - Lima Metropolitana y Callao 2013.

story:
My mother’s home-made cookies have always been my favorite.  I remember devouring dozens of them as a kid and as I grew my mom and I would spend countless hours baking her famous “polvorones” for friends, family and for special occasions. 

In early 2010, as part of a major career change, we uprooted our family and moved from Texas to Illinois.  My mother, of course, dropped everything and joined us to help move and settle into our new life and new home.  Of course, she missed everyone back home in Texas, but managed to ‘stay connected’ as she learned the ins and outs of Facebook and social media.  The least I could do to repay her for her help was to give her free reign of my laptop.

Once we were settled in, she flew back to Texas.  Within days she had a major brain aneurysm and she died suddenly.  I was devastated!  Heartbroken and depressed. 

Enter Felix, my six-year-old son.  From this young age he has had an impressive sense of confidence and persistence.  He wanted in on a table at his new school's craft fair and he wouldn't take no for an answer.  I wasn't having it.  I was still deeply distraught at my mother's passing but to appease him, I told him I would "Google something" he might be able to sell at the fair.

One night I opened up my laptop and there it was.  I double clicked on a file titled "RECIPE" saved on my laptop.  I was shocked!  It was my mother's cookie recipe of polvorones.  When Felix heard  I had found Grandma Toni's recipe he was THRILLED!    

“Mom, that’s it!  We have to sell Grandma’s Cookies!!”  he said.

I disagreed. “No one wants to buy Grandma’s cookies. They don’t even know what they are.  These are Mexican cookies, only Mexicans know what these cookies are". 

“Exactly Mom!  That’s why we should sell them.  Everyone will love them as much as us.  Her cookies are THE BEST and I know I can make them FAMOUS!” And with the confidence of a six-year-old he said: “Grandma would want me to do this. Plus, with all the money we get, we can donate to a charity because Grandma always gave to others.” 

And that’s how Felix’s Famous Cookies was born.

We sold my mom’s cookies at that craft fair for 3 years in a row.  Each year we would sell out and donate our proceeds.  Customers would tell us “We came back just for your cookies!”.

2013 was truly the year we knew we were on to something good.  We went into the craft fair with 700 cookies and we sold out in less than 2.5 hours.  It was a great feeling!  In 2014 we took a leap of faith and turned this hobby into a real cookie company.

We launched our website in December 2014.  We quickly began shipping our cookies all across the country and soon after we were on store shelves.  We also won the Samuel Adam’s Brewing the American Dream Pitch Competition in Chicago within months of starting up.  We are growing much faster than we ever dreamed of!

Fund our campaign, and watch us grow!  With your pledge we will:

- Hire more employees (1 part-time baker and 1 part-time in-store demonstrator)

- Purchase kitchen equipment to improve our process

Any amount would greatly be appreciated!  Thank you for your support in keeping a young boy's mission of making his Grandma's cookies FAMOUS!

story:
The water polo team at the international school Red Cross Nordic United World College, located on the west coast Norway, is a unique student enterprise based fully on student engagement and experience. 

Currently there are 5 engaged students running the organization- Dan Mulco, Zoltán Illés, Sven Herman Holmsen, Ines Söderström and Veronika Konopka, who both enjoy the sport but also are eager to expand the club through the participation in Norway's Junior Water Polo Tournament. The tournament takes place in Nordby (30 min. from Oslo) and therefore our team needs financial support to cover the transportation and accommodation costs. 

Our aims for the coming season are to involve more students in the organization, teach them the necessary skills and together participate in the tournament as a team on the 18th to 20th of September 2015.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

In November 2014, I stood at the top of Vidigal a community ("favela") in Rio de Janiero.  The climb to the top would have been tiring for even those in top shape. The streets were steep and winding. Vidigal is built on the side of a mountain. The homes were makeshift and covered in graffiti. As I moved nothing I saw inspired me to continue to go deeper into this community, however, something in my heart told me continue. Finally, we reached the top. I was with my cousin who is a few years older than me. I walked on top of an abandoned/unfinished structure. From there I looked out and saw something beautiful. I couldn't move, I wouldn't move. 
From the top one of the poorest communities was a beautiful view of Rio de Janeiro.   We had a clear view of the sandy beaches of Ipanema beach and Sugarloaf Mountain. The waves looked so calm and inviting. The city of Rio looked friendly and calm. After about an hour I started to walk down. Everything looked different. I watched kids play a soccer game, there was a sport complex. I saw opportunity. An opportunity to improve the lives of others. While I don't know the NGO that set up this complex, I did see the joy in the smiles of these young soccer players. It made me think of how I can help nonprofits create more smiles. 
Hello, my name is Achumboro Ataande. I graduated from Vanderbilt Law School in May 2015. I'm the founder of Ourcomm.org and I'm a social entrepreneur. 
I'm Christian, and I've been blessed throughout my life. Many of those blessings came through nonprofits. Nonprofits like the Kips Bay Boys and Girls Club, which gave me a safe and fun place to spend my childhood while I grew up in the Bronx, NY. Being there helped me avoid drugs and other negative activities. Nonprofits like the Fresh Air Fund. They place inner-city kids with different families during the summer. For some summers, I lived in a town full of Quakers. My experience there gave me an appreciation for people from other cultures and backgrounds. Therefore, I want to help nonprofits provide the love, blessings, and experiences they have provided me to others. 
Together, we can create a social network focused on helping nonprofits become more effective. By creating a common volunteer application process on a website which hosts many great nonprofits and make it easy to volunteer. Imagine being able to find nonprofits by the issues they address or the communities they help. When tragedy strikes, instead of just the big nonprofits you would be able to find the smaller nonprofits who always attended to those areas. We can help them provide more help. 
We're in New York, NY.

What We Need & Your Perks

We need $300,000 to continue upgrading Ourcomm.org and to get more nonprofits on board. While we have already created a social network and common application function we want to make those features more sophisticated and add a few new ones. 

There are 1.5 million nonprofits in the U.S. however, most of them are small and without enough resources. Therefore, in addition to hiring more engineers for building the OurComm.org, we need to hire people to find nonprofits and get them on the website. 

We need to hire three developers, a user interface designer, and a few people to help recruit volunteers and nonprofits. 

In addition, we need to get a small office, as the team becomes bigger working in an office rather than my home will help us become more productive. 

Perks:

As a website we had to be creative to come up with some cool perks. However, we are very excited about these and hope you like them. 

-We are offering early access to all donors. You can become the avant-garde, in later years you (and your friends) will know you were at the front of innovation.

- We will create a page on our website with the names of supporters. An internet wall of recognition. 

- An OurComm T-shirt. We will be producing amazing T-shirts to commemorate the people involved. 

-A meeting with our founder, Achumboro Ataande. Ask questions, give advice, or just talk. 

The Impact

Imagine a world where nonprofits could do more. By creating a website for people to volunteer their skills we are creating that world. Imagine your volunteering making a lasting impact. Imagine nonprofits infused with the energy of college students. Instead of grabbing coffee or flipping burgers during the summer, they could test out what they learned in class with a nonprofit. Imagine how much smoother relief efforts for hurricane sandy would have went if people knew of the variety of nonprofits helping out. Imagine if the head of UPS logistics volunteered. 
We believe we can make more people volunteer by allowing them find nonprofits who serve missions they are passionate about. From children, to animals, to anything else, would you volunteer more if you could volunteer at places which served a cause you are passionate about? We think you and your friends would. 
What if you could volunteer to a Nonprofit/NGO in Malawi? You have the choice to fly there or work from home. Or what if you want to make your community better, easily find and apply to a nonprofit near you.
In short, we believe we can make the world better by helping the helpers. Who are the helpers? Volunteers and nonprofits. By making it easier for both to work together, we believe we can create a better world. One where people have shelter and access to clean water, where children have better educations, and much more. 
We have the privilege to already host some great nonprofits. Such as ChemoComfort (http://chemocomfort.org),  they provides care packages that make chemotherapy more bearable for cancer patients. Also, Africa Health Now, http://africanhealthnow.org, health clinics in Ghana and has served over 4,000 people through health fairs and has impacted over 20,000 people. With your help we can connect more volunteers to more nonprofits. 

Risks & Challenges

We want Ourcomm.org to do more than simplifying the volunteering process. We want nonprofits and volunteers to be able to share their stories through videos and other kinds of media. To do this, we've created a social network. 

However, along with these additional functions comes increased costs and a greater potential for problems. We have to create a system that doesn't break or get disrupted. Our website must be able to accommodate  a high volume of people especially during times of tragedy like Floods, Earthquakes, or Tsunamis. We can't break down or stop working when people and nonprofits need us most. 

We are creating a team to meet these challenges. We are committed to making the world a better place. 

A Special Thank You

Thank you to everyone who has been involved in some way over the last 8 months. You have all been amazing in getting things off the ground.  Thank you mom, for being supportive when I chose to pursue this instead of taking the bar exam. Thank you honey (Joyce) for being so supportive and encouraging. Thank you pop- Steve, for all the great advice and always being there. 

Thank you to our advisors, Jimmy Joseph, Robert Reder, and Jim Schorr. Thank you for believing in our team and our idea. 

Thank you to Derrick Baber for helping out with research and communications. Thank you to Ben Schecter for never saying yes unless you believed it was the right thing to do. 

I am grateful for everyone who has given time to help and give us advice.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our video and story. Twitter, Facebook, anything! By sharing our story you allow us to spend more time focusing on building the best social network possible. 
If you have any tips or advice for us please email us at contact@ourcomm.org. 
If you are able to provide items we can include as perks also please email us at contact@ourcomm.org.
If you are or if you know a nonprofit we should have please email us at nonprofits@ourcomm.org.

story:
Seametrey Childrens Village, Cambodia

In Cambodia, 1 in 8 children dies before his or her fifth birthday, and many suffer from diseases that are easily preventable through immunization, better nutrition, and proper sanitation.

Seametrey Childrens Village is a not-for-profit organisation that lies in Tonle Bati-  35kms away from the bustling city of Phnom Penh. Created by Muoy You, a Cambodian humanitarian, scholar and teacher, Seametrey is a school that relies only on private donors around the world for its running. The school offers free education, music lessons, lessons on history and philosophy to children who wouldn't be able to afford to attend school at all. The school doesn't close over the holiday period as the childrens' parents can't take time off work to look after them. 

Families like Prem-Preys (Pictured Above)  who attends the school live on less than $2 per day. With your help we can ensure that kids like Prem-Prey and his friends are less likely to be affected by preventable illnesses like diarrhoea which can not only be fatal but can prevent children from attending school.

The school/village who Muoy has funded herself on her own land is a mixed school with both male and female student that range from 2-14 years of age. The school gets books donated from just a small handful of donors worldwide but these kids need the basic necessities that we take for granted daily..Like toothbrushes!!! 

We are lucky enough to have been involved personally in this school for 3 years and Muoy never fails to amaze us with her drive and passion in fighting for the right for poor children getting an education.  


WE NEED YOUR HELP TO PROVIDE THESE CHILDREN WITH HYGIENE KITS SO THEY DONT GET SICK AND CAN ATTEND SCHOOL!


AND ITS ALL FOR THE COST OF JUST ONE CUP OF COFFEE!
in relation with onecupofcoffee.net 
to learn more about Muoy and the village please visit http://seametreycambodia.org
*please note that $3 US is the equivalent to $5 AUD as that is the currency used in Cambodia.
